description.zh-cn: 文化大革命（简称文革），是1966年5月16日至1976年10月6日发生在中国大陆，由毛泽东发动的十年运动。期间，中央书记处及总书记职务被撤销，大量领导人受迫害，地方机构瘫痪。文革对中国社会影响深远，被后世负面评价为“十年内乱”、“十年浩劫”，受邓小平等人全面否定。魏京生曾参加红卫兵，巩俐父亲被调往山东大学，王荣顺科研工作中断。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution (referred to as the Cultural Revolution) was a ten-year movement initiated by Mao Zedong in mainland China from May 16, 1966, to October 6, 1976. During this period, the Central Secretariat and the General Secretary's position were abolished, many leaders were persecuted, and local institutions were paralyzed. The Cultural Revolution had a profound impact on Chinese society, was negatively evaluated by later generations as 'ten years of civil strife' or 'ten years of catastrophe', and was completely rejected by Deng Xiaoping and others. Wei Jingsheng participated in the Red Guards, Gong Li's father was transferred to Shandong University, and Wang Rongshun's scientific research was interrupted.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人，中华人民共和国第一代最高领导人。他曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席，在此期间，他下令开展抗疟药物研究。1950年10月，他决定派兵入朝作战，组建中国人民志愿军。他率领部队在井冈山建立了第一个革命根据地。他十分赏识梅兰芳的艺术。他是文化大革命和大跃进运动的主要发动者和领导者，中共第一代领导集体的核心，并确定了民族区域自治制度。其执政时期普遍实行领导干部职务终身制。其著作《体育之研究》中的一句话被用作北京体育大学的校训精神。此外，他在中共八届十中全会上就小说《刘志丹》问题发表的言论，为该案的升级和扩大化提供了支持。1972年会见访华的田中角荣。阎明复曾为他与赫鲁晓夫的会谈担任翻译，并于1975年在其指示下获释。毛新宇的祖父，毛泽民之兄。魏京生因大跃进的后果而认为其是“刽子手”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, and the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He was also the first-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. As Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, he ordered the commencement of antimalarial drug research. In October 1950, he decided to send troops into Korea, forming the Chinese People's Volunteer Army. He led troops to establish the first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains. He greatly admired Mei Lanfang's art. He was the main initiator and leader of the Cultural Revolution and the Great Leap Forward, the core of the first generation of CCP leadership, and established the system of national regional autonomy. During his rule, the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres was widely practiced. A phrase from his work 'A Study of Physical Education' is used as the spirit of Beijing Sport University's motto. Furthermore, his remarks on the novel 'Liu Zhidan' at the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee of the CCP provided support for the escalation and expansion of the case. He met with Kakuei Tanaka during his visit to China in 1972. Yan Mingfu served as a translator for his meeting with Khrushchev and was released from prison in 1975 under his instruction. He was also the elder brother of Mao Zemin. Wei Jingsheng considered him a 'butcher' due to the consequences of the Great Leap Forward.

birth_place.zh-cn: 长沙府宁乡县花明楼镇炭子冲村

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国的重要缔造者之一，曾任中华人民共和国第二任主席、中国共产党中央委员会副主席。他推动了中国人民大学的建立，并在七千人大会上对大跃进提出批评。阎明复曾随他率领的中共代表团出席苏共十九大并担任翻译。最终在文化大革命中被打倒并被迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the CCP and PRC, once served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China. Yan Mingfu attended the 19th Congress of the CPSU as a translator with the CPC delegation led by him.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省广安市广安区协兴镇牌坊村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。在抗日战争和第二次国共内战期间，曾与李达、刘伯承长期共事。曾任晋冀鲁豫野战军及第二野战军政治委员、中国共产党中央书记处总书记。文革中被打倒。文革后，他领导拨乱反正并推动改革开放，成为中华人民共和国第二代最高领导人，但也被魏京生批评为独裁者。其曾担任中共中央军委主席、国家军委主席，提出“一国两制”构想，并主导推动了废除干部领导职务终身制。他在处理八六学潮问题上持强硬立场，批评胡耀邦，推动了随后的“反对资产阶级自由化”运动，是六四戒严及清场的主要决策者。他还曾在1958年主持会议批判粟裕，并支持了中国人民大学的复校。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman, and the core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He served as the second-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989, and was known as the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up, though he was also criticized by Wei Jingsheng as a dictator. He worked closely with Li Da and Liu Bocheng during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Second Chinese Civil War. During his leadership period, he also served as Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He led and promoted the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres. He took a hardline stance on the 1986 student demonstrations, criticized Hu Yaobang, and promoted the subsequent 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖北省黄州府黄冈县回龙山镇林家大湾村

death_place.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国肯特省巴特瑙劳布县苏布拉嘎盆地

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的现代政治人物、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，林立果之父。他曾任国防部部长、中共中央副主席、国务院副总理，是原中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一。毛泽东在中共九大上确立他为接班人，后在九一三事件中坠机身亡。在文化大革命期间，他曾迫害贺龙，并支持韦国清在广西镇压造反派。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military leader, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝江苏省淮安府山阳县驸马巷

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、革命家、外交家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国及中国人民解放军的创建者和重要领导人之一，也是南昌起义的领导者之一。曾任中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，并长期担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席等要职。他也是南开大学校友。在四一二事件中指挥上海工人武装，后被南京国民政府通缉。作为中共中央南方局负责人，他曾重视和支持育才学校，并亲自到校看望师生。他曾与毛泽东一同下令开展抗疟药物研究，并组建了523项目。在文革期间，他努力维持国家正常运转，也曾过问张孝骞的情况，但后期也曾支持韦国清镇压“4·22”派。他曾设法营救毛泽民等人。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, an important leader of the Chinese Communist Party, and one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising. He commanded the armed workers in Shanghai during the April 12th Incident and was later wanted by the Nanjing Nationalist Government. He was also an alumnus of Nankai University. As the head of the Southern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, he valued and supported Yucai School, and personally visited its teachers and students. He established Project 523 and, along with Mao Zedong, ordered the commencement of antimalarial drug research. During the Cultural Revolution, he strived to maintain the normal operation of the state and intervened in Zhang Xiaoqian's situation, but later also supported Wei Guoqing in suppressing the 'April 22' faction. He also attempted to rescue Mao Zemin and others.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东第四任妻子，毛岸青继母，中国政治人物、演员、文艺理论家，原国家级副职领导人，曾任中央文化革命小组副组长。她是文化大革命期间中国共产党的主要领导人之一，“四人帮”之首，魏京生在文革期间曾对其产生怀疑。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife and a prominent member of the Gang of Four, of whom Wei Jingsheng became suspicious during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中华人民共和国的重要政治人物，中国共产党高级领导人，原国家级正职领导人。四人帮核心成员，曾任上海市革委会主任、中央文革小组副组长、中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省诸暨县直埠镇姚公埠村

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，中央文革小组成员，文革的理论旗手，发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。中国文化大革命时期的重要政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。

birth_place.zh-cn: 吉林省长春市绿园区西新镇开源村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市首都医科大学附属复兴医院

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，原正国级领导人，曾任中共中央副主席、中共中央政治局常委。
毛泽东指定的接班人，在他逝世后领导粉碎“四人帮”，成为中国最高领导人。中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾兼任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理、中央军事委员会主席，是至今唯一一位同时出任党政军三大最高领导职务的领导人。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor, who served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

birth_place.zh-cn: 广东省嘉应直隶州雁洋

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元帅，中共元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创建者和缔造者之一。曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央副主席、国防部部长等职，在粉碎“四人帮”事件中起了决定性作用。他提出设立台湾特别行政区的构想，也是凌孜的父亲。
description.en: Marshal of the PRC, played a decisive role in the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。他曾任中国共产党安全和情报部长、中共中央副主席、中央文革小组顾问。作为文化大革命的主要人物和关键支持者之一，他是四人帮集团主犯，并因在文化大革命中的罪行而受到批判。他也是一位书法家。在“反党小说《刘志丹》案”中起主要作用，并曾在北京接见时抨击“4·22”派。死后被认定为林彪、江青反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, criticized for his crimes during the Cultural Revolution.

birth_place.zh-cn: 福建省泉州市惠安县洛阳镇梅岭村

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，曾任毛泽东的政治秘书、中央文革小组组长、中共中央政治局常委。中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物及理论家，原国家级正职领导人。后被划入林彪反革命集团，也是四人帮集团主犯之一。九届二中全会后被隔离审查。
description.en: A member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, political secretary to Mao Zedong, and a principal member of the Gang of Four.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 伟大的无产阶级革命家、政治家，杰出的国务活动家，坚定的马克思主义者，我国社会主义法制的主要奠基人，党和国家的卓越领导人，中共八大元老之一。曾任北京市委第一书记、文化革命五人小组组长，文化大革命初期被打倒。后曾任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、宪法修改委员会副主任委员。阎明复任全国人大常委会副秘书长期间，彭真是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, one of the Eight Elders of the CCP, formerly Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. Peng Zhen was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清四川省顺庆府南充县
birth_place.en: Nanchong County, Shunqing Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 西德巴登-符腾堡州海德堡

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国副国级领导人之一，无产阶级革命家、军事家。曾任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、解放军总参谋长（文革初期被打倒）、中华人民共和国公安部首任部长、国防部副部长等职，被授予中国人民解放军大将军衔。另有记录描述此人为罗瑞卿的第三任妻子。
description.en: One of the sub-national leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a proletarian revolutionary and military strategist. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, Chief of the General Staff of the PLA (purged during the Cultural Revolution), the first Minister of Public Security of the PRC, and Deputy Minister of National Defense. He was awarded the rank of PLA General. Another record describes this person as the third wife of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中宣部部长。文革初期被打倒。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原国家级正职领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中共中央办公厅主任（期间作为阎明复的直接上级，并推荐其出任中共中央统战部部长），文革初期被打倒。历任中华人民共和国主席，中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军委副主席兼秘书长，是中共八大元老之一。他任国家主席、中央军委副主席兼秘书长期间，曾负责部署军队执行戒严；并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former national-level state leader, and high-ranking general of the People's Liberation Army, he was one of the Eight Elders of the CPC. He served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee (during which he was Yan Mingfu's direct superior and later recommended Yan to be the head of the United Front Work Department), and was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution. His career also included serving as President of the People's Republic of China, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission. During his tenure as President and Vice Chairman of the CMC, he was responsible for deploying troops for martial law and demonstrated support for abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝湖南省湘潭县石潭镇

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的杰出领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创建者与领导者之一，军事家、政治家。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地，后于1930年因杀害袁文才、王佐而被迫率部撤离。曾任八路军副总指挥、第一野战军司令员，在朝鲜战争期间担任中国人民志愿军司令员，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一，并在粟裕任总参谋长时任国防部长。1958年曾批判粟裕，后在庐山会议上因批评大跃进而被打倒，最终在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: One of the prominent leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a Marshal of the PRC, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army. He was a military strategist and politician. He participated in establishing the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base, but was later forced to withdraw his troops in 1930 after the killing of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo. He served as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Eighth Route Army, Commander of the First Field Army, and Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War, and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement. He later served as Minister of National Defense when Su Yu was Chief of the General Staff. In 1958, he criticized Su Yu. He was purged during the Lushan Conference for criticizing the Great Leap Forward and subsequently persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国工农红军与中国人民解放军的主要创始人之一，南昌起义领导人之一。他曾指挥红二军团（李达曾协助其指挥），并与任弼时共同指挥红二方面军。曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、中央军事委员会副主席。在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, one of the principal founders of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the People's Liberation Army, and one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising. He commanded the Red Second Army Corps (assisted by Li Da) and later the Second Front Army with Ren Bishi. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，原中共中央政治局常委，曾在广东担任主要领导职务，曾任中央文革小组顾问。在文化大革命中被打倒并迫害致死。
明史学家、中国历史学家，因其剧作《海瑞罢官》在文革初期受到批判，被迫害致死。北京市副市长。
中国近现代小说家、散文家、剧作家，被广泛认为是中国近现代文学的代表人物。在文革初期因不堪迫害而投湖自尽。
中国著名翻译家，在文革初期与夫人一同自尽。

中国共产党和中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人之一。曾任中共中央主席、总书记。文革后，主持平反冤假错案，派出工作组调查广西屠杀事件，积极推动真理标准大讨论、拨乱反正、改革开放并支持废除干部终身制，是改革开放早期的主要领导人之一，被视为改革派代表人物。在担任中共中央总书记期间，阎明复任中共中央统战部部长初期，胡耀邦是其直接上级。1986年，他批示认为党史题材作品不应虚构重大史实，导致小说《刘志丹》再次被停止发行。后因处理八六学潮的方式被党内保守派批评为纵容“资产阶级自由化”，而被迫辞职。其逝世是六四事件的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, one of the second generation of leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. After the Cultural Revolution, he presided over the redress of unjust, false, and wrong cases, dispatched working groups to investigate the Guangxi Massacre, actively promoted the great discussion on the criterion of truth, rectified past errors, and pushed for reform and opening up, supporting the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres. He was one of the main leaders in the early stages of Reform and Opening-up, and was regarded as a representative of reformists. During his tenure as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Yaobang was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan first served as head of the United Front Work Department. In 1986, his instruction that works on Party history should not fictionalize major historical facts led to the novel 'Liu Zhidan' being withdrawn from distribution again. He was later forced to resign due to his handling of the 1986 student demonstrations, which was criticized by party conservatives as condoning 'bourgeois liberalization'. His death was a catalyst for the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人、政治人物，曾任国务院总理和中共中央总书记，被视为中共党内改革派领袖。在胡耀邦辞职后代理中共中央总书记，他通过讲话限制了“反对资产阶级自由化”运动的扩大化，使其在1987年夏天基本结束。文革后支持改革开放，但在六四事件中，因同情学生运动、反对戒严而被免去中共中央总书记职务并被长期软禁。在阎明复任中共中央书记处书记期间，赵紫阳是其直接上级。
description.en: A prominent political figure and former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and was regarded as a reformist leader within the Party. After Hu Yaobang's resignation, he became the acting General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and delivered a speech that curbed the expansion of the 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign', effectively ending it by the summer of 1987. While supporting reform and opening up after the Cultural Revolution, he was dismissed from his post as General Secretary and placed under long-term house arrest for sympathizing with student movements and opposing martial law during the Tiananmen Square incident. He was also Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心人物，自2012年起担任中华人民共和国最高领导人。现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。他被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。他在中共二十大上获得第三任期，并于其任内通过宪法修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制。他于2013年9月和10月首次提出“一带一路”倡议。曾任浙江省人大常委会主任，并于第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国副主席，当时他还担任中央港澳工作协调小组组长。其在全国政协会议期间与梁振英阵营委员的互动被外界解读为对梁振英的支持。2019年，他曾给北京体育大学研究生冠军班回信。他曾是薄熙来在中共十八大前的政治竞争对手，其一些政策被部分学者视为可能导致“文革2.0”。他也是曾被公开信要求辞职的对象。
description.en: Chinese politician and the core figure of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He has served as the supreme leader of the People's Republic of China since 2012, currently holding the titles of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. He secured a third term at the 20th CPC National Congress, and during his tenure, a constitutional amendment was passed to remove the term limit for the presidency. He first proposed the 'Belt and Road' initiative in September and October 2013. He formerly served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress, and was elected as Vice President of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress, at which time he also served as head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs. His interaction with a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp during the National People's Congress was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of support for Leung. In 2019, he wrote a reply letter to the graduate champion class of Beijing Sport University. He was a political rival of Bo Xilai before the 18th CPC National Congress, and some of his policies are considered by certain scholars to potentially lead to a 'Cultural Revolution 2.0'. He was also the target of an open letter demanding his resignation.

en: Member of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党是中华人民共和国的执政党。根据列宁主义，它是领导无产阶级专政的唯一政党。该党在第二次国共内战中取得胜利并建立了中华人民共和国。它曾在井冈山地区建立了其第一个革命根据地，领导敌后战场抗日武装力量，是军统局的主要对手之一。该党也是四一二事件中的主要被清剿对象，曾指示在台湾建立省工作委员会。李达于1932年加入该党，徐发淦、田喜荣、佘孟孝亦是其党员。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China. According to Leninism, it is the only party leading the dictatorship of the proletariat. The party was victorious in the Chinese Civil War, leading to the establishment of the People's Republic of China. It established its first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains area, led anti-Japanese armed forces behind enemy lines, and was a major opponent of the Military Statistics Bureau. Historically, it was a main target of the purge during the April 12th Incident and directed the establishment of the Provincial Work Committee in Taiwan. Li Da joined the party in 1932, Xu Fagan, Tian Xirong, and She Mengxiao are also members.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中国大陆的青年学生组成的群众性组织，以学生为主体，是文革初期冲击社会秩序的主要力量，进行了破四旧、大串联等活动。
description.en: Mass organizations of young students in mainland China during the Cultural Revolution.

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区钓鱼台国宾馆

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的实际指挥机构，取代了中央政治局和中央书记处的部分职能。文化大革命期间设立的中央权力机构，直接指挥文化大革命。
由王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元四人组成的中共党内政治集团，在文化大革命期间形成并掌握重要权力。
description.en: A political faction composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中国各级政权的临时领导机构，通常是在夺权后成立。地区的革命委员会取代了专区行政公署。
description.en: Provisional organs of power at all levels in China during the Cultural Revolution. The prefectural revolutionary committees replaced the special administrative offices.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国在1959年至1961年期间，大跃进后发生的大规模饥荒，导致数千万人非正常死亡，并导致毛泽东退居二线。
description.en: Refers to the widespread famine that occurred in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央召开的扩大的工作会议，总结了大跃进的经验教训。会上刘少奇提出“三分天灾、七分人祸”，加剧了与毛泽东的矛盾。
文革期间，数千万知识青年被派往农村地区进行劳动，接受再教育的政治运动，习近平曾参与其中。

location.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国温都尔汗

description.zh-cn: 1971年9月13日，林彪、叶群等人乘飞机叛逃，飞机在蒙古温都尔汗坠毁，机上人员全部遇难，标志着林彪集团的覆灭。
description.en: On September 13, 1971, Lin Biao, Ye Qun, and others attempted to flee by plane, which subsequently crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, killing everyone on board. This event marked the demise of the Lin Biao group.

description.zh-cn: 群众自发悼念周恩来、抗议四人帮的运动，后被定性为反革命事件。悼念周恩来、反对“四人帮”的群众运动。
1976年10月6日，由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋、中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人策划发动，在北京市中南海怀仁堂拘捕“四人帮”及其在北京的骨干成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event planned by Hua Guofeng, then First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Ye Jianying, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Wang Dongxing, Director of the CCP General Office, to arrest the Gang of Four and their associates.

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，由邓小平等人启动的，中华人民共和国于1978年12月起推行的一项以经济建设为中心，对内改革、对外开放为核心的社会经济政策与运动。这项政策带来的思想解放氛围，也是后来八六学潮发生的宏观背景。
description.en: The economic reform and opening-up policy implemented by the People's Republic of China since December 1978, initiated by Deng Xiaoping and others after the Cultural Revolution. Centered on economic development, internal reform, and external opening, this policy fostered an atmosphere of intellectual liberation, providing the macro context for the 1986 student demonstrations.

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
最高人民法院特别法庭
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques
Special Court of the Supreme People's Court

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青等反革命集团主要成员进行的公开审判。该特别法庭是专门为审判此案而设立的。
民主柬埔寨（红色高棉）时期，由柬埔寨红色高棉政权进行的大规模屠杀事件，受中国文革影响。
法国发生的学生和工人抗议运动，受到中国文革的影响。
全称《中国共产党中央委员会通知》，是指导“文化大革命”的纲领性文件，标志着文革的全面发动。

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央对建国以来若干重大历史问题（包括文化大革命）作出的官方定论文件，全面否定文化大革命，并对毛泽东的功过进行了评价。
description.en: A document that provided the official conclusion on several major historical issues of the CCP since the founding of the PRC, evaluating Mao Zedong's merits and demerits.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家、领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记、苏联部长会议主席，二战期间同盟国“三巨头”之一。在雅尔塔会议上，他承诺对日作战，其领导的苏联出兵对日本的投降决策造成了重要影响。赫鲁晓夫对其的全盘否定是中苏论战和文革的重要背景。他还同意并决定由苏联帮助中国建立中国人民大学。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and a prominent leader of the Soviet Union. As one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders during World War II, he promised at the Yalta Conference to enter the war against Japan, and the subsequent Soviet invasion had a major impact on Japan's decision to surrender.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1927年由中国共产党中央执行委员会改组而来，是中国共产党的最高领导机构。它由中国共产党全国代表大会选举产生中央政治局、中央政治局常务委员会和中央委员会总书记。该机构曾于1979年正式为《刘志丹》案平反，但在1986年又决定停止该书发行。此外，它还于2002年10月批准了神舟五号的飞行方案。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China. It officially rehabilitated the 'Liu Zhidan' case in 1979, but decided to halt the book's distribution again in 1986. Additionally, it approved the flight plan for Shenzhou 5 in October 2002.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东领导的中国共产党在中华人民共和国发动的政治、经济及社会运动，旨在利用国家庞大的人力资源、群众热情和国家力量，通过农业和工业的平行增长，快速实现工业化和集体化，追求脱离现实的“跃进”，迅速将国家从一个以农业为主的经济体转型成为一个现代化的共产主义社会，并试图实现超英赶美的目标。然而，这场运动最终导致了严重的经济困难和大饥荒。魏京生目睹其后果后，对毛泽东产生了极其负面的看法。
description.en: An economic and social movement in the People's Republic of China, initiated by Mao Zedong, aimed at rapidly transforming the country from an agrarian economy into a modern communist society. This was pursued through rapid industrialization and collectivization, utilizing its vast human resources and state power, and seeking an unrealistic 'Great Leap Forward' by achieving parallel growth in agriculture and industry to surpass the UK and US. This campaign ultimately resulted in severe economic difficulties and a great famine. After witnessing its consequences, Wei Jingsheng developed an extremely negative view of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，中国政治家、经济管理家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代和第二代中央领导集体的重要成员。曾任中央人民政府重工业部部长、中纪委第一书记，后任中共中央顾问委员会主任。他以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。在文革中被下放。他是六四事件中的保守派代表人物，曾支持对学生运动采取强硬措施，并曾推荐和保护李锐。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, a Chinese politician and economic administrator, and an important member of the first and second generation central leadership collectives of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Heavy Industry of the Central People's Government and First Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, later becoming Director of the Central Advisory Commission. He supported the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement. During the Cultural Revolution, he was sent down. He was a conservative representative figure during the June Fourth Incident, supporting strong measures against student movements, and also recommended and protected Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: “走资本主义道路的当权派”的简称，是文革中用于攻击党政领导干部的罪名。
指在中国共产党第一代领导集体退下后，于1980年代至1990年代间，在中华人民共和国政治决策中拥有实际最高决策权的八位或更多位中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军元老。
description.en: Refers to the eight veteran members of the Communist Party of China who held actual decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东思想理论体系，是中国共产党的指导思想之一，以毛泽东的名字命名。它以毛泽东为主要代表的中国共产党人，根据马克思列宁主义的基本原理，将中国长期革命和建设实践中的经验作了理论概括而形成的。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在广西壮族自治区发生的一系列系统性大屠杀，并伴有食人事件。
description.en: A series of systematic massacres that occurred in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution, accompanied by incidents of cannibalism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中国革命家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。他曾任国务院副总理、外交部部长、上海市市长。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。在“二月逆流”中反对文革。长期担任粟裕的直接领导和政治搭档。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a revolutionary, military commander, and diplomat, and one of the Ten Marshals of the PRC. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家，中国人民解放军高级将领，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任国务院副总理，为原国家级副职领导人。其在“二月逆流”中反对文革。
中华人民共和国于1955年授予建国元勋的最高军衔。

习仲勋是中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，陕甘边区革命根据地的主要创建者和领导者之一。他也是中共八大元老之一，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。曾任西北野战军副政委、国务院副总理。在1962年，他因审阅小说《刘志丹》手稿并提出修改意见，被打成“习贾刘反党集团”核心成员，遭受长期审查、关押和迫害。他还曾任中共广东省委第一书记，并向中央建议在深圳等地建立“贸易合作区”。他是习近平之父。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was a prominent political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He was one of the main founders and leaders of the Shaan-Gan Border Revolutionary Base Area, and later served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Northwest Field Army and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was also one of the Eight Elders of the CPC, notably supporting the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement. In 1962, he faced severe persecution, being labeled a core member of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique' after reviewing and providing suggestions for the novel 'Liu Zhidan,' leading to long-term investigation, detention, and persecution. Post-Cultural Revolution, he served as the First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, where he famously proposed establishing 'trade cooperation zones' in Shenzhen and other areas. He is the father of current Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiang Village, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元勋，原副国级领导人，邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一、二、三代主要领导人之一。曾任国务院副总理、中共中央顾问委员会副主任。在文化大革命中被打倒监禁。曾就读山西省立国民师范学校。他是薄熙来之父，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。该人物还有一位二女，其生卒年为1946年至2019年11月24日，以及一位三子，生于1951年，和一位四子。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a founding father of the People's Republic of China, a former Vice Premier of the State Council, and a former deputy national leader. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's administration and one of the main leaders of the first, second, and third generations of the CCP and PRC. He was also imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution and studied at Shanxi Provincial National Normal School. He was the father of Bo Xilai and supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement. This individual also had a second daughter, who lived from 1946 to November 24, 2019, a third son, born in 1951, and a fourth son.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国，通称中国，简称中国，是位于东亚的社会主义国家，成立于1949年。由中国共产党执政，拥有香港主权，是金砖国家创始成员国。曾派遣中国人民志愿军参与朝鲜战争，是停战谈判重要一方。作为神舟五号任务执行国，成为世界上第三个独立掌握载人航天技术的国家。田中角荣于1972年访问并建立外交关系。艾未未、赵津芳、田喜荣、王皓、孟玉珍是其国民，艾未未因批评政府而受压制。因网络审查，Google于2010年将搜索服务移出中国大陆。朱德曾任副主席，并曾与越南发生战争，也被指控向俄罗斯提供经济支持和武器零组件。
description.en: The People's Republic of China, commonly known as China, is a socialist country in East Asia, founded in 1949. Governed by the Chinese Communist Party, it holds sovereignty over Hong Kong and is a founding member of BRICS. It dispatched the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War, being a key party in armistice negotiations. As the executor of the Shenzhou 5 mission, it became the third nation to independently master human spaceflight technology. Kakuei Tanaka visited and established diplomatic relations in 1972. Ai Weiwei, Zhao Jinfang, Tian Xirong, Wang Hao, and Meng Yuzhen are its nationals; Ai Weiwei has been suppressed for criticizing its government. Due to internet censorship, Google moved its search services out of mainland China in 2010. Zhu De served as Vice Chairman. It also engaged in war with Vietnam and is accused of providing economic support and weapon components to Russia.

location.zh-cn: 中国大陆及台湾海峡沿岸岛屿

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间为争夺中国执政权而爆发的内战，亦称第二次国共内战，是国共内战的第二个阶段。该内战始于1945年抗日战争结束，至1949年12月以中国共产党取得决定性胜利、中华人民共和国成立告终。在此期间，中国共产党在其控制的“解放区”内已开始推行土地改革。石双琪曾率民兵团支援前线参与此战争。
description.en: The Chinese Civil War, also known as the Second Chinese Civil War, was a conflict fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China for control of China. It was the second phase of the war, commencing in 1945 after the end of the Second Sino-Japanese War and concluding around December 1949 with the decisive victory of the Chinese Communist Party and the establishment of the People's Republic of China. During this period, the CCP had already begun implementing land reform in the 'liberated areas' under its control. Shi Shuangqi participated in this war by leading a militia regiment to support the front lines.

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月中旬开始，由高校学生发起，持续近两个月的学生民主示威运动。广义上指波及中华人民共和国全境的示威活动；狭义上特指发生在北京天安门广场的学生示威运动及随后的清场行动，最终以6月4日凌晨的武力清场告终。八六学潮被认为是其前奏，为该事件埋下伏笔。阎明复因在此事件中的表现而被免去中共中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: A series of student-led pro-democracy demonstrations in China in 1989, primarily held in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, which ended with a military crackdown. The 1986 student demonstrations are considered a precursor that set the stage for this event. This political event led to Yan Mingfu's dismissal from his post as secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and other positions due to his actions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在中共二十届一中全会后成为排名第二的中共中央政治局常委。曾任中共上海市委书记、浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、中共中央政治局常委，曾任中共中央纪委书记、中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区人民大会堂

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关和国家立法机关，负责选举和罢免最高人民法院院长。
1919年5月4日发生于中国北京的爱国运动。这场以青年学生为主体，并有广大公民、市民和工商人士等中下阶层广泛参与的反帝、反封建运动，其形式包括示威、请愿、罢课、罢工、暴力对抗政府等。该运动因巴黎和会山东问题而爆发，对中国近代史影响深远。在文化上，它推动了新文化运动，使西学的接受从器物和制度层面深入到思想文化层面，甚至出现了“全盘西化”的主张。
description.en: An anti-imperialist, anti-feudal, patriotic movement in China in 1919. Culturally, it advanced the New Culture Movement, deepening the reception of Western learning from the material and institutional levels to the ideological and cultural levels, even leading to calls for 'total Westernization'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间建立的政权。
中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期的主要武装力量，前身为中国工农红军、八路军和新四军。后改编为中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。曾计划进攻台湾，但因朝鲜战争爆发而被迫放弃，并曾执行六四戒严和清场任务。
description.en: The main armed force of the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Chinese Civil War, formerly known as the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, Eighth Route Army, and New Fourth Army. It was later reorganized into the primary armed force of the People's Republic of China. It had planned to attack Taiwan but was forced to abandon the plan due to the outbreak of the Korean War, and carried out the June Fourth martial law and clearing operations.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，它是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国（朝鲜）与大韩民国（韩国）之间的军事冲突。一方为朝鲜、中国人民志愿军，另一方为韩国、美国领导的联合国军。作为冷战时期的一场区域性冲突，它也导致美国介入台湾海峡，阻止了解放军攻台计划。战争最终以《朝鲜停战协定》的签署而告终，但未签订和平条约。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953. It was a military conflict between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (North Korea) and the Republic of Korea (South Korea). On one side were North Korea and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army (China), and on the other were South Korea and a United Nations force led by the United States. As a regional conflict during the Cold War, it also led to U.S. intervention in the Taiwan Strait, preventing the PLA's plan to invade Taiwan. The war ended with the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, but no peace treaty was signed.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的国际组织，二战后成立，旨在促进国际合作和防止未来冲突。罗斯福是其关键推动者。其大会多次通过决议谴责俄罗斯的入侵行为。
description.en: An international organization founded after World War II, with Roosevelt as a key driving force. Its General Assembly has passed multiple resolutions condemning Russia's invasion.

description.zh-cn: 1992年1月至2月，邓小平对中国南方城市，包括武昌、深圳、珠海、上海等地进行了巡视，并发表了一系列重要讲话（即南方谈话）。这些讲话对推动改革开放有重要意义，不仅重新启动了因六四事件而停滞的改革开放进程，也深化了改革开放。
负责监管国家之间贸易规则，并监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛是中华人民共和国第四代主要领导人、中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心人物。他曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是习近平的前任，被视为李克强的政治导师。在任中共中央总书记、国家主席期间，他曾亲临神舟五号发射现场观看发射过程，并在航天员出征仪式上发表讲话，并为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。他作为时任中共中央总书记，主持了决定对陈良宇进行立案调查的中央政治局会议。2012年卸任所有党政军职务实现“裸退”，此举被认为是完善废除干部领导职务终身制的表现。薄熙来曾对其进行窃听，在薄熙来事件中，胡锦涛是处理该事件的主要决策者之一。
description.en: Hu Jintao was the former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and the core figure of the fourth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He was Xi Jinping's predecessor and was regarded as Li Keqiang's political mentor. While serving as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President, he personally watched the launch of Shenzhou 5 on-site, delivered a speech at the astronaut's departure ceremony, and administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government. As the then General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, he presided over the Politburo meeting that decided to launch an investigation into Chen Liangyu. In 2012, he implemented a 'naked retirement' by relinquishing all party, government, and military positions, a move seen as perfecting the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres. Bo Xilai conducted surveillance on him, and during the Bo Xilai incident, Hu was one of the key decision-makers in handling the case.

birth_place.zh-cn: 天津市北辰区宜兴埠镇

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。他曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命，并曾签署任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官的国务院令。他还曾担任抗震救灾总指挥。在总理任内，他曾与杨利伟成功返回后与其通话表示祝贺。此外，他曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共第十六、十七届中央政治局常委。他是温云松的父亲。据报道，他曾反对薄熙来晋升，并在薄熙来事件中公开要求重庆反思。他曾于2018年探望阎明复。据称曾被陈良宇顶撞。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He was appointed as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress, and signed the State Council order appointing Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong. He also served as the commander-in-chief for earthquake relief. During his tenure as Premier, he spoke with Yang Liwei after his successful return to congratulate him. He also served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and a member of the Standing Committee of the 16th and 17th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee. He is the father of Wen Yunsong. He reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion and publicly called for Chongqing to reflect on the incident during Bo's downfall. He visited Yan Mingfu in 2018. Reportedly confronted by Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 李克强是中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院总理，原正国级领导人。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。他曾是薄熙来在中共十八大前的政治竞争对手，并主持二十大开幕会。在任国务院总理期间，他曾在亚洲和欧洲访问时推广“一带一路”倡议，并曾在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后致函祝贺。在记者会上被问及《穹顶之下》时，他回避了直接评价。
description.en: Li Keqiang was a political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, formerly a national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. During the 11th National People's Congress, he was appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He was a political rival of Bo Xilai before the 18th National Congress of the CPC and presided over the opening ceremony of the 20th National Congress. During his tenure as Premier, he promoted the 'Belt and Road' initiative during visits to Asia and Europe, and also sent a letter of congratulations after Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize. When asked about 'Under the Dome' at a press conference, he avoided a direct comment.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府于2013年倡议并主导的国际经济合作倡议（由习近平提出），旨在加强区域互联互通，并形成跨国经济带。

zh-cn: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国倡议设立的多边开发银行，为“一带一路”等亚洲基建项目提供资金。
由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）所引发的全球大流行疫情。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国为应对2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）大流行而采取的严格公共卫生防控政策。
description.en: A public health policy adopted by the Chinese government in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 一个横跨东欧和北亚的联邦共和国，是与中国接壤的北邻国家，也是苏联的主要继承国，继承了其航天能力。该国是金砖国家创始成员国，与北约东扩存在持续紧张关系，并于2022年2月24日全面入侵乌克兰。
description.en: A federal republic spanning Eastern Europe and Northern Asia, it is a northern neighbor bordering China and the main successor of the Soviet Union, having inherited its space capabilities. The country is a founding member of BRICS, experiences persistent tensions with NATO expansion, and launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine on February 24, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国，实行总统制。作为世界主要大国，它是第二次世界大战同盟国主要成员，二战期间苏联的盟国之一。汪精卫国民政府曾于1943年对其宣战。它对日本使用原子弹并主导战后占领。作为苏联冷战主要对手，它在朝鲜战争中领导联合国军，是停战谈判和《朝鲜停战协定》主要参与方。苏联解体后成为世界唯一超级大国，也是第二个实现载人航天的国家。它与中国有复杂的竞合关系：曾支持直系军阀、国民党和南越。对“一带一路”倡议持批评态度，指责其为“债务陷阱外交”并推出竞争性基建计划。同时，它还是乌克兰的主要军事援助国之一。李洪志于1998年起定居于此，第四代仓颉输入法于1985年在此发表。
description.en: A federal republic in North America, operating under a presidential system. As a major world power and a principal member of the Allied powers in World War II, it was an ally of the Soviet Union during the war. The Wang Jingwei regime declared war on it in 1943. It used atomic bombs against Japan and led the post-war occupation. As the Soviet Union's main rival in the Cold War, it led the UN Command in the Korean War, playing a key role in armistice negotiations. After the Soviet collapse, it became the sole superpower and the second country to achieve human spaceflight. Its relationship with China is complex: it supported the Zhili clique, Kuomintang, and South Vietnam. It criticizes the 'Belt and Road' initiative as 'debt trap diplomacy,' launching competing infrastructure plans. It is also a major military aid provider to Ukraine. Li Hongzhi has resided here since 1998, and the fourth generation of Cangjie input method was released here in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 由中国、俄罗斯等国发起的欧亚政治、经济和安全组织。
由巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国、南非等新兴市场国家组成的合作机制，是世界经济增长的主要动力之一。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
中华人民共和国宪法（八二宪法）
en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China (1982)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，也被称为“八二宪法”，是现行宪法。该宪法的颁行加强了民族区域自治制度的建设，其第三十一条规定了设立特别行政区的法律依据。它还规定了国家主席等领导职务的任期制，正式从法律上废除了领导干部职务终身制，并规定实行初等义务教育。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, also known as the '82 Constitution', is the current constitution. It stipulated term limits for leading positions such as the President, formally abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres in law, and also stipulates the implementation of compulsory primary education.

en: Constituent departments of the State Council
Constituent Department of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 国务院组成部门是中华人民共和国国务院的组成机构类别，属于职能机构分类，承担国务院的基本行政管理职能。
description.en: The constituent departments of the State Council are a category of constituent bodies of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, belonging to a classification of functional bodies, and undertaking the basic administrative functions of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、前领导人，曾任国务院副总理（原国家级副职领导人），也是一位农业政策专家。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、重工业部部长。在文化大革命中受冲击。
description.en: A politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, formerly a national-level leader. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Minister of Heavy Industry, and was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共上海市委第一书记、上海市市长、国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国高级领导人，中华人民共和国开国上将。文化大革命期间的重要人物，曾任北京市革委会主任、公安部部长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国务院副总理。
曾任国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军开国上将，中共八大元老之一。曾担任中华人民共和国副主席，接替乌兰夫。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Ulanhu as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、革命家和政治家。曾任国防部部长，曾是许世友的上级。
中共元老，中华人民共和国政治家、外交家、军事家。曾任国务院副总理、国防部部长，习近平早期的上司。
description.en: CCP veteran, former Vice Premier and Minister of Defense, Xi Jinping's early superior.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林是党和国家的优秀领导人、杰出的无产阶级革命家、我国经济工作的卓越领导人。他曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、中共中央办公厅主任，并被认为是保守派人物。
中华人民共和国政治人物、外交家。
description.en: A politician and diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，中共党内改革派代表人物。他在改革开放初期在安徽推行农村改革，曾任国务院副总理、第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A former top-level leader of the CPC and PRC, one of the Eight Elders, and a key reformist. He initiated rural reforms in Anhui during the early reform era, served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 7th National People's Congress, and supported the abolition of lifelong tenure through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将。曾任国防部部长，并指挥一江山岛战役。他也是联名签署反对武力镇压学生示威抗议信的七名退役将军之一。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who commanded the Yijiangshan Islands Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, holding a rank equivalent to a vice-premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，周恩来义子。曾任国务院总理、全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委。他曾于六四事件期间宣布戒严令，被认为是中共党内保守派的代表人物。他也是育才学校校友。阎明复任民政部副部长期间，李鹏是时任总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, foster son of Zhou Enlai. He served as the fourth Premier of the People's Republic of China and the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He declared martial law during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989 and was considered a representative figure of the conservative faction within the CCP. He was also an alumnus of Yucai School. Li Peng was the incumbent Premier when Yan Mingfu served as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央组织部部长。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委、上海市市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 李维汉与金维映之子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物、军事领导人，中国人民解放军上将（1988年授予），曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。秦天与秦卫江之父。
description.en: A political figure and military leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a General of the People's Liberation Army (awarded in 1988), former Minister of National Defense of the PRC. Father of Qin Tian and Qin Weijiang.

description.zh-cn: 原中共北京市委书记，后因贪腐案下台。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、对外贸易经济合作部部长、天津市副市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former national-level principal leader, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and Vice Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、上海市委书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China and a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部部长，时任解放军总参谋长，参与指挥戒严部队。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，有“中国铁娘子”之称。曾接替李岚清任对外经济贸易部部长，并担任过国务院副总理、国务委员、卫生部部长等职。据报道，她与薄熙来交恶，并阻止其接任副总理职位。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Deputy State Leader, known as the "Iron Lady of China." She succeeded Li Lanqing as Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and also served as Vice Premier of the State Council, State Councilor, and Minister of Health. She reportedly had a poor relationship with Bo Xilai and blocked his succession to the Vice Premier position.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、国务院副总理、中共中央政治局常委。其患病离职为中纪委调查上海社保案提供了契机。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo. His illness and departure from office provided an opportunity for the CCDI to investigate the Shanghai social security case.

description.zh-cn: 回族，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共安徽省委书记。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。他因腐败问题在反腐运动中落马，被判无期徒刑。在本案中，曾作出批示，要求正确引导舆论，被指意图掩盖政府干预司法的事实。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. He fell during the anti-corruption campaign due to corruption and was sentenced to life imprisonment. In a specific case, he issued an instruction to 'correctly guide public opinion,' which was seen as an attempt to cover up government interference in the judiciary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将。曾任国防部部长、中央军委副主席，在神舟五号飞行期间与航天员杨利伟进行了“天地对话”。
description.en: Then Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission and Minister of National Defense, who conducted a 'space-to-ground call' with astronaut Yang Liwei during the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理，并在薄熙来被免职后接任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、北京市市长、中共中央纪律检查委员会书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly a national-level leader, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Mayor of Beijing, and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC. He was also appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: A female Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部部长。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员和中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a State Councilor and a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委副书记，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人，曾任中共第十八届中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（并担任推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组首任组长），以及中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Vice Premier of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族，原中共中央书记处书记，陈希的前任国家行政学院院长。
中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、国务委员、中华人民共和国外交部部长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician of the Communist Party of China, who has served as a member of the Politburo, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, State Councilor, and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政法委书记，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and was Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、代理市委书记（接替陈良宇），后任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（接替张高丽），现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任第十四届全国政协副主席、党组副书记。
中国人民解放军火箭军上将，曾任第二炮兵部队司令员、火箭军首任司令员、国防部部长。
中国政治人物、高级外交官，副国级领导人。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共中央外事工作委员会办公室主任，曾任外交部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician and senior diplomat, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, who previously served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国公安部部长，国务委员，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（排名第一）。曾任中共中央办公厅主任（蔡奇的前任）。
中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、中央财经委员会办公室主任、中央金融委员会办公室主任、中央金融工作委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Premier of the State Council.

birth_place.zh-cn: 河南省信阳专区罗山县
birth_place.en: Luoshan County, Xinyang Prefecture, Henan Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、国务院安全生产委员会主任。曾任重庆市市长，是唐良智的前任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a sub-national level party and state leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the Work Safety Committee of the State Council. He previously served as Mayor of Chongqing, being Tang Liangzhi's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中华人民共和国陆军上将，曾任中华人民共和国第十三任国防部部长。
中国政治人物，中共中央书记处书记，副国级领导人。曾任傅政华的继任公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's successor as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 白族
中国共产党、中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物。曾任外交部部长、国务委员，原副国级领导人。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责履行国防职能的组成部门。中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的军事工作机关之一。
中国人民解放军海军上将，现任国防部部长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部部长

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部的首长职位
中国军方举办军事外交活动和礼仪活动的场所

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国人民革命军事委员会
中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China
Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会，通称中央军事委员会，简称中央军委、军委，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量最高军事领导机构的总称，包括中国共产党中央军事委员会、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会两个机构。受中国共产党中央委员会和全国人民代表大会领导。在土地革命战争后期、抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，它是中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。——机构沿革：1926年11月上旬，为准备上海工人武装起义，中共中央决定将中央军事部改为中央军事委员会兼上海区军事委员会，周恩来任书记。1927年5月25日召开的中共中央政治局常委会将中央军事委员会改称中央军人部（仍习惯性称中央军事部）。1930年2月，军事部与军委合二为一。1931年11月25日，设中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会、负责红军作战和建设。仍设中央军事委员会。1937年7月，中革军委与中央军委改组中共中央革命军事委员会。1945年8月，新成立中央军事委员会。1949年，改称中国人民革命军事委员会，作为中华人民共和国成立初期的最高军事领导机构。1954年9月28日，通过首部宪法，设中共中央军事委员会。1982年12月4日，通过八二宪法，成立中华人民共和国中央军事委员会。此后，中共中央军委和国家中央军委的组成人员基本相同，实际上是“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: The supreme military leading body in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任国防部副部长、总参谋长、中纪委常务书记，因在庐山会议支持彭德怀被打成反党集团成员。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海军大将，曾任国防部副部长
中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任国防部副部长。他曾与任弼时率领红六军团西征，并担任参谋长。
description.en: A founding general of the PLA. He, along with Ren Bishi, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, during which Li Da served as Chief of Staff.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army
People's Liberation Army General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥机关，负责组织领导全国武装力量的军事建设和作战指挥，并曾是中央军事委员会的军事工作机关。
description.en: Formerly the highest military command organ of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, responsible for organizing and leading the military construction and combat command of the national armed forces.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军负责军队政治工作的最高领导机关，也是中国工农红军的政治工作领导机关。后重组为中央军事委员会政治工作部。
description.en: The former highest leading organ for political work in the People's Liberation Army, later reorganized into the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要领导人之一、高级将领，无产阶级革命家、军事家。他是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的重要政治和军事人物，曾任副国级领导人。1955年被授予大将军衔，位列开国十位大将之首，并曾担任总参谋长、国防部副部长。在豫东战役和徐蚌会战中担任华东野战军主要指挥官。1958年，在军委扩大会议上受到彭德怀等人的批判。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army and a key commander of the East China Field Army during the Eastern Henan and Huaihai Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党中央委员会在庐山召开的中共中央政治局扩大会议和八届八中全会。会议后期，彭德怀等人因对“大跃进”提出批评而遭到批判，并随后发起了“反右倾”斗争，此事件也被定性为一场政治案件。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo and the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee held by the CPC Central Committee in Lushan in 1959. During the later stage of the meeting, Peng Dehuai and others were criticized for their criticism of the Great Leap Forward, subsequently leading to the "Anti-Rightist" struggle and its designation as a political case.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是宋希濂的同乡和同学，并介绍宋希濂加入中国共产党。曾任国防部副部长，军事工程学院首任院长。此外，他还曾佐证康生叛变。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, a fellow townsman and classmate of Song Xilian, who introduced Song to the Chinese Communist Party. He also served as Vice Minister of National Defense and the first president of the Military Engineering Academy, and testified to Kang Sheng's defection.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事将领、中华人民共和国开国上将，曾任国防部副部长、南京军区司令员，原副国级领导人。
中国人民解放军开国上将，首任空军司令员，曾任国防部副部长
中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部副部长
1979年中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发的短暂边境战争，其起因是越南入侵柬埔寨及边境争端。
description.en: A brief border war fought in 1979 between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, sparked by Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的参谋机关

en: National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的国防动员机关

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商制度下的统一战线组织，是中国特色协商民主的主要载体和实践形式。它是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式和多党合作、政治协商的重要机构。巩俐曾任第九、第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation. Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，在国共内战后期与中国共产党合作。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, which cooperated with the Communist Party of China in the late stage of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国除中国共产党以外的八个参政党的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China other than the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中国民主党派，中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中华人民共和国民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 由国民党左派邓演达、陈友仁、宋庆龄等发起组织的政党，是中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中国国民党民主派的政治组织，后并入中国国民党革命委员会。中国国民党革命委员会的前身之一。
中国民主党派之一，是中国革命统一战线的一员。
中国共产党领导的全国性工会组织，也是中国大陆所有地方总工会和产业工会的领导机关。
description.en: The national trade union federation of the People's Republic of China, led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主革命家、教育家、政治活动家。中国民主同盟的创建者和领导者之一。中华人民共和国开国副主席。
中国政治家，中国农工民主党创始人和领导人之一。
中国教育家、实业家、政治家。

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省安福修梅镇凉水井村

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人，中共五老之一。
中国教育家、经济学家、人口学家，计划生育理论的主要倡导者，曾任浙江大学校长。
中国文学家、历史学家、古文字学家、考古学家、社会活动家、政治人物。曾任中国科学院院长、中国科学技术大学首任校长、中国史学会主席，并为电子科技大学前身“成都电讯工程学院”题写校名。曾在育才学校讲学。在文革初期曾赞扬江青，后又批判。
description.en: Chinese writer, political figure and historian, who served as the chairman of the Chinese Historical Association and lectured at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，中华民国和中华人民共和国政治人物，中共建政前曾任中国共产党实际最高领导人。
中国军事家、政治家。国民革命军第十九路军将领。
著名华侨实业家、慈善家、教育家、社会活动家。他是一名马来亚爱国华侨，创立了厦门大学，并组织南侨机工支援抗战。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、重要政治人物，曾任副国级领导人。他也是中国共产党内主管民族工作的领导人，并曾就民族区域自治制度向毛泽东提供咨询。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国庆节
en: National Day of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国庆日。
中华民国军事家、政治家，曾任中华民国副总统，指挥台儿庄战役，并在蒋中正下野后任代总统，后被监察院弹劾。
description.en: A prominent Guangxi warlord and Kuomintang military commander who served as Vice President of the Republic of China and was later impeached by the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1947年台湾发生的官民冲突事件，亦称反政府暴动。最终国民政府派遣军队武力镇压，造成大量民众死伤。事件中，中共台湾省工委部分成员曾参与武装反抗，傅兆林更亲身经历了高雄地区的镇压。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan in 1947. Some members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee participated in armed resistance, and Fu Zhaolin personally experienced the suppression in the Kaohsiung area.

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会（中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关常设机关）的领导职务。
description.en: The leader of the permanent body of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）
en: 2018 amendment to the Constitution of China
Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China (2018)

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月11日，第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议以2958票赞成、2票反对、3票弃权表决通过《宪法修正案》。该修正案取消了《中华人民共和国宪法》中关于国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定，并将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: This constitutional amendment removed the provision from the Constitution of the People's Republic of China that the President and Vice President 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms', and also wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年期间（土地革命战争时期，又称第二次国内革命战争时期）领导的武装力量，也是中国人民解放军的前身。该武装力量参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937, during the Agrarian Revolutionary War (also known as the Second Revolutionary Civil War). They were the predecessors of the People's Liberation Army and participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

location.zh-cn: 北京市石景山区高井甲32号

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战军种，是中华人民共和国的陆上武装力量，也是中国人民解放军的第一军种和主体力量。
中国人民解放军的海上作战军种
中国人民解放军的空中作战军种，也是中华人民共和国的正规空中武装力量和中国人民解放军的第三军种。杨利伟曾在此服役担任歼击机飞行员。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army. Yang Liwei served as a fighter pilot in this force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区清河街道

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战略导弹部队，其前身为战略性独立兵种。该部队是第四军种，由中央军事委员会直接领导指挥，担负常规导弹目标打击和核打击及核子反击导弹战略作战等任务。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队
中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事航天部队，是中国人民解放军战略支援部队下属机构。
description.en: A military aerospace force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, operating as a subordinate department of the PLA Strategic Support Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的网络空间部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Information Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的信息支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队
en: People's Liberation Army Joint Logistics Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的联勤保障部队
中国人民解放军上将，曾任中共上海市委常委，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
中央军委委员、中央军委联合参谋部参谋长
中央军委委员、中央军委纪委书记
发生在越南民主共和国（北越）与越南共和国（南越）及其盟友之间的一场长期战争。这场战争发生于20世纪中叶，期间北越军队曾因疟疾问题向中国求助，促成了523项目的启动，并引发了伯克利学生的大规模反战运动。
description.en: A prolonged war fought between the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) and the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam) and their respective allies. This conflict, which occurred in the mid-20th century, saw North Vietnamese forces seek Chinese assistance for their malaria problem, leading to the initiation of Project 523, and also prompted large-scale anti-war movements by Berkeley students.

en: Second Taiwan Strait Crisis artillery duel

description.zh-cn: 第二次台湾海峡危机的主要军事行动，解放军对金门进行了大规模炮击。
description.en: The main military action of the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, in which the PLA conducted a massive artillery bombardment of Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期由中国共产党领导的武装力量之一，由南方八省红军和游击队改编而成。
description.en: One of the armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国东北地区创建的抗日武装
1936年12月12日，张学良、杨虎城在西安发动“兵谏”（亦称军事政变），扣留了时任国民政府军事委员会委员长的蒋中正，要求停止内战、一致抗日。此次事件促成了第二次国共合作，并结束了第一次国共内战。
description.en: On December 12, 1936, Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng launched a 'remonstrance by military force' (also known as a military coup) in Xi'an, detaining Chiang Kai-shek, the head of the Nationalist government's Military Affairs Commission. They demanded an end to the civil war and a united front against Japan. This event led to the Second United Front and ended the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 指冷战期间中华人民共和国和苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟发生的外交、军事关系上的疏远甚至对峙冲突，分歧同时覆盖国家利益和意识形态层面。两国关系最终破裂，其中大跃进是导致关系恶化的重要因素之一。
description.en: Refers to the deterioration of political and ideological relations between the People's Republic of China and the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics during the Cold War.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 已撤销的中国人民解放军军种
对马克思主义和列宁主义的统称，是中国共产党的第一个官方意识形态，也是其指导思想之一。

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央总书记习近平提出并创立的中国特色社会主义理论，是中国共产党的指导思想。其核心内容被概括为“十个明确”、“十四个坚持”和“十三个方面成就”。该理论于2017年中共十九大写入党章，并于2018年写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: The theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, primarily founded by Xi Jinping (then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), serves as the guiding ideology of the Communist Party of China. Its core content is summarized as 'Ten Clarifications,' 'Fourteen Adherences,' and 'Thirteen Aspects of Achievements'. It was written into the Party Constitution at the 19th Party Congress in 2017, and into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China in 2018.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区

北部战区司令员, 中部战区司令员
首任中国人民解放军陆军司令员

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军驻吉布提保障基地
en: People's Liberation Army Support Base in Djibouti

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在海外的第一个军事基地

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届国家最高权力机关

中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，全国人大常委会副委员长，副国级党和国家领导人。
中国作家、政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长。出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国政治人物，曾任江西省人民政府省长，全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中央统战部部长。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（接替陈吉宁）、中共中央组织部部长（继任陈希）。
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会会议的年度例行统称。例如，《穹顶之下》在2015年两会前夕发布，引发了与会代表和委员的热议；此外，2016年两会期间，要求习近平辞职的公开信发表，被视为敏感事件。
description.en: The collective term for the annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) of the People's Republic of China. For instance, 'Under the Dome' was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions, sparking heated discussions among delegates and members; additionally, the open letter demanding Xi Jinping's resignation was published during the 2016 Two Sessions, making it a sensitive event.

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街街道

description.zh-cn: 位于中南海，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国国务院所在地，中共中央政治局的办公地点之一。它是中华人民共和国国务院、中共中央书记处和中共中央办公厅等重要机关的办公所在地，亦是中国部分党和国家领导人的居所。此外，这里也是光绪帝被长期软禁并最终逝世的地点。
中国革命家、政治家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创始人和早期领导人之一，中华人民共和国开国元勋。他曾担任中国共产党和中华人民共和国的法官及政治人物，并曾任中华人民共和国代主席，与宋庆龄共同担任国家副主席。他被誉为“延安五老”之一，是董良翚之父。
description.en: One of the founders and early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the father of Dong Lianghui.

birth_place.zh-cn: 上海公共租界东有恒路628号C

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、社会活动家、孙中山遗孀，中华人民共和国名誉主席。
中国共产党内的理论家和政治家，曾任毛泽东秘书、中共中央政治局委员。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2012年11月8日至14日在北京召开的第十八次全国代表大会。
description.en: The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, held in Beijing from November 8 to 14, 2012.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
中华人民共和国国家监察机关
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，负责审理陕西千亿矿权案的二审和终审。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in the People's Republic of China, responsible for the second instance and final adjudication of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北河沿大街147号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高检察机关和最高法律监督机关。设有中共中央纪委、国家监委派驻的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The highest legal supervision organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物
中国大陆政治及国际关系学者、网络名人、电视人。现任复旦大学中国研究院院长、特聘教授，国家高端智库理事会理事，上海春秋发展战略研究院高级研究员。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and international relations scholar, internet celebrity, and television personality. He is the Director of the China Institute of Fudan University and a distinguished professor, a council member of the national high-end think tanks, and a senior research fellow at the Shanghai Chunqiu Institute for Development and Strategic Studies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国共产党与中国工农红军主要领导者之一，中共五大书记之一。他曾与萧克率领红六军团西征，李达时任参谋长。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China. He, along with Xiao Ke, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, during which Li Da served as Chief of Staff.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常委会
中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导机构，也是中国共产党的最高权力常设机关。由7名成员组成，它是中国共产党中央委员会的核心领导层、中央政治局的常设机构，并实际作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导及决策机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the permanent body of its highest authority. Composed of 7 members, it is the de facto top leadership and decision-making body of the CPC and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代思想家、政治家、革命家，新文化运动的主要开创人和领袖之一，中国共产党主要创始人之一，并曾担任中国共产党首任总书记。他也是民国初年反对将孔教立为国教的主要力量之一。在其任期内，于四一二事件中被南京国民政府列为首要通缉犯。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, a key figure and one of the initiators of the New Culture Movement. He was a main founder and the first General Secretary of the Communist Party of China. He was also one of the leading opponents of establishing Confucianism as the state religion in the early Republic of China. During his tenure, he was listed as a primary wanted criminal by the Nanjing Nationalist Government following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军创始人之一，中国共产党早期主要领导人。后脱党，后因与中央分裂而被开除党籍。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Liberation Army, and an early leader of the CCP.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Chinese Communist Party
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CCP
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领袖之一，曾两度担任中国共产党实际最高领导人。中国社会主义革命家、作家、诗人、翻译家、文学评论家。1935年被国民党逮捕，后在福建长汀被宋希濂奉命枪决。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, arrested by the KMT in 1935 and later executed by order in Changting, Fujian, by Song Xilian's troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，对外工作的开拓者之一。

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的伟大的无产阶级革命家、军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，南昌起义领导人之一，中国人民解放军的创始人和缔造者之一。时任中央军委战略小组组长，与邓小平在战争时期长期搭档。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military commander and politician, one of the Marshals of the People's Republic of China, one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army. He was a long-term partner of Deng Xiaoping during the war period.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期“三大战役”之一，由中国人民解放军华东野战军、中原野战军在以徐州为中心，东起海州，西至商丘，北起临城，南达淮河的广大地区，对中华民国国军发动的战略性进攻战役。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the second Chinese Civil War, a strategic offensive launched by the People's Liberation Army's East China Field Army and Central Plains Field Army against the Republic of China Army.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Communist Party of China
Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的重要领导机构之一，是其常设机构。在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。其组成人员是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的党和国家领导人。该机构曾作出对陈良宇立案调查的决定。
description.en: One of the central leadership bodies and a standing institution of the Chinese Communist Party. It exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when the plenary session of the Central Committee is not in session. Its members are party and state leaders of the CCP and the People's Republic of China. This body once made the decision to investigate Chen Liangyu.

en: West Route Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 1936年10月由中国工农红军红四方面军主力2.18万人，在甘肃靖远西渡黄河后，称河西部队，后改称西路军。
description.en: Formed in October 1936 by the main force of the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army after crossing the Yellow River, it was tasked with establishing a base in Hexi and opening a route to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期四川地方军队的称谓，朱德曾在此进行动员工作

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝河南省陈州府项城县袁张营
birth_place.en: Yuanzhangying, Xiangcheng, Chenzhou, Henan, Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初的军事家、政治家，北洋军的创始者与领导者，也是北洋军阀的奠基人。曾逼迫清帝溥仪退位，后任中华民国临时大总统及第一任正式大总统，并意图建立中华帝国但未能正式登基。在山东巡抚任上，他上奏创办山东大学堂。他被广泛认为是刺杀宋教仁的幕后主使。
description.en: A Chinese military and government official during the late Qing dynasty and the early Republic of China. He was the founder and leader of the Beiyang Army, served as the Provisional and Formal President of the Republic of China, and later attempted to establish the Empire of China, although he was never formally enthroned. He was widely considered to be the mastermind behind the assassination of Song Jiaoren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，北洋军阀直系首领之一，也是直系的代表人物，以其军事才能闻名，是直系军阀的实际军事领导者，为北伐战争的讨伐对象。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China, one of the leaders and a representative figure of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang Warlords, known for his military skills and as the de facto military leader of the clique, who was an object of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将和政治人物，奉系军阀领袖张作霖长子，东北军将领，西安事变发动者之一。继承其父统治东北，后宣布东北易帜归顺国民政府。他曾指挥东北军在中东路事件中与苏联作战。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China who controlled Northeast China, leader of the Northeastern Army, and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. He commanded the Northeastern Army against the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，二十八个半布尔什维克成员，曾任张闻天的前任（中共中央总书记），是第五次反围剿期间的实际领导者之一，后在黑茶山空难中遇难。
共产国际派往中国的苏联军事顾问，曾在中国工农红军中担任指挥职务。
中华民国军事家、政治家，晋系军阀的创始人和最高领导人。他长期统治山西，被称为“山西王”。美国《时代杂志》在1930年称其为“模范督军”，并认为他为山西带来了繁荣。
description.en: A military strategist and politician of the Republic of China, founder and supreme leader of the Jin clique. He ruled Shanxi for a long period and was known as the "King of Shanxi". In 1930, Time Magazine called him a "model governor" who brought prosperity to Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，新桂系核心代表人物，中华民国首任国防部部长，华中剿匪总司令。他曾任淞沪戒严司令部司令，是四一二事件的主要执行者之一。他曾与杨宇霆在冀东会晤，并于事件后奉命来台宣慰。他是白先勇之父。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, a representative figure of the New Guangxi clique, and a prominent KMT general. He served as the commander of the Shanghai Martial Law Command and was one of the main executors of the April 12th Incident. He also met with Yang Yuting in eastern Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争中八路军发动的一次大规模战役
1962年10月至11月发生在中华人民共和国和印度共和国之间的一场边境战争。
刘少奇的第六任妻子，曾任中华人民共和国第一夫人、物理学家、全国政协常委。
抗日战争期间，国民革命军与新四军之间发生的军事冲突，属于国共摩擦范畴。此次事件中，国民党军队袭击新四军，其军部遭到围攻。
杰出的无产阶级革命家和理论家、忠诚的马克思主义者、中国共产党早期重要领导人。中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国外交部副部长。后因在庐山会议支持彭德怀，被打成反党集团成员。
description.en: One of the early important leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇与王前的女儿。
伊朗巴列维王朝的最后一位国王。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管全国公安工作的国务院组成部门。
description.en: The ministry of the State Council responsible for public security in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循。”的政治方针，由华国锋提出，旨在维持毛泽东时代的政策和思想路线。
description.en: The political principle of 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave,' promoted by Hua Guogeng to maintain the policies and ideological line of the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国死亡人数最多的一次地震。
中国政治人物，叶剑英长子，曾任全国政协常务副主席。
叶剑英次子。
中华民国时期军事及政治人物，粤系军阀的代表人物。他曾炮轰总统府，也曾与孙中山合作但之后反目。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China era, representative of the Yue clique. He once cooperated with Sun Yat-sen but later became his opponent.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领袖、革命家，曾任黄埔军校党代表。
description.en: A revolutionary of the Kuomintang, served as the Party Representative of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党早期领导人之一，中华民国大陆时期政要、诗人。他曾是一位早期的革命者，策划暗杀时任摄政王的载沣。后任武汉国民政府主席，与蒋介石在分共方式上存在分歧，导致宁汉分裂。最终成为汪精卫政权的首脑。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Kuomintang and a prominent politician and poet during the Republic of China era on the mainland. He was an early revolutionary who plotted the assassination of the then Prince-Regent Zaifeng. He later served as chairman of the Wuhan Nationalist Government, where his disagreements with Chiang Kai-shek over the method of purging communists led to the Nanjing-Wuhan split. Eventually, he became the head of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，北伐名将，中国人民解放军创建者之一，曾任新四军军长。
description.en: One of the founders of the People's Liberation Army, a key leader of the New Fourth Army, and a Chinese military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英的养女。
中华民国陆军二级上将，晋系重要将领。曾任国民党华北剿匪总司令，在平津战役中率部和平改编，促成北平解放，并于第二次国共内战末期投向中国共产党。他是一位中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国水利部、水利电力部部长。
description.en: General (Second Class) of the Republic of China Army and an important general of the Jin clique. He was the former Commander-in-Chief of the Kuomintang's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters and led his troops to accept peaceful reorganization during the Pingjin Campaign, facilitating the peaceful liberation of Beiping, and later defected with his troops to the Chinese Communist Party at the end of the Chinese Civil War. A Chinese military strategist and politician, he later served as Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省会、副省级市和首批沿海开放城市。
周恩来妻子，中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所著名综合性研究型大学，由教育家严修、张伯苓创办。周恩来、姚依林、孟凡利等曾就读于此。
description.en: A famous comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China, and Meng Fanli's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林立果、林立衡之母，曾任中共第九届中央政治局委员，林彪反革命集团案主犯之一，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao, mother of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，林彪反革命集团主要成员之一，曾任海军政治委员。
description.en: A Navy Vice Admiral of the People's Liberation Army, one of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，林彪集团主要成员，曾任总后勤部部长。林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
美国政治家，曾任美国副总统及第37任总统。他于1973年与田中角荣在白宫会面。
description.en: An American politician who served as Vice President and the 37th President of the United States. He met with Kakuei Tanaka at the White House in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交家、政治家，曾任美国国家安全顾问和国务卿。
description.en: An American diplomat and political scientist who served as United States Secretary of State and National Security Advisor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣并支援朝鲜的武装力量，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
