description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War, and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀的第二任妻子。
晚清时期由曾国藩组建的湖南地方武装，其活动延续至民国初年，是清朝镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。
中国人民解放军大将。
中国人民解放军上将，长期负责中共情报保卫和特务工作，曾任中共中央社会部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Communist Party, long responsible for intelligence and secret service work, who served as the head of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军和八路军高级指挥员，曾任八路军副参谋长。
中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是蒋介石最信任的将领之一。曾参与东征、北伐、抗日战争和国共内战，号称“西北王”。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, and one of Chiang Kai-shek's most trusted generals. He participated in the Eastern Expedition, Northern Expedition, Second Sino-Japanese War, and the Chinese Civil War, known as the 'King of the Northwest'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清浙江省宁波府镇海县
birth_place.en: Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市
death_place.en: Taipei, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，青海王。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军新疆军区

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人，被尊为“共和国永远的主席”，曾任朝鲜总理。在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军代司令员。
中国人民解放军元帅，中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国领导人之一。曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任、中央人民政府最高人民检察署检察长。
时任中共湖南省委第一书记，因在庐山会议支持彭德怀被打成反党集团成员。
中华民国军事将领及政治人物，西北军领袖，民国军阀，因其部队被称为“基督将军”。曾发动北京政变将溥仪逐出紫禁城，并创办了西北军第二军官学校。他曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A warlord in the Republic of China, leader of the Guominjun, known as the 'Christian General'. He also founded the Northwest Army Second Military Officers' School and was responsible for expelling Puyi from the Forbidden City during the Beijing Coup. He was also invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军主要领导人之一，西路军政委。

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第四方面军
en: Fourth Front Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，徐向前是其主要军事领导人，长征时期由张国焘领导。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. Xu Xiangqian was one of its main military leaders, and it was led by Zhang Guotao during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国哥廷根的公立研究型大学，朱德曾在此留学。
description.en: A public research university in Göttingen, Germany.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
中共中央纪律检查委员会
十三届中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关，负责对薄熙来、陈良宇等事件立案调查。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China, responsible for investigating incidents involving figures like Bo Xilai and Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命是一场推翻清朝统治、建立中华民国的全国性资产阶级民主革命。革命始于1911年武昌起义，共和派促使清宣统帝退位。北洋军阀袁世凯利用军事实力逼迫清帝退位并攫取了革命果实。摄政王载沣顺应潮流辞职。此次革命曾获邵玉轩斥巨资资助。
description.en: The Xinhai Revolution was a nationwide bourgeois democratic revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China. It began with the Wuchang Uprising in 1911, leading to the abdication of Emperor Xuantong. Warlord Yuan Shikai exploited his military power to force the emperor's resignation and seize the revolution's fruits. Prince-Regent Zaifeng resigned in response to the changing times. This revolution received significant funding from Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领导人
国民革命军将领
国民革命军陆军二级上将
清末民初著名军事家，护国运动的主要组织者和领导者，曾遭遇袁世凯派遣的刺客暗杀但幸免于难。
description.en: A famous military strategist of the late Qing and early Republic of China periods, a key organizer and leader of the National Protection War, who survived an assassination attempt by assassins sent by Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群之子，中华人民共和国文化大革命时期政治人物，解放军空军司令部办公室副主任兼作战部副部长。
中国政治人物，林彪与叶群之女，林立果的姐姐，《空军报》副总编。
description.en: Chinese political figure, daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的女儿。
林彪的前妻。
越南民主共和国国防部长。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟，是由列宁和布尔什维克党建立的欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家，共产国际总部所在地。其研究人员于1932年首次发行了《1844年经济学哲学手稿》。在军阀割据时期，它支持了冯玉祥的西北军。它是第二次世界大战同盟国主要成员，对中国提供援助并于1945年8月对日宣战，入侵满洲并进攻关东军，对日本投降决策产生重要影响。第二次国共内战期间，通过共产国际支援中国共产党。作为一个前共产主义国家，它在越南战争期间支持北越。它也是世界上第一个实现载人航天的国家。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics was a socialist state in Northern Eurasia, founded by Lenin and the Bolshevik Party, where the headquarters of the Communist International was located. Its researchers first published the 'Economic and Philosophic Manuscripts of 1844' in 1932. During the Warlord Era, it supported Feng Yuxiang's Northwest Army. It was a principal member of the Allied powers in World War II, providing aid to China and declaring war on Japan in August 1945, invading Manchuria and attacking the Kwantung Army, significantly impacting Japan's decision to surrender. During the Chinese Civil War, it supported the Communist Party of China through the Comintern, and as a former communist state, it also supported North Vietnam during the Vietnam War. It was also the first country to achieve human spaceflight.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第一任妻子。
毛泽东的第二任妻子，毛岸英之母，毛新宇的祖母。
毛泽东的第三任妻子，曾任第五届全国政协委员。
毛泽东和毛泽民的父亲。
description.en: Father of Mao Zedong and Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的次子，中国共产党党员，翻译家，毛新宇之父。
description.en: Second son of Mao Zedong, member of the Chinese Communist Party, and translator.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧三子，毛岸青之弟。
中国文化大革命时期政治人物，毛泽东与江青的女儿，毛岸青的异母姊妹。
中国共产党财经干部，毛泽东之弟。曾化名周彬在新疆工作，后被新疆军阀盛世才杀害。
description.en: A financial cadre of the Communist Party of China and the younger brother of Mao Zedong. He worked in Xinjiang under the alias Zhou Bin and was later killed by the Xinjiang warlord Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东和毛泽民的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在湖南省立第一师范学校的教员，杨开慧的父亲。
中国共产主义的先驱，中国共产党的主要创始人之一、早期主要领导人，曾安排毛泽东在北京大学图书馆工作。1927年4月28日在北京被张作霖下令绞刑处决。
description.en: A pioneer of Chinese communism and one of the main founders of the Chinese Communist Party. He was executed by hanging in Beijing on April 28, 1927, under the orders of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，新四军的创建人和主要领导人之一，曾任新四军副军长兼政委，中共苏区中央分局书记。他曾安排护送瞿秋白转移，并在战略问题上与叶挺存在分歧。
印度首任总理。
中国人民解放军在东北地区的大军区。
中国人民解放军高级将领。
中国人民解放军开国上将，空军首任政治委员。
西欧国家，实行半总统制。曾在19世纪中后期至20世纪中期对越南进行殖民统治。法国政府曾授予巩俐“艺术与文学勋章”司令勋位。
description.en: A country in Western Europe that operates under a semi-presidential system. It colonized Vietnam from the mid-19th to the mid-20th century. The French government also awarded Gong Li the rank of Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

description.zh-cn: 位于西北欧的联邦君主立宪制国家，欧盟和北约的创始成员国之一。该国也是富通集团总部所在地。
description.en: A federal constitutional monarchy in Northwest Europe, it is one of the founding members of the EU and NATO. It is also home to the Fortis Group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人
中国共产党早期妇女运动领导人
由蒋中正在上海发动的针对中国共产党的武力清党行动，导致国共两党正式决裂，并成为第一次国共内战的导火索之一。
description.en: A violent purge of Chinese Communist Party members in Shanghai, initiated by Chiang Kai-shek, which led to the formal split between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party, and served as one of the catalysts for the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，甲级战犯，九一八事变和建立满洲国的策划者之一。
中华人民共和国开国上将，中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，中共八大元老之一，曾任中共中央组织部部长，并曾率部进入云南。
description.en: A veteran of the Communist Party of China and a founding general of the People's Liberation Army, he was also one of the Eight Elders of the CCP and formerly Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee. He led troops into Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家和系统科学家，工程控制论创始人之一，中国载人航天奠基人，“两弹一星”功勋奖章获得者，被誉为“中国航天之父”、“中国导弹之父”。张纯如为其撰写了传记《中国导弹之父——钱学森之谜》。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist and systems scientist, one of the founders of engineering cybernetics, and a founding figure of China's manned space program, known as the 'Father of Chinese Missiles', 'Father of Chinese Aerospace', and 'Father of Chinese rocketry'. He was awarded the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' Meritorious Award. Iris Chang wrote his biography 'Thread of the Silkworm'.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共北京市委第一书记
董必武曾就读的大学。
清末由孙中山在日本东京成立的革命政党，由华兴会等多个革命团体合并而成，是中国近代第一个全国性的革命政党。邵玉轩是其会员之一。
description.en: A revolutionary party founded by Sun Yat-sen in Tokyo, Japan, formed by the merger of several revolutionary groups including the Huaxinghui. Shao Yuxuan was one of its members.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代在苏联莫斯科创办的、以孙中山名字命名的大学。邓小平、王稼祥、杨尚昆、董必武曾在此就读。
description.en: A Soviet school for training cadres for the Chinese revolution.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会党校
en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的机构，是中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。薄一波曾在此学习。
description.en: An institution under the direct authority of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, serving as the highest academy for training high- and middle-ranking party officials and Marxist theorists. Bo Yibo once studied here.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。1936年4月战斗牺牲。小说《刘志丹》即是为纪念他而创作。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base. The novel 'Liu Zhidan' was written in his memory.

death_place.en: Sanjiao Town, Zhongyang County, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之弟，中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家，曾任财政部长。
description.en: Chinese statesman, diplomat, and financier who served as Minister of Finance.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
十三届中央顾问委员会
en: Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年期间设立的过渡性机构，旨在安置年事已高的中央领导干部，以推动废除领导干部职务终身制，同时也是对党中央的政治辅助和咨询机构。
description.en: A transitional body established by the CPC from 1982 to 1992 to accommodate senior central leading cadres, in order to promote the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，曾为邓小平（第二任妻子）、李维汉的妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的长子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国政协副主席，残疾人权益倡导者。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次女。陈希的前任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的三女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's third daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平为解决香港、澳门及台湾问题提出的构想。
description.en: A concept proposed by Deng Xiaoping to resolve the issues of Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的计划单列市，中国四大一线城市之一、粤港澳大湾区的中心城市之一、中国超大城市之一。它也是中国的第一个经济特区，改革开放的窗口。深圳是中国全国性经济中心、国际科技创新中心和对外开放门户，也是华商银行的注册地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is one of the four first-tier cities in China, a central city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, and one of China's megacities. It is also China's first special economic zone and a window for reform and opening up. Shenzhen serves as a national economic center, an international technology and innovation hub, a gateway for foreign relations, and the place of registration for Hua Shang Bank.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省
location.en: Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，第39任美国总统。
美国政治家，曾任美国总统。
法国汽车制造商，邓小平早年曾在此做工。
陈云长子，国家开发银行前董事长
中华民国陆军中将，曾任国民革命军第五军军长、陆军第二兵团司令、徐州剿匪总司令部副总司令。在淮海战役中被俘。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, who served as the commander of the 5th Corps, the 2nd Army Group, and the deputy commander of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters. He was captured during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高行政机关。
壮族政治人物，曾任广西自治区主席、广西壮族自治区革命委员会主任，被认为是广西大屠杀的主要组织者。
description.en: A Zhuang ethnic politician, he served as Chairman of the Guangxi Autonomous Region and Director of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Revolutionary Committee, and was considered a primary organizer of the Guangxi Massacre.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级理论家，曾任中央文革小组成员。
中华人民共和国公安部管理的，主要关押最高级别政治犯的监狱。
description.en: A maximum-security prison in the People's Republic of China, primarily used for detaining high-ranking political prisoners.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期政治人物，刘少奇母亲的侄子。
文化大革命时期北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一。
一所以人文社会科学为主的综合性研究型全国重点大学，直属于中华人民共和国教育部。
中共情报工作者。
中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面的最高学术机构，全国自然科学与高新技术综合研究发展中心，也是中国科学技术大学的创办及主管单位。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology of the People's Republic of China, the national comprehensive research and development center for natural sciences and high technology, and also the founder and governing body of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中山大学的前身，现为位于中国广州市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: Formerly the predecessor of Sun Yat-sen University, it is now a major research university in Guangzhou, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任铁道部副部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army of China, formerly served as Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 藏族政治人物，领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: A Tibetan politician who led and completed the formulation of the Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，张又侠之父。
民国时期川军将领。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处排名第一的书记、中共中央办公厅主任。曾任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. Former Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。曾任中共广东省委书记，并出席孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的干部会议。
description.en: Chinese politician. Currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. He previously served as Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee and attended the cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 由列宁领导的布尔什维克发动的革命，推翻了俄国临时政府。
description.en: A revolution led by Lenin's Bolsheviks that overthrew the Russian Provisional Government.

zh-cn: 有中国特色的社会主义

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党根据本国国情，将马克思主义基本原理与中国具体实际相结合而形成的政治经济理论，也是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的官方意识形态及国策。
description.en: A political and economic theory formulated by the Communist Party of China by adapting the basic principles of Marxism to the specific conditions of China.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的执政党，将列宁主义纳入其官方学说。
description.en: The ruling political party of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a national-level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, and the head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，时任中共中央政法委书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party
Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee
Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，负责党组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。该部门于1979年递交报告，为小说《刘志丹》案平反。自2018年起，统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for party organization construction, cadre team construction, and talent work. In 1979, this department submitted a report to rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case. Since 2018, it has centrally managed the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部
中共中央统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一。曾任中共上海市委第一书记。
中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记、天津市市长。在六四事件中，他因反对实施戒严并支持赵紫阳而被免职。复出后曾任电子工业部部长、全国政协副主席等职务。他曾赏识李瑞环。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC. He was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting Zhao Ziyang during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. After his political comeback, he served as Minister of Electronics Industry and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长和会议秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the sessions of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、中共中央书记处书记。在六四事件中与阎明复一同被免职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat. He was dismissed along with Yan Mingfu during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央统战部部长、全国政协副主席等职。因在六四事件中的表现被撤职，后复出任民政部副部长，并长期从事慈善事业。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a former deputy state leader. He served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC and head of the United Front Work Department. He was dismissed for his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, later returned to politics as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs, and was long involved in philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席、天津市市长。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆胞弟，解放军上将。曾任中共中央军委秘书长。在担任解放军总政治部主任期间，参与指挥戒严部队。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪律检查委员会书记、中组部副部长。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member, once served as deputy head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中央书记处书记、陈希的前任中共中央党校校长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，第十七届中共中央政治局常委，曾任中央纪委书记。

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前主要领导人之一，原副国级领导人，上将军衔（2014年被开除军籍），在反腐运动中落马。他曾在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress, and later fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国家副主席，原副国级领导人。
原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共中央书记处书记、全国政协副主席、中央统战部部长，是胡锦涛的首席助理。被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: Former director of the CCP General Office and chief aide to Hu Jintao, who fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 原中央宣传部部长
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。涉及胡锦涛二十大离场事件。
中国政治人物，曾任中共浙江省委书记（夏宝龙担任该职务时的前任），并曾担任浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee (predecessor to Xia Baolong) and former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区府右街12号
location.en: No. 12 Fuyou Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，是中国共产党在2022年至2027年的最高领导机关。
description.en: The central leadership body elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which is the highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2022 to 2027.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、力学工程师及航天领域专家，中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委书记。曾任中国航天科技集团公司总经理，出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国政治人物及环境科学家。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（在《穹顶之下》发布后曾对其公开表示赞赏）、北京市市长。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician and environmental scientist. He served as Minister of Environmental Protection (publicly praising 'Under the Dome' upon its release) and Mayor of Beijing. He is currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Politburo and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，天津市委书记。此前曾任中共重庆市委书记，在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，是袁家军的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician. While Tang Liangzhi served as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物及空间技术专家，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记，曾任浙江省人大常委会主任，并曾担任神舟五号任务载人飞船系统总指挥。
description.en: Chinese politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a space technology expert, holding a vice-national level leadership position. Currently a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing Municipality, and formerly Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress. He also served as Commander-in-Chief of the manned spacecraft system for the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中国共产党广东省委员会书记。曾任中共杭州市委书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1967年间以及1980年至1982年间设立于中央书记处的领导职务，负责处理中央书记处运作。此职务并非中共中央的主要负责人，与1982年起设立的党内最高领导人职务不同。
description.en: A leading position established within the Central Secretariat of the Communist Party of China between 1956-1967 and 1980-1982, responsible for managing the operations of the Central Secretariat. This position was not the main leader of the CPC Central Committee and is distinct from the supreme leader role established since 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中共第二十届中央政治局委员，北京市委书记。
原副国级领导人，曾任中共第十六届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记、上海市市长。因陈良宇事件被查处下台并判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the 16th Politburo of the CCP, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee, and Mayor of Shanghai. He was dismissed and sentenced due to his involvement in the Chen Liangyu incident.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任大连市市长、辽宁省省长、中华人民共和国商务部部长、中共重庆市委书记、中共中央政治局委员。2013年因受贿、贪污、滥用职权罪被判处无期徒刑。他被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，亦是习近平的政治对手。他曾是谷开来之夫，其前妻为李雪峰之女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second son. A former Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, Party Secretary of Chongqing, Minister of Commerce, Governor of Liaoning, and Mayor of Dalian. In 2013, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, corruption, and abuse of power. He is considered a political rival of Xi Jinping. He was the husband of Gu Kailai, and his ex-wife is the daughter of Li Xuefeng.

description.zh-cn: 因王立军事件引发的，导致原中共中央政治局委员薄熙来被免职、调查、判刑等一系列政治事件。
原中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记，原国家级副职领导人。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2022年召开的全国代表大会，选举产生了第二十届中央委员会和中央纪律检查委员会。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in 2022, which elected the 20th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、市委书记、全国政协主席，原正国级领导人，是李瑞环的全国政协主席职务继任者。
曾任中央文明委主任
黄敬与范瑾的三子，俞强声之弟，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人。曾任中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席、中共上海市委书记、中共湖北省委书记、建设部部长等职务。
description.en: Third son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng, a former national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China, Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Minister of Construction.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派的杰出代表，妇女运动的领袖。
中国现代文艺理论家、诗人和翻译家。
中国作家。
中国诗人，艾未未的父亲，曾担任育才学校文学组组长。
description.en: Chinese poet, the father of Ai Weiwei, and who served as the head of the literature group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家。
宋庆龄之父，原名韩教准。
宋嘉树的妻子，宋氏三姐妹的母亲，于凤至的干娘。
description.en: Wife of Song Jiashu, mother of the Soong sisters, and godmother to Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之姐。中华民国政治人物，宋氏家族的核心人物，孔祥熙之妻，曾任孙中山的秘书。
description.en: Sister of Soong Ching-ling. Chinese political figure, a core member of the Soong family, wife of H. H. Kung, and former secretary to Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之弟。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的社会活动家、对外工作领导人。在被提名为国家副主席候选人后突然逝世。
description.en: A social activist and leader in foreign affairs of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Died suddenly after being nominated as a candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 越南革命家，越南民主共和国的创立者。
description.en: Vietnamese revolutionary and the founder of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中国共产党上海市第十一届委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的幼女，曾任中国对外友好协会会长。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 主管中华人民共和国财政工作的国务院组成部门。
中国人民解放军上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员，李先念女婿。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, author, and former Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

en: People's Liberation Army at the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and massacre

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治风波，中国政府动用军队对天安门广场的示威者进行武力镇压和清场。
中国话剧及电影导演，曾与江青同居。
中国剧作家，曾帮助过江青。
中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，毛泽民与朱旦华之子，在毛泽东晚年期间曾任中共中央政治局联络员。他是文化大革命时期的重要人物，作为江青的政治盟友和四人帮的支持者，后一同被捕。
description.en: Mao Zedong's nephew and son of Mao Zemin and Zhu Danhua, who served as his liaison during Mao's later years.

description.zh-cn: 林彪集团成员，林立果的心腹，曾任中国人民解放军空军第四军政委，被王洪文和许世友诱捕。
中华人民共和国江苏省省会。
description.en: The capital of Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆、彭德怀逝世的地点。
中国人民解放军上将，原中央军委副主席。
毛泽东在长沙批评“四人帮”的一系列谈话。
中国抗日战争是20世纪30至40年代，中华民国抵抗大日本帝国全面侵略的战争。九一八事变被视为其开端，全面爆发始于1937年。这场持续至1945年的战争中，石双琪曾参加抗日自卫队。
description.en: The Sino-Japanese War was a conflict in the 1930s and 1940s, where the Republic of China resisted a full-scale invasion by the Empire of Japan. The Mukden Incident is regarded as its beginning, with the war fully erupting in 1937 and lasting until 1945. During this period, Shi Shuangqi joined the anti-Japanese self-defense force.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个共和制国家，于1912年在中国大陆建立。在1912年至1949年间曾是中国的执政政权，其下属曾设有绥远特别区等特别行政区。现今治权范围主要为台湾、澎湖、金门、马祖。作为中国抗日战争的主要参战方之一，它不承认满洲国的合法性。该共和国曾被艾森豪威尔政府承认为代表全中国的唯一合法政府。1972年，田中角荣与中华人民共和国建交的同时，与其断绝了外交关系。
description.en: A republic in East Asia, founded on the Asian mainland in 1912. The Suiyuan Special Administrative Region was one of its special administrative regions. Its current jurisdiction mainly covers Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu. It was recognized by the Eisenhower administration as the sole legitimate government of China. In 1972, Kakuei Tanaka severed diplomatic relations with the Republic of China upon establishing relations with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫长子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Eldest son of Ulanhu, former Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的孙女，布赫之女，曾任内蒙古自治区政府主席。
description.en: Ulanhu's granddaughter, Buhe's daughter, former Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Government.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的儿子，曾任包头市市长、山西省副省长。
乌兰夫的堂侄女婿，曾任中共内蒙古自治区纪委书记。
中共元老习仲勋的第二任妻子，中共中央总书记习近平的母亲，习明泽的祖母。
description.en: Mother of Xi Jinping.

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

en: Leader of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在特定历史时期的最高领导人职务称谓，特指中国共产党中央委员会的最高领导人。1956-1967年及1980-1982年的中央委员会总书记不属于此范畴。
description.en: The title of the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China during a specific historical period, specifically referring to the supreme leader of its Central Committee. The General Secretary of the Central Committee during 1956-1967 and 1980-1982 did not fall into this category.

zh-cn: 二十八个半布尔什维克

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪20年代后期在苏联莫斯科中山大学学习并深受王明“左”倾思想影响的中共留苏学生群体。该群体是该校的一个政治派别，也是一个中共党内团体。王稼祥是其中之一。
马克思主义哲学家、教育家，中国共产党创始人之一，曾任武汉大学校长。
大跃进时期在中国农村建立的政社合一的组织，同时也是当时推行的社会改造运动，是“三面红旗”之一。
中华人民共和国北京市的省级行政机关，也是其最高地方国家行政机关。北京体育大学曾由其与国家体委双重领导。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ and provincial-level administrative body for Beijing, People's Republic of China. Beijing Sport University was once under its dual leadership with the State Sports Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人，介绍彭真入党
中国近代民主革命家，华兴会会长，宋教仁的挚友。曾任军政府战时总司令、陆军总长。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, president of the Huaxinghui, and a close friend of Song Jiaoren. He served as wartime commander-in-chief and Minister of War for the military government.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省常德府桃源县仙瑞乡上坊村湘冲
birth_place.en: Xiangchong, Shangfang Village, Xianrui Township, Taoyuan County, Changde Prefecture, Hunan Province

death_place.zh-cn: 江苏省沪海道上海县闸北区沪宁铁路医院
death_place.en: Huning Railway Hospital, Zhabei District, Shanghai County, Huhai Dao, Jiangsu Province

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国初期第一位倡导责任内阁制的政治家，华兴会和同盟会的主要领导人，国民党的主要筹建人及代理理事长。他于1913年3月20日在上海北站遇刺，并于22日不治身亡。此事件是二次革命的直接导火索。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, the first politician to advocate for a cabinet responsibility system in the early Republic of China, a key leader of the Huaxinghui and the Tongmenghui, and a principal founder and acting chairman of the Kuomintang. On March 20, 1913, he was assassinated at Shanghai North Railway Station and died on the 22nd. This event was the direct trigger for the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国建国初期，以京兆地方（北京）为首都的中央政府。始于1912年袁世凯就任临时大总统。在袁世凯去世后，该政府实际由北洋军阀各派系所控制，因大总统和国务总理主要由北洋军阀出身而得名。其于1914年设立了绥远特别区。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China in its early days, with its capital in Jingzhao (Beijing). It began with Yuan Shikai's inauguration as Provisional President in 1912. After Yuan Shikai's death, it was effectively controlled by various factions of the Beiyang Warlords, who predominantly held the positions of President and Premier. It established the Suiyuan Special Administrative Region in 1914.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内政部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军高级将领，济南战役中被俘。

death_place.zh-cn: 河南省永城市陈官庄乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，抗战期间曾任新编第二十二师师长与第五军军长，参与昆仑关战役与滇西缅北战役。国共内战期间任第二兵团司令，在徐蚌会战中阵亡。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, posthumously promoted to General. He served as the commander of the New 22nd Division and the 5th Corps during the Second Sino-Japanese War, participating in the Battle of Kunlun Pass and the Battle of Northern Burma and Western Yunnan. During the Chinese Civil War, he commanded the 2nd Army Group and was killed in action during the Huaihai Campaign.

en: Party and State Leaders of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，是对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国担任的，具有“国家级副职”以上级别职务的领导人的统称。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China, referring to leaders holding positions at or above the 'deputy state level' in the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度
en: Collective leadership system of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的组织原则和领导制度，旨在防止个人专断。
description.en: An organizational and leadership principle of the CPC aimed at preventing personal autocracy.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的长子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底由中国大陆各地高校学生发起的一场大规模学生示威游行，旨在争取民主选举、新闻自由等权利。该运动是中华人民共和国民主运动的一部分，对后续的政治事件产生了深远影响，并成为导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: A large-scale student movement initiated by university students across mainland China at the end of 1986, aiming to demand rights such as democratic elections and freedom of the press. It was part of the Chinese democracy movement, had a profound impact on subsequent political events, and became the catalyst for Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，一二·九运动的领导者和发动人之一，谷开来之父。
description.en: A major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the initiators of the December 9th Movement, and the father of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与第一任妻子李丹宇之子，商人。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Li Danyu, a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与薄谷开来之子，薄一波之孙，投资人、律师。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Bo Gu Kailai, grandson of Bo Yibo, an investor and lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高学术研究机关。
description.en: The national academy of the Republic of China.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国理工科排名前列的公立研究型大学，隶属于中国科学院。该校位于安徽合肥，是八六学潮的策源地，其学生曾因不满地方人大代表选举问题而率先发起游行。
description.en: A top-tier public research university in science and engineering in the People's Republic of China, affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences. Located in Hefei, Anhui, the university was also the origin of the 1986 student demonstrations, with its students being the first to march in protest against issues with the local People's Congress deputy elections.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人、官员，号称“诗仙”，与杜甫并称“李杜”。
唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，世称“诗圣”、“诗史”，与李白齐名，并称为“李杜”。其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang dynasty, known as the 'Poet-Sage' and 'Poet-Historian', whose works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 曾任全国人大常委会副委员长，后因受贿罪被判处死刑。
曾任赵紫阳的政治秘书（时任中共中央政治体制改革研究室主任），六四事件后被判刑。
中国共产党早期领导人，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝，由满族建立。其正式行政区划名称为布政使司，但“省”成为习惯性代称并最终获官方认可。在甲午战争后开始编练包括北洋军前身在内的新军。它是第二次鸦片战争中的主要参战方。日俄战争在其领土（中国东北地区）上进行，战后受其影响开启了立宪运动。载沣是其最后的实际统治者之一。该王朝在福泽谕吉的《脱亚论》中被视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, established by the Manchu people. Its official administrative division name was 'Buzheng Shisi' (布政使司), but 'province' became a habitual designation and was eventually officially recognized. It began to train the New Army, including the predecessor of the Beiyang Army, after the First Sino-Japanese War. It was a major combatant in the Second Opium War. The Russo-Japanese War was fought on its territory (Northeast China), and influenced the start of the Constitutional Movement after the war. Zaifeng was one of its last de facto rulers. This dynasty was also regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳次子。
description.en: Second son of Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳之女，中国嘉德国际拍卖有限公司总经理。
description.en: Daughter of Zhao Ziyang, General Manager of China Guardian Auctions.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的负责人，是中华人民共和国中央人民政府的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who is the highest leader of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairperson of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席，属国家级副职党和国家领导人。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, a state-level deputy leader position.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理，负责协助总理工作，亦是中华人民共和国的最高行政首长之一。
description.en: The Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for assisting the Premier, and also one of the highest administrative leaders of the People's Republic of China.

en: History of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 政治体制改革，1980年代由邓小平、胡耀邦、赵紫阳等人推动的政治改革尝试。
苏联最后一任最高领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记。六四事件期间曾访华。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国南部沿海省级行政区。徐发淦的籍贯地，河源市位于其境内。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China located on the southern coast. It is Xu Fagan's ancestral home, and Heyuan City is located within its borders.

description.zh-cn: 日本第125代天皇。
胡耀邦长子，曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
前中共中央总书记胡耀邦因心脏病逝世，引发了大规模的悼念活动，成为六四事件的导火索。
中华民国陆军中将，蒋介石嫡系重要将领，抗日名将，黄埔军校第一期毕业。曾任第十一集团军总司令等职。他曾是瞿秋白在上海大学的学生，后负责羁押并执行对瞿秋白的枪决。1949年在国共内战中被俘，1959年获特赦。晚年移居美国，致力于中国和平统一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek, a famous anti-Japanese war hero, and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. He served as the commander of the 11th Army Group. He was a student of Qu Qiubai at Shanghai University and later responsible for detaining and executing Qu Qiubai. He was captured in the Chinese Civil War in 1949 and was granted amnesty in 1959. In his later years, he moved to the United States and dedicated himself to the peaceful reunification of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的著名私立大学，宋教仁曾在此留学。
description.en: A famous private university in Tokyo, Japan, where Song Jiaoren studied.

description.zh-cn: 由托洛茨基发展的马克思主义理论，与斯大林主义对立。
由弗拉基米尔·列宁于1919年3月创立的国际共产主义组织，总部设于苏联莫斯科，旨在推动世界革命。它是一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合组织，曾对中国共产党提供支援和指导，其在华活动被国民党右派视为苏联赤化中国的证据。该组织于1943年6月10日宣告解散。
description.en: An international communist organization and federation of communist parties, founded in March 1919 under the leadership of Vladimir Lenin, headquartered in Moscow, Soviet Union. It advocated for world revolution, provided support and direction to the Chinese Communist Party, and its activities in China were considered by the KMT right-wing as evidence of a Soviet plot to communize China. The organization announced its dissolution on June 10, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、文学理论家、评论家、诗人、翻译家、思想家，鲁迅的二弟。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist, literary theorist, critic, poet, translator, and thinker; the second brother of Lu Xun.

description.zh-cn: 同济大学及华中科技大学同济医学院的源头。

zh-cn: 中国共产党江苏省委员会
en: Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关
清华大学是一所中国顶尖的公立大学，姚依林和习近平都曾在此就读。其位于中华人民共和国北京市海淀区清华园，后由原大陆时期校长梅贻琦在台湾新竹复校。
description.en: A top university in China, Xi Jinping's alma mater.

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的全国领导机构。
description.en: The national leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社，曾在1979年发表文章批判魏京生。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China, which published an article criticizing Wei Jingsheng in 1979.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管铁路运输的组成部门，负责管理中国铁路事务。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing its railway transportation affairs.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏长子，曾任中华人民共和国交通运输部部长
李鹏女儿，前中国大唐集团副总经理
李鹏次子
中国共产党早期农民运动领导人。
中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区的一个特殊社会组织，实行党政军企合一体制。它是一个准军事化组织，负责新疆地区的屯垦戍边。
description.en: A special social organization in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China, which implements an integrated system of party, government, military, and enterprise. It is also a quasi-military organization responsible for economic development and border defense in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 一部电视纪录片。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、山西省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Beijing and former Governor of Shanxi.

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省衢州府江山县保安乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府情报首长、秘密警察首长，军事委员会调查统计局负责人。
description.en: Head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Commission of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者
中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、海峡两岸关系协会会长，多次举荐江泽民。
美国政治人物，第42任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的前任。他曾在金泳三执政期间与金泳三就第一次朝核危机等问题进行合作。在其1998年访华前，中国政府将魏京生流放到美国。
description.en: American politician, 42nd President of the United States, and predecessor of George W. Bush. He collaborated with Kim Young-sam on issues such as the First North Korean nuclear crisis during Kim's presidency. Before his visit to China in 1998, the Chinese government exiled Wei Jingsheng to the U.S.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦首任总统，苏联解体过程中的关键人物。
江泽民的生父。
江泽民的叔父与嗣父，中共烈士。
江泽民的妻子。
中华人民共和国企业家，中国科学院前副院长，上海科技大学校务委员会主任，江泽民长子。
江泽民次子，江绵恒胞弟。
上海交通大学、西安交通大学等校的前身。历史上的交通大学，其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。徐懋德于1938年至1942年曾就读于该大学。
description.en: The university Xu Maode attended from 1938 to 1942.

description.zh-cn: 一种起源于中国的精神修炼及信仰体系，由李洪志于1992年公开传出。它是一个以“真、善、忍”为原则的灵修组织，也是一个气功修炼团体。该团体于1999年被中国政府取缔。
description.en: A spiritual practice and belief system that originated in China, publicly introduced by Li Hongzhi in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部原为建设若干所世界一流大学和一批国际知名高水平研究型大学而实施的教育计划。
中国共产党元老宋任穷之女，文化大革命期间北京师范大学女附中红卫兵的著名领袖人物。曾因给毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章并被赐名“要武”而闻名全国。后移居美国成为地质学者。
description.en: Daughter of the Chinese Communist Party veteran Song Renqiong, and a prominent leader of the Red Guards at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School during the Cultural Revolution. She became nationally famous for putting a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong and being given the name 'Yaowu'. She later moved to the United States and became a geologist.

description.zh-cn: 由德国思想家卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯共同创立的理论体系，涵盖哲学、政治经济学和社会主义等领域，它是一种以历史唯物主义、辩证法和对资本主义的批判所发展而出的经济、政治和社会世界观。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, covering philosophy, political economy, and socialism.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国和美利坚合众国联合公报 (1972年)
中华人民共和国和美利坚合众国联合公报 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与美国政府间签署的三份重要外交文件，是指导中美关系的基础性文件，其中《上海公报》由周恩来与尼克松共同发表。
description.en: Three joint statements issued by the governments of the People's Republic of China and the United States.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省厦门市

description.zh-cn: 中国近代教育史上第一所华侨创办的大学，中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，同时也是一所位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: The first university founded by overseas Chinese in modern Chinese education history, a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, and a comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的地方委员会，是该市党的领导机关和领导核心。
description.en: The local committee of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen, serving as the Party's leadership body and core in the city.

description.zh-cn: 中国已退役职业网球运动员。
description.en: Retired Chinese professional tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，蔡奇的前任中共北京市委书记。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，曾任中共浙江省委书记。现任中央港澳工作领导小组常务副组长、中共中央港澳工作办公室主任、国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former deputy national leader, currently serving as the executive deputy head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee, and Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性研究型大学，位于中国浙江省杭州市。1998年由原浙江大学、浙江医科大学、浙江农业大学、杭州大学合并组建。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是综合研究拟订经济和社会发展政策，进行总量平衡，指导总体经济体制改革的宏观调控部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which is a macro-control department that comprehensively studies and formulates economic and social development policies, conducts aggregate balance, and guides the overall economic system reform.

en: National Security Commission of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的决策和议事协调机构，负责国家安全工作。

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会
en: Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 朱镕基的儿子。
明朝开国皇帝，明太祖，年号洪武。他是朱镕基的祖先，明宣宗的曾祖父，朱高煦的祖父，李景隆是其外甥李文忠之子。解缙曾向其提议编写类书。在位期间发动了包括空印案、胡惟庸案、蓝玉案、郭桓案在内的多起政治清洗。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, reigning as the Hongwu Emperor. He was an ancestor of Zhu Rongji, the great-grandfather of Emperor Xuande of Ming, and the grandfather of Zhu Gaoxu, and Li Jinglong was the son of his nephew Li Wenzhong. Xie Jin once proposed to him the compilation of a leishu. He initiated several major political purges during his reign, including the Empty Seal Case, the case of Hu Weiyong, the case of Lan Yu, and the case of Guo Huan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 美国投资银行，其经济学家吉姆·奥尼尔提出了“金砖四国”概念。
李克强的妻子，英语教授。
李克强的弟弟，曾任国有重点大型企业监事会主席。
为处理法轮功问题而成立的中共中央领导小组办公室。
位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名高等学府，1951年由大夏大学和光华大学合并改制而成。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 英国首相。
联合国秘书长。

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国平壤市

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第一所大学。
description.en: The first university established in North Korea.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部
en: Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管社会行政事务的组成部门，主要负责民政事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for social administrative affairs, primarily civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委常委，中国纪检监察学院院长，前中华人民共和国国家监察委员会主任，首位拥有总监察官头衔的国家监察委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记。
中国人民解放军上将。曾任中共中央政治局委员，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。后在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He was a former Politburo member and was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress. He later fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆企业家，阿里巴巴集团、淘宝网、支付宝的创始人，蚂蚁集团实际控制人
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第20任总统，于2024年12月3日宣布全国戒严，引发政治危机，最终导致其被弹劾下台及逮捕。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of Korea, who declared martial law on December 3, 2024, sparking a political crisis that led to his impeachment and arrest.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第19任总统，于2018年与金正恩共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The 19th President of the Republic of Korea, who co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Kim Jong-un in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾总统
中国传媒工作者、前中国中央电视台主持人，于2018年底曝光陕西千亿矿权案二审卷宗在最高人民法院丢失，引发舆论风暴。
description.en: A Chinese media worker and former host of China Central Television who, in late 2018, exposed the disappearance of the second-instance case files of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' from the Supreme People's Court, sparking a public outcry.

description.zh-cn: 以色列总理
中华人民共和国女高音歌唱家、歌剧表演艺术家、国家一级歌唱演员，中共中央总书记习近平的妻子，曾任全国政协委员、解放军艺术学院院长。
description.en: Chinese folk singer, wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国前驻英国大使柯华之女，习近平的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平与歌唱家彭丽媛的独生女。
description.en: Daughter of Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共河北省委书记。
中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长，原副国级党和国家领导人，习近平在清华大学的室友。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee.

zh-cn: 小约瑟夫·罗比内特·拜登

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，第46任美国总统。
description.en: 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的夫人
前中共中央总书记胡锦涛之子，中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记、温家宝担任国务院总理时期的中华人民共和国中央领导集体。该届政府被认为需要打击削弱江泽民派系。
description.en: Refers to the central leadership of the People's Republic of China during the period when Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council. This administration was seen as needing to weaken the Jiang Zemin faction.

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生于中国四川的特大地震，是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。此次地震对都江堰及二王庙造成了损害，并因大量校舍倒塌引发社会广泛质疑，促使艾未未发起了公民调查活动。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake occurred in Sichuan, China, on May 12, 2008. It was the most destructive and casualty-ridden earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake and the founding of the People's Republic of China. The event caused damage to Dujiangyan and the Erwang Temple, and the collapse of numerous school buildings led to widespread public questioning, prompting Ai Weiwei to initiate a citizens' investigation.

description.zh-cn: 指国家在非常时期采取的一种紧急措施。在1989年六四事件前夕，北京实施了戒严。
description.en: An emergency measure taken by a state in extraordinary times. Martial law was imposed in Beijing on the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部主张并推动改革开放的政治派别，其主张包括深化市场化和政治体制改革。
中华人民共和国国务院前总理温家宝之子，中国商人和企业家，曾创立优创科技有限公司和新天域资本公司，并曾担任中国卫星通信集团董事长。
description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝与张培莉之女，温云松之妹。曾在雷曼兄弟公司和瑞士信贷第一波士顿银行任职。
description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市副市长兼公安局局长王立军私自前往美国驻成都总领事馆滞留，引发了一系列政治事件，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台。
description.en: In February 2012, then Vice Mayor of Chongqing Wang Lijun entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, triggering a series of political events that directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总理，现任俄罗斯总统。他于2022年2月24日下令对乌克兰发动入侵（亦称“特别军事行动”）。魏京生赞同其“为保护本民族不再遭受种族清洗”的说法。
description.en: President of Russia, who on February 24, 2022, ordered a "special military operation" against Ukraine, launching the invasion. Wei Jingsheng agreed with his justification of 'protecting his people from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾任英国首相。他任命马尔 Malcolm Rifkind 为情报和安全委员会主席。
description.en: British politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. He appointed Malcolm Rifkind as Chairman of the Intelligence and Security Committee.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的长子，俞正声的大哥，原中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长，1986年叛逃美国。
description.en: Eldest son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin. He was the eldest brother of Yu Zhengsheng, and formerly served as the Director of the North American Intelligence Division of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, defecting to the United States in 1986.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的中央军事委员会直属综合性大学，是中国人民解放军的军事院校，也是中国顶尖高校之一，正军级单位。作为中国人民解放军唯一一所“985工程”和“211工程”重点建设的综合性大学，该机构始建于1953年。早期曾位于哈尔滨市（1953年至1966年），是第一个五年计划国家156项重点工程之一。1970年，其主体由哈尔滨工程学院内迁长沙后更名。此外，该学院在哈尔滨的部分集体于1966年转业、退出军队序列后，曾更名为一所民用高校，并继续在该地办学至1970年。
description.en: A military academy located in Changsha, Hunan, China. It is the only comprehensive university under Project 985 and Project 211 directly administered by the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
刘志军的胞弟。
德国总理
法国总统
蒋中正的母亲。
蒋中正的原配夫人，蒋经国之母。

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，大萧条期间推行了罗斯福新政，二战期间同盟国的关键领导人。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, who led the country through the Great Depression and was a key leader of the Allies during World War II.

death_place.zh-cn: 沃姆斯普林斯 (佐治亚州)

description.zh-cn: 此条目整合了两个与李锐相关的个体信息：一位是李锐的前妻，享受副部级离休干部待遇；另一位是李锐的父亲，同盟会成员，中华民国第一届国会众议员。
description.en: This entry integrates information about two individuals related to Li Rui: one is Li Rui's former wife; the other is Li Rui's father, a member of the Tongmenghui and a member of the House of Representatives in the first National Assembly of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任天津市市长。
周永康长子。
周永康次子。
中国共产党内的一个非正式政治派系，以江泽民为核心。其成员多与前中共中央总书记江泽民有直接或间接的联系，主要从上海市的领导岗位提升至中央高层。陈良宇被视为该派系的重要成员。据博讯新闻称，该派系曾与温家宝存在权力斗争。
description.en: An informal political faction within the Communist Party of China, with Jiang Zemin as its core. Its members often have direct or indirect ties to former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin and were frequently promoted to central leadership from positions in Shanghai. Chen Liangyu was considered a key member of this faction. According to Boxun News, it was engaged in a power struggle with Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代民族工商业者的杰出代表，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任广东省省长和深圳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政策研究室主任
国际关系专家，王沪宁第二任前妻
原中共河北省委书记。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，为C9联盟成员。在1970年至1973年间，其部分专业与哈军工二系合并搬迁至重庆，建立了临时教学单位。
原中共青海省委书记、中共云南省委书记，后被查处。
中华人民共和国高级警官和政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长、公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长等职。后因参加孙力军政治团伙，并涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处，被判处死刑，缓期二年执行；并被指主导了对艾未未的迫害。
description.en: A senior police officer and politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Justice, Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He was later investigated for participating in Sun Lijun's political clique and serious violations of discipline and law, and was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve; he was also allegedly behind the persecution of Ai Weiwei.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁之父，中国近代民族资本家。
荣毅仁妹夫，二二八事件后接替陈仪成为中华民国台湾省政府首任主席。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会
en: 16th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，任期为2002年11月至2007年10月。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 16th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party, serving from November 2002 to October 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，新党的共同创始人之一，曾任新党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国家安全部副部长。
中国移动通信运营商，联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。
description.en: A Chinese mobile communications operator and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋外孙女，习近平外甥女。

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的学校
位于英国伦敦的一所著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in England.

death_place.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切。在海伍德死亡案中，他被薄谷开来与张晓军合谋毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman with close ties to the Bo Xilai family. He was poisoned by Bo Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun in the Death of Neil Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 大连实德集团创始人，薄熙来案中的主要行贿人。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长。作为王立军事件核心人物，其进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件是薄熙来事件的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu triggered the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 陈云的孙女，陈元之女。

birth_place.zh-cn: 日治朝鲜庆尚南道巨济市
birth_place.en: Geoje, South Gyeongsang Province, Korea under Japanese rule

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔特别市首尔大学校病院
death_place.en: Seoul National University Hospital, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖、政治家，韩国第14任总统，也是韩国民主化后的首位文人总统。他曾是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。在执政期间致力于消除腐败，并将两位前总统推上法庭，但其任期后期因亚洲金融危机和亲属腐败丑聞而备受争议。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and politician, the 14th President of South Korea, and the first civilian president after democratization. He was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly and the youngest member ever elected. During his tenure, he focused on eradicating corruption and brought two former presidents to justice, but his later term was marred by the Asian financial crisis and family corruption scandals.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军北部战区海军。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Northern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国最早实行对外开放政策的经济特区之一。
description.en: One of the first Special Economic Zones in China to implement the policy of opening up to the outside world.

description.zh-cn: 艾未未曾于1978年入读的中国高等艺术教育院校。
description.en: An institution of higher art education in China where Ai Weiwei enrolled in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，北洋军阀奉系首领。曾任中华民国陆海军大元帅，北洋政府最后一任国家元首。其在任期间，曾与蒋介石协议共同驱逐共产国际势力，并在北京搜查苏联使馆，处决了李大钊等共产党人。他是张学良之父。后在皇姑屯事件中被刺杀。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, a prominent leader of the Fengtian clique of the Beiyang Warlords, Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Republic of China, and father of Zhang Xueliang. He notably agreed with Chiang Kai-shek to jointly expel Comintern influence, raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing, and executed Li Dazhao and other communists. He was assassinated in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国富商于文斗之女，张学良的原配妻子。在张学良的人生中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese businessman Yu Wendou and the original wife of Zhang Xueliang. She played a significant role in Zhang Xueliang's life.

description.zh-cn: 张学良的四弟。
奉系将领，张学良的恩师与挚友。因遭杨宇霆排挤等原因起兵反奉，兵败后被处死。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique and a mentor to Zhang Xueliang. He rebelled against the Fengtian clique due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, and was executed after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀执政时期奉系军阀重要将领，有“智囊”、“小诸葛”之称，后被张学良处决。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang government era, known as the 'mastermind' and 'little Zhuge', later executed by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 该部队作为大日本帝国陆军的组成部分，于1919年至1945年驻扎在中国东北地区。期间，它策划并执行了皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，扶植满洲国，最终在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下投降。
description.en: A general army of the Imperial Japanese Army from 1919 to 1945, stationed in the northeastern region of China. It planned the Huanggutun Incident and the Mukden Incident, established the puppet state of Manchukuo, and ultimately surrendered following the Soviet 'August Storm' offensive.

description.zh-cn: 张学良领导的军事力量。
北洋军阀的主要派系之一，由张作霖领导，根据地在东北，并受日本支持。
description.en: One of the main factions of the Beiyang Warlords, led by Zhang Zuolin, based in Northeast China, and supported by Japan.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，原二炮政委，张震之子。
中国经济学家，李克强的博士生导师。
四川大学最早的前身机构，位于中国成都市。现为中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，是一所综合性研究型大学，也是国家“双一流”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设高校。
description.en: A major research university in Chengdu, China.

location.zh-cn: 成都市, 四川省, 中国

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒机构。
中华人民共和国企业家，大连万达集团股份有限公司的创始人兼董事长，中国大陆前首富。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and chairman of Dalian Wanda Group, and former richest man in mainland China.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳专区
birth_place.en: Mianyang Prefecture, Sichuan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的跨国企业集团，总部位于北京，业务涵盖商业地产、文化、金融等多个领域。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate based in Beijing, with business interests in commercial property, culture, and finance.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，金日成的长子，金平一的同父异母兄。曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记，被追封为“朝鲜劳动党永远的总书记”。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the eldest son of Kim Il-sung, and the half-brother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构，负责国际公共卫生事务，是国际公共卫生领域的领导者。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for international public health.

location.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
en: 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
en: 18th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 东风汽车集团有限公司
中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门，是华中科技大学、厦门大学的主管部门，并于1952年决定创办北京体育大学（时称中央体育学院）。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees the country's education sector and language-related work. It is the supervising authority for universities such as Huazhong University of Science and Technology and Xiamen University. Furthermore, in 1952, it decided to establish Beijing Sport University (then Central Institute of Physical Culture).

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，被称为“马来西亚现代化之父”。他曾是安华的政治导师，后成为其主要政治对手，在1998年将其革职；两人后来在2018年结盟推翻国阵政府，但联盟因2020年政治危机而破裂。其对“一带一路”的态度从初期的批评和重新谈判转变为后期的支持。
description.en: Fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modernization of Malaysia". He was once Anwar's political mentor before becoming his main political rival, dismissing him in 1998; the two later allied in 2018 to overthrow the Barisan Nasional government, but the alliance collapsed during the 2020 political crisis. His stance on the 'Belt and Road' initiative evolved from initial criticism and renegotiation to later support.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中共中央军事委员会委员、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领。
中国人民解放军高级将领。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员、高层领导人，中华人民共和国政治人物，俞强声之父，范瑾的丈夫。曾任中华人民共和国首任天津市市长、第一任第一机械工业部部长，并曾与江青同居。
description.en: An early member and high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, a politician of the People's Republic of China, father of Yu Qiangsheng, and husband of Fan Jin. He served as the first mayor of Tianjin and the first minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building, and once cohabited with Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，是世界一流大学建设高校（A类）、985工程、211工程重点建设高校。该校历史悠久，可追溯至多个前身，且有机构于1951年与之合校。
潜伏于美国中央情报局的中华人民共和国间谍。
中国商人，习近平的姐夫，齐桥桥的第二任丈夫，习明泽的姑父。
description.en: Chinese businessman, second husband of Qi Qiaoqiao, brother-in-law of Xi Jinping, and uncle of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省下辖的地级市，习明泽的出生地。
中国政治人物，现任上海市市长，中共上海市委副书记。曾任夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的常务副省长；是刘鹤的妹夫。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently Mayor of Shanghai and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He previously served as Executive Vice Governor when Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, and is the brother-in-law of Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈吉宁的继任北京市市长。
中国政治人物，曾任清华大学党委书记、中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年推出的一部关于中国空气污染的调查纪录片，引发了社会巨大反响，但随后遭到中国官方全面封杀。
description.en: A 2015 documentary film by journalist Chai Jing concerning air pollution in China, which sparked widespread public discussion before being censored by Chinese authorities.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、主持人、独立媒体人，也是《穹顶之下》纪录片的制作人、主讲人和调查记者。
description.en: Chinese journalist and media personality, who produced, hosted, and conducted the investigation for the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西现任总统。
委内瑞拉总统。
美国国会参议院多数党领袖。
新加坡政治人物，现任新加坡国务资政，前任新加坡总理，是何晶的丈夫。
description.en: Singaporean politician, current Senior Minister of Singapore, former Prime Minister of Singapore, and husband of Ho Ching.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关，由中华民国立法院的成员组成，现负责对监察委员人事案行使同意权。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of China (Taiwan), which currently holds the power to approve nominations for the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领、政治人物，曾任中国国民党副主席、行政院院长、国防部部长、中华民国陆军一级上将。
台湾革命家、政治家和作家，曾任民主进步党主席，被誉为“台湾曼德拉”。他曾于2001年与访问台湾的魏京生会晤，陈明通也曾参加其有关两岸原则的记者会。此外，他还曾指控江鹏坚为调查局卧底。
description.en: A Taiwanese revolutionary, politician, and writer, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, known as 'Taiwan's Mandela'. He met with Wei Jingsheng during his visit to Taiwan in 2001, and Chen Ming-tong also attended his press conference regarding cross-strait principles. Additionally, he once accused Chiang Peng-chien of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席、立法院副院长
中华人民共和国外交官。
中华人民共和国直辖市，夏宝龙的出生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Xia Baolong.

description.zh-cn: 香港凤凰卫视记者、制片人，曾担任「风云对话」节目主持人。
马英九的妻子。
位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、法学学者、教授与律师。曾任中华民国总统（第14－15任）、行政院大陆委员会主任委员、民主进步党主席等职务。在陈明通担任国家安全局局长、大陆委员会主任委员和副主任委员期间，是其上司。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), who served as the President of the Republic of China and was a former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council. She was also Chen Ming-tong's superior during his tenures as Director-General of the National Security Bureau, Minister and Deputy Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。曾任立法院院长、副院长、立法委员、中国国民党副主席等职，是中华民国宪政史上最资深的立法委员，也是国会全面改选后任期最长的立法院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. He served as President of the Legislative Yuan, Vice President, Legislator, and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the most senior legislator in the constitutional history of the Republic of China and the longest-serving President of the Legislative Yuan since its full reelection.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期政治人物，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。宣统年间，他担任监国摄政王，此职位是清朝末年为辅佐幼帝宣统帝而设立的。他也是清朝最后的实际统治者之一。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). During the Xuantong era, he served as the Prince-Regent, a position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young Xuantong Emperor. He was also one of the last de facto rulers of the Qing dynasty.

en: Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 这是中国抗日战争时期由汪精卫在日本扶植下成立的亲日傀儡政权，首都设于南京。它被普遍认为是与大日本帝国合作的伪政府，曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: Established by Wang Jingwei and fostered by Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War, this pro-Japanese puppet government had its capital in Nanjing. It was widely regarded as a collaborationist regime that cooperated with the Empire of Japan, and famously invited Mei Lanfang to perform, which he refused.

description.zh-cn: 指1868年至1947年间的日本。作为第二次世界大战的轴心国之一，它是中国抗日战争（第二次中日战争）的主要参战方，对中国发动侵略，其关东军部署在中国东北，并扶植了汪精卫国民政府等多个傀儡政权。它还是1932年至1945年间满洲国的宗主国，其军队对毛福梅的死亡负有直接责任。在二战期间，它还占领了新加坡。此外，它也是日俄战争的参战国之一并取得胜利。
description.en: Refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947. As one of the Axis powers during World War II, it was a major combatant in the Anti-Japanese War (Second Sino-Japanese War), invading China, deploying its Kwantung Army in Northeast China, and establishing several puppet regimes, including the Wang Jingwei regime. It was also the suzerain of Manchukuo from 1932 to 1945, and its military was directly responsible for Mao Fumei's death. During WWII, it also occupied Singapore. Furthermore, it was a combatant in the Russo-Japanese War and emerged victorious.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府要员。战后被国民政府判处死刑，后减为无期徒刑，病死于狱中。
description.en: A key official in the Wang Jingwei regime. After the war, he was sentenced to death by the Nationalist Government, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. He died in prison from illness.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，由越南共产党一党专政。于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: A socialist state at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, under the single-party rule of the Communist Party of Vietnam. It became a BRICS partner in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 时任越共中央总书记、中央军委书记
越南唯一的执政党，对越南行政、立法、司法各个部门的机构直接掌控。
description.en: The sole ruling party of Vietnam, directly controlling the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of government.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇。他是大日本帝国在二战期间的国家元首与军队最高统帅，并在战争末期做出接受《波茨坦宣言》、结束战争的最终决定，通过“玉音放送”向全国宣布投降。他也是田中角荣担任首相时的在位天皇。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan. He reigned as the head of state and supreme commander of the military of the Empire of Japan during World War II, making the final decision to accept the Potsdam Declaration and end the war, and announcing the surrender to the nation via the Gyokuon-hōsō. He also reigned during Kakuei Tanaka's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国全面抗日战争的开始。
1932年，由大日本帝国关东军在中国东北地区扶植建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by the Kwantung Army of the Empire of Japan in Northeast China in 1932.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝爱新觉罗·溥仪，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝。由慈禧太后临终前指定继位，后被关东军扶植为满洲国执政与皇帝，也是满洲国的唯一一位君主。
description.en: Aisin-Gioro Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing dynasty, later installed by the Kwantung Army as the emperor of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 一场1939年至1945年爆发的全球性军事冲突，主要由轴心国与同盟国之间进行。罗斯福领导美国加入同盟国参战，艾森豪威尔在此期间担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。在此期间，伯克利的实验室承包了原子弹研发计划。日本的投降标志着其亚洲战场的结束。
description.en: A global military conflict mainly between the Axis powers and the Allies, in which Roosevelt led the United States as part of the Allied powers. Eisenhower served as the Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during this period. Berkeley's laboratory also undertook the atomic bomb development project during this time. The Asian theatre of this conflict concluded with the surrender of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中首场大型会战，也是规模最大、战斗最激烈的战役之一。
日本中国派遣军总司令官，代表日本在中国战区投降。
中华民国军事将领，国民革命军陆军二级上将。在枣宜会战中阵亡，是二战中同盟国牺牲的最高级别将领之一。

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州山景城

description.zh-cn: 总部位于美国加利福尼亚州山景城的跨国科技公司，为Alphabet的子公司，专注于互联网相关服务和产品，业务范围涵盖互联网广告、互联网搜索、云计算等领域。
description.en: An American multinational technology company, a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., specializing in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

description.zh-cn: Google公司在中华人民共和国的运营实体，曾运营google.cn。其搜索服务于2010年停止运营并转至香港。
description.en: The operating entity of Google in the People's Republic of China. Its search services ceased operations and were redirected to Hong Kong in 2010.

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。他坚决反对内容审查，支持退出中国市场。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He firmly opposed content censorship and supported withdrawing from the Chinese market.

description.zh-cn: 中国主要的搜索引擎公司和科技公司，Google在中国的主要竞争对手。其搜索引擎曾将“温云松”设为敏感词并限制搜索结果。
description.en: A Chinese technology company whose search engine once designated 'Wen Yunsong' as a sensitive term and restricted search results.

description.zh-cn: 美国的互联网服务公司，是Google的竞争对手，也曾有过合作关系。
description.en: An American web services provider, a competitor and former partner of Google.

location.zh-cn: 中国大陆、台湾海峡、中缅边境
location.en: Mainland China, Taiwan Strait, China–Burma border

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国爆发的规模最大、影响最深远的内战，分为两个阶段，是中国现代史的重大转折点。
description.en: The largest and most influential civil war in 20th century China, divided into two stages, marking a major turning point in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦司法机构的最高级别法院。
由英国统治的全球帝国，在1921年达到巅峰。它在鸦片战争中作为主要西方列强，与清朝进行了两次战争，其中是发动第二次鸦片战争的主要国家之一。此外，它也是新加坡在1824年至1963年间的宗主国。作为第二次世界大战的同盟国之一，汪精卫国民政府于1943年对其宣战。
description.en: A global empire ruled by the United Kingdom, which reached its peak in 1921. It was the main Western power in the Opium Wars, fighting against the Qing dynasty in both conflicts, and was one of the main countries that initiated the Second Opium War. It also served as the sovereign state of Singapore from 1824 to 1963. As one of the Allied powers in World War II, the Wang Jingwei regime declared war against it in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，以美国为首的西方阵营与以苏联为首的东方阵营（及其各自盟友）之间，围绕地缘政治展开的紧张对峙和政治对抗。美国总统艾森豪威尔的任期是冷战的关键时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension and political confrontation after World War II, primarily between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union and their respective allies. Eisenhower's presidency was a key period of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月11日发生在美国本土的一系列自杀式恐怖袭击事件，由基地组织策划。
description.en: A series of four coordinated suicide terrorist attacks by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda against the United States on September 11, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 美国历史上规模最大、最惨烈的内战。
美国牧师、社会运动家、民权运动领袖。
俄罗斯共产主义革命家、政治家、政治理论家和思想家，苏维埃俄国和苏联的主要缔造者和首任政府首脑，共产国际的创始人。其思想影响了中国共产党早期的民族政策。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, the main founder of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union, and founder of the Communist International.

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国和最大加盟共和国。

zh-cn: 乌克兰苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国。
苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟解体事件，指苏联于20世纪90年代初停止存在并分裂为多个主权国家的过程，此后列宁主义的影响力在一些国家下降。
苏联政治家，勃列日涅夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
苏联政治家，安德罗波夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
英国政治家，曾任英国首相。她曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判；马尔康·芮夫金曾在其内阁中担任苏格兰事务大臣。
description.en: British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. She negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong; Malcolm Rifkind served as Secretary of State for Scotland in her cabinet.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的国家，由朝鲜劳动党实行一党专政。该国是朝鲜战争的主要参战方，其军队是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。近期，该国被指控向俄罗斯提供武器及派遣士兵参与战争。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War, whose army was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement. It has also been accused of supplying weapons and sending soldiers to participate in the war on Russia's side.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的共和制国家。朝鲜战争的主要参战方之一。由于时任总统李承晚的反对，大韩民国并未签署《朝鲜停战协定》。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War. Due to the opposition of then-President Syngman Rhee, the Republic of Korea did not sign the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 根据联合国安理会决议成立，由美国领导的多国部队，在朝鲜战争中支援大韩民国并与中国人民志愿军作战。该司令部是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: A multinational military force established under a UN Security Council resolution and led by the United States to support South Korea and fight against the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War. The command is a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。他曾因反对以三八线为界停战而拒绝在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly. He refused to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to his opposition to a ceasefire along the 38th parallel.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，罗斯福的最后一任副总统，在其逝世后接任总统。他批准对日本使用原子弹，并接受了日本的投降。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States, Roosevelt's final Vice President who succeeded him as President upon his death. He authorized the use of atomic bombs against Japan and accepted its surrender.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，军事家、政治家，曾任第34任美国总统。第二次世界大战期间，他担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。
description.en: An American military officer and statesman who served as the 34th president of the United States. He was a five-star general in the United States Army and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方和《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的战区之一，地理范围包括东亚、东南亚、太平洋、印度洋和大洋洲。它是二战地理上规模最大的战场。
description.en: One of the theaters of World War II, with a geographical scope including East Asia, Southeast Asia, the Pacific Ocean, the Indian Ocean, and Oceania. It was the largest theater of war geographically in WWII.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古军政府总裁。
由美、英、中三国发表的对日最后通牒，要求日本无条件投降，否则将面临“迅速且完全的毁灭”。
description.en: An ultimatum issued by the United States, United Kingdom, and China, demanding Japan's unconditional surrender under threat of 'prompt and utter destruction'.

description.zh-cn: 中、美、英三国元首发表，要求日本归还窃取于中国的领土。
林立果等人组成的秘密组织，旨在策划武装政变。
负责中共中央领导人警卫工作的部队，代号为中共中央警卫团。
解放军南京军区空军政委，林立果“联合舰队”成员。

zh-cn: 江油未成年人欺凌事件

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市江油市

description.zh-cn: 一宗因未成年人欺凌案及后续警方处理引发大规模警民冲突的群体性事件。
中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省份。
description.en: A province in Southwest China.

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省邯郸市

description.zh-cn: 三名初中生涉嫌杀害同学的案件，引发对未成年人犯罪的广泛讨论。
中国的微博客网站，曾完全封锁与“温云松”相关的微博。
description.en: A Chinese microblogging website that once completely blocked posts related to 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，曾获世界新闻自由奖
中国维权律师、美国天主教大学访问学者

zh-cn: 2025年陕西蒲城职校学生坠楼事件

en: Armed Forces of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，包括中国人民解放军、中国人民武装警察部队和民兵。
戴笠的继任者，先后掌管军统局、保密局、情报局。
指台湾作家刘宜良在美国遭枪杀的政治谋杀事件，因其笔名为“江南”而得名。此案牵涉到台湾的情报机构，并对蒋氏家族的声誉造成重创。
description.en: Refers to the political assassination of Taiwanese writer Henry Liu in the United States. The case implicated Taiwan's intelligence agencies and severely damaged the reputation of the Chiang family.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军二级上将，曾任国防部情报局局长，因江南案下台并被捕入狱。
description.en: An admiral in the Republic of China Navy, former director of the Military Intelligence Bureau, who was arrested and imprisoned, and subsequently stepped down due to the Henry Liu case.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首列表
en: List of state representatives of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家机构

description.zh-cn: 中国少年儿童的群众组织，中国共产党领导下的儿童组织。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese children, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功的创始人、精神领袖。其出生日期存在争议，中国政府称其出生于1952年7月7日，李洪志本人称该日期为文革期间的错误登记，其实际生日为1951年5月13日。
description.en: Founder and spiritual leader of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体报导的事件，法轮功方面指其为政府导演的伪案，是镇压宣传战的转折点。
由法轮功学员创办的媒体机构。
由大纪元时报发表的系列社论，批判共产主义和中国共产党。
一家总部位于美国的中国古典舞和传统音乐艺术团。
description.en: A US-based performing arts and entertainment company known for classical Chinese dance and traditional music.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师
日本现任天皇
日本现任内阁总理大臣
日本国会的下议院
传说中日本的初代天皇
日本第38代天皇（天智天皇）
镰仓幕府首任征夷大将军
由成吉思汗建立的横跨欧亚大陆的帝国，元朝的前身，后灭亡金朝与南宋。蒙哥是其第四位大汗。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan, of which Möngke was the fourth Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 江户幕府首任征夷大将军
