He was the second son of the Xuande Emperor and the younger half-brother of the Zhengtong Emperor. He ascended the throne after his brother was captured in the Tumu Crisis, and was later deposed by his brother in the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗在位前十年，在张居正的辅佐下，明朝出现的短暂中兴局面。
明穆宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝，明代在位时间最长的皇帝，明光宗之父。
中国明朝末期宦官，天启年间权倾朝野，人称“九千岁”。他掌控朝政，与客氏结盟，拉拢齐楚浙党组成阉党，残酷打击东林党人。其党羽曾与袁崇焕在辽东事务上产生摩擦。崇祯帝即位后，他被清算，最终畏罪自杀，尸身被凌迟。
description.en: A Chinese eunuch who lived in the late Ming dynasty. Known as the 'Nine Thousand Years', he held immense power during the Tianqi era and controlled the court. He formed a political alliance with Madam Ke and created the 'Eunuch Party' by aligning with officials from the Qi, Chu, and Zhe factions, brutally persecuting the Donglin Party. His associates clashed with Yuan Chonghuan over Liaodong affairs. He was purged after the Chongzhen Emperor ascended the throne, eventually committing suicide to avoid capture, and his corpse was subjected to lingchi.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年的一个士大夫政治集团，主张开放言路、澄清吏治，在天启年间遭到阉党的残酷打击。
description.en: A political faction of scholar-officials in the late Ming dynasty who advocated for open criticism and clean governance. They were brutally suppressed by the Eunuch Party during the Tianqi era.

zh-cn: 弗朗茨二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡-洛林王朝成员，神圣罗马帝国末任皇帝。为应对拿破仑称帝，他创立奥地利皇位并成为首任奥地利皇帝（弗朗茨一世）。1806年奥斯特里茨战役战败后，他于8月6日宣布解散神圣罗马帝国。
description.en: A member of the House of Habsburg-Lorraine and the last Holy Roman Emperor. In response to Napoleon crowning himself emperor, he founded the Austrian imperial title and became the first Emperor of Austria (as Francis I). After the defeat at the Battle of Austerlitz, he announced the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire on August 6, 1806.

description.zh-cn: 法兰克王国国王，800年被加冕为“罗马人的皇帝”。

zh-cn: 查理五世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡王朝的君主，同时统治神圣罗马帝国和西班牙帝国。
统治伊朗的最后一个王朝。
伊拉克共和国。
前伊拉克总统，曾发动两伊战争，其政权在美国发动的伊拉克战争中被推翻。
description.en: Former President of Iraq, whose regime was overthrown in the U.S.-led Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 以色列国。在军事上与新加坡关系紧密，曾派遣军官指导新加坡军队的建立。
description.en: Has close military ties with Singapore and once sent military officers to guide the establishment of the Singaporean army.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国的武装部队之一，负责维护伊斯兰教义和国内秩序。
国际联盟就九一八事变派出的调查团所做的报告，结论是满洲国非独立运动产物。
日本陆军中将，九一八事变策划者之一。
沙乌地阿拉伯奉行的官方意识形态，属逊尼派一支。
伊斯兰教的主要教派之一，在沙乌地阿拉伯为少数派并受到压制。
伊斯兰教的核心宗教文本，被视为沙乌地阿拉伯的最高宪法。
原中共中央军委办公室主任。

en: Death and state funeral of Jiang Zemin

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继五代十国之后的朝代，与南宋合称宋朝。其为宋朝的前半期，首都为东京开封府。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history following the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. Together with the Southern Song, it forms the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋开国皇帝，史称宋太祖。他是一位政治家和军事家，曾任后周殿前都点检，是宋太宗的胞兄。他下令征讨南汉。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, known as Emperor Taizu of Song. He was a politician and military general, formerly Supreme Commander of the Palace Guard of Later Zhou, and elder brother of Emperor Taizong of Song. He ordered the conquest of Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期最后一个朝代。
后周最后一位皇帝，被迫禅位予赵匡胤。
北宋第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, younger brother of Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 金朝攻破北宋首都东京开封府，俘虏宋徽宗、宋钦宗二帝，导致北宋灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in which the Jin dynasty conquered the Northern Song capital, Tokyo, and captured Emperors Huizong and Qinzong, leading to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋开国皇帝，宋徽宗第九子，宋钦宗之弟。
南宋抗金名将、民族英雄，中兴四将之一。
南宋宰相，主和派代表人物，被认为是害死岳飞的主谋。
南宋最后一位皇帝。
北宋政治家、改革家，在宋神宗支持下推行新法，主导熙宁变法。
description.en: A politician and reformer of the Northern Song dynasty who, with the support of Emperor Shenzong, implemented the New Policies, leading the Xining Reforms.

description.zh-cn: 北宋政治家、史学家，作为守旧派领袖，激烈反对王安石变法。
description.en: A politician and historian of the Northern Song dynasty. As the leader of the conservative faction, he vehemently opposed the Wang Anshi Reforms.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第六位皇帝，宋徽宗之父。在位期间，因对北宋积贫积弱的状况深感忧心，启用王安石推行熙宁变法，并对外发动熙河开边，意图富国强兵，但变法引发了剧烈的新旧党争，对外军事行动也遭遇永乐城之战的惨败。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, father of Emperor Huizong. During his reign, concerned about the state's poverty and weakness, he appointed Wang Anshi to implement the Xining Reforms and launched the Xihe Expansion campaign, aiming to enrich the state and strengthen its military. However, the reforms triggered intense factional struggles, and his foreign military campaigns suffered a disastrous defeat at the Battle of Yongle City.

description.zh-cn: 为对抗北约而成立的军事集团。
联合国的主要机构之一，曾通过决议授权北约采取军事行动，并通过第84号决议授权组建了联合国军。
description.en: One of the principal organs of the United Nations, which authorized the formation of the United Nations Command through Resolution 84.

description.zh-cn: 利比亚前领导人，其政权是2011年北约军事干预的目标。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国政治及军事人物，前朝鲜党和国家领导干部，曾一度被视为朝鲜实际上的“二号人物”。他曾任国家体育指导委员会首任委员长，是金正恩的姑父。
description.en: A political and military figure in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a former high-ranking official of the Workers' Party and the state, once considered the de facto 'second-in-command' of North Korea. He served as the first Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and was Kim Jong Un's uncle by marriage.

birth_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国江原道川内郡

death_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国平壤市

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。2011年至2015年担任Google首席执行官。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He served as the CEO of Google from 2011 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: Google于2015年重组后成立的控股母公司，总部位于美国。
description.en: The holding parent company established after Google's restructuring in 2015, headquartered in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 自2015年起担任Google的首席执行官。
description.en: CEO of Google since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 一款由Google主导开发并持续更新的移动设备操作系统，于2005年被Google公司收购。
description.en: A mobile operating system primarily developed and continuously updated by Google, acquired by Google in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府在其管辖互联网内部建立的互联网审查系统，常被称为“互联网边界审查系统”，导致“温云松”等词成为网络搜索的敏感词。
description.en: The common term for the Internet censorship system of the Chinese government, which has made terms like 'Wen Yunsong' sensitive for web searches.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年将领，督师。
明世宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝
description.en: Third son of the Jiajing Emperor, the 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗长子，明朝第十五位皇帝。
意大利耶稣会传教士、学者，天主教在中国传教的开拓者之一，也是第一位阅读中国文学并对汉字有深入了解的西方人。
description.en: An Italian Jesuit priest and one of the founding figures of the Jesuit China missions. He is considered a Servant of God by the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅、明穆宗顾命大臣。在明神宗即位之初被冯保和张居正排挤。此外，他还曾被任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty and a regent appointed by Emperor Muzong. He was later pushed out by Feng Bao and Zhang Juzheng at the beginning of Emperor Shenzong's reign. Additionally, he was appointed as the general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗第三子，郑贵妃所生，明光宗异母弟，是国本之争的核心人物之一。
日本战国时代末期至安土桃山时代的武将、天下人，发动了侵略朝鲜的战争。
蒙哥的弟弟，伊儿汗国的建立者，领导了第三次蒙古西征。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, founder of the Ilkhanate, who led the third Mongol invasion of the West.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年权相。
香港女星，倪匡的儿媳，亦舒的侄媳，倪震的妻子。
description.en: Hong Kong celebrity, daughter-in-law of Ni Kuang, niece-in-law of Yi Shu, and wife of Joe Nieh.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的胞妹，华裔加拿大籍香港文艺小说作家，原籍浙江镇海。其作品的女主角多为自爱自强的都市女性，影响了众多中文读者。
description.en: Younger sister of Ni Kuang, a Chinese-Canadian Hong Kong romance novelist, with ancestral roots in Zhenhai, Zhejiang. The heroines in her works are mostly self-respecting and strong-willed urban women, influencing numerous Chinese readers.

description.zh-cn: 金庸的武侠小说。
description.en: Wuxia novel by Jin Yong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾著名武侠小说家，原名熊耀华。籍贯江西南昌，出生于香港，后定居台湾。他创作了《楚留香传奇》、《绝代双骄》等多部脍炙人口的武侠小说，作品屡次被改编为影视剧。
description.en: A renowned Taiwanese wuxia novelist, originally named Xiong Yaohua. Born in Hong Kong and later settled in Taiwan, his ancestral home was Nanchang, Jiangxi. He authored many popular wuxia novels such as the 'Chu Liuxiang Series' and 'Juedai Shuangjiao', which have been frequently adapted into films and television series.

description.zh-cn: 后周开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，由李昪建立，历三主，共三十九年。曾与南汉为友好邻邦。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, founded by Li Bian, lasting three rulers for a total of thirty-nine years. It was once a friendly neighboring state to Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期最后一个割据政权
description.en: The last of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 南唐末代君主，中国历史上首屈一指的词人，后人誉为“千古词帝”。他是小周后与大周后的丈夫。曾受宋太祖之命劝说南汉归降。被北宋俘虏后，曾获封第一个封号，宋太宗即位后改封其爵位。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang, a famous poet, and the husband of Lesser Empress Zhou and Great Empress Zhou. He was instructed by Emperor Taizu of Song to persuade Southern Han to submit. After being captured by the Northern Song, he received an initial title, which was later changed by Emperor Taizong of Song.

description.zh-cn: 曾任浙江省副书记兼省长
中国政治人物，曾任浙江省副书记兼省长、浙江省人大常委会主任，以及孟凡利的继任烟台市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as former Deputy Secretary and Governor of Zhejiang Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress. He was also Meng Fanli's successor as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省委书记、省人大常委会主任，以及江西省人民政府省长。此前，他接替袁家军担任浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who formerly served as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress, and Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government. He previously succeeded Yuan Jiajun as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
香港电影制片人，徐克前妻。
香港政界及传媒人。
中国影视公司
中国导演、摄影师、演员，也是中国“第五代导演”的代表人物之一，曾与巩俐有过长期的电影合作和个人情感关系。
description.en: Chinese film director, producer, writer, and actor, and a representative figure of China's 'Fifth Generation directors', who had a long-term professional collaboration and personal relationship with Gong Li.

description.zh-cn: 李讷与徐宁的儿子。
位于中亚的突厥-波斯王朝，后被蒙古所灭。
蒙古高原的部落之一，与成吉思汗家族有世仇。
岳飞之孙，岳霖之子
南宋初期的军事将领，主战派将领，曾为岳飞鸣不平。
促进全球警务合作和犯罪控制的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization that facilitates worldwide police cooperation and crime control.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、医师，台湾民众党创党主席，曾任台北市市长，柯美兰的胞兄。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, founding chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, former Mayor of Taipei, and the elder brother of Ko Mei-lan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、护理师，台湾民众党籍。
中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，傅兆林之子。现任立法委员、中国国民党立法院党团总召集人，并担任中国国民党中央委员会政策委员会执行长。曾任花莲县县长。他是大罢免运动中罢免泛蓝阵营的指标性人物之一，也是徐榛蔚的丈夫。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, son of Fu Zhaolin. He is a KMT legislator and currently serves as the caucus convener for the KMT in the Legislative Yuan, and also as the Executive Director of the KMT Policy Committee. He previously served as Hualien County Magistrate. He was one of the iconic targets of the recall effort against the Pan-Blue camp during the Great Recall movement, and is the husband of Hsu Chen-wei.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明仁宗朱高炽长子，明英宗和景泰帝的父亲，朱高煦之侄。他平定了叔父朱高煦的叛乱，并非常器重于谦。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, eldest son of the Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi, father of Emperor Yingzong and the Jingtai Emperor, and nephew of Zhu Gaoxu. He suppressed the rebellion of his uncle Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第七位皇帝，宋神宗的第六子和继任者，宋徽宗之兄。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, the sixth son and successor of Emperor Shenzong, and elder brother of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，宋徽宗时期“六贼”之一，被认为是导致北宋灭亡的奸臣。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty, one of the "Six Traitors" during Emperor Huizong's reign, considered a corrupt official who contributed to the fall of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 金朝第二位皇帝，发动靖康之变，俘虏了宋徽宗和宋钦宗。
description.en: The second emperor of the Jin dynasty, who launched the Jingkang Incident and captured Emperor Huizong and Emperor Qinzong.

description.zh-cn: 由契丹族建立的统治中国北方的封建王朝，与北宋长期对峙。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Khitan people that ruled northern China and was a long-term rival of the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉第二位、也是最后一位皇帝，刘备之子。
description.en: The second and last emperor of Shu Han, son of Liu Bei.

birth_place.en: Yangdu County, Langya Commandery, Eastern Han

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，刘备的主要辅佐大臣，受刘备托孤辅佐刘禅。他也是诸葛瑾之弟，诸葛乔的养父。他是一位杰出的政治家、军事家、发明家及散文家，曾于228年征集兵丁守护都江堰，并设立专职堰官进行管理。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, he served as regent for Liu Shan on Liu Bei's request. He was the younger brother of Zhuge Jin and the adoptive father of Zhuge Qiao. An outstanding statesman, military strategist, inventor, and writer, he also conscripted soldiers in 228 to guard Dujiangyan and established specialized weir officials for its management.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将，刘备的义弟兼主要部将之一。他曾与鲁肃就荆州问题进行谈判。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han from the late Eastern Han to the Three Kingdoms period, Liu Bei's sworn brother and one of his key commanders. He once negotiated with Lu Su regarding the Jing Province issue.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将，刘备的义弟，刘禅的岳父，五虎上将之一。
description.en: A military general serving under the warlord Liu Bei in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period of China, and the father-in-law of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，官至征南将军。他曾在长坂坡保护刘禅。
description.en: A renowned military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, who held the rank of General Who Conquers the South. He famously protected Liu Shan at Changban.

description.zh-cn: 孙策之弟，三国时期孙吴开国皇帝，六朝开拓者之首。
description.en: Younger brother of Sun Ce, and founder of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将及割据军阀。
东汉末年军阀，袁熙之父。
东汉末年荆州牧，其去世引发了曹操南下及赤壁之战。
description.en: The governor of Jing Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty, whose death triggered Cao Cao's southern campaign and the Battle of Red Cliffs.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀
蜀汉重臣，与诸葛亮同为刘备的托孤之臣。
description.en: A key official of Shu Han, co-regent with Zhuge Liang for Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 原为刘璋的部下，与张松关系良好。后与张松一同策划并协助刘备夺取益州，成为刘备的谋士。在取益州和汉中时多有贡献。
description.en: Originally a subordinate of Liu Zhang and an associate of Zhang Song. He later conspired with Zhang Song to assist Liu Bei in taking control of Yi Province, after which he became Liu Bei's strategist. He made significant contributions during the campaigns to take Yi Province and Hanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的第九子，也是嫡三子。他是李泰的胞弟。在李承干被废后，被立为皇太子，后继位为唐高宗，成为唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The ninth son of Emperor Taizong Li Shimin, and also his third legitimate son. He was a full brother of Li Tai. After Li Chengqian's deposition, he was made crown prince and later succeeded the throne as Emperor Gaozong, becoming the third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治第五子，武则天长子。
唐朝皇子，即后来的唐中宗，曾两次在位，是唐朝第四位和第六位皇帝。
description.en: A prince of the Tang dynasty, later Emperor Zhongzong, who reigned twice as the fourth and sixth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 武则天建立的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty established by Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期的著名宰相。
description.en: A famous chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝皇后，咸丰帝生母。
清朝后期政治家、思想家、文学家和学者，以在广东发起的禁烟运动及虎门销烟而闻名，是第一次鸦片战争中的关键人物。他主张了解和学习西方技术，被认为是中国近代“开眼看世界的第一人”。
description.en: A prominent Chinese scholar and official of the late Qing dynasty, best known for his role in the First Opium War and the destruction of opium at Humen. He was a proponent of learning from Western technology and is considered the 'first person to open his eyes to the world' in modern China.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝开国皇帝，唐太宗李世民之父。隋末时于晋阳起兵，攻入长安，废隋恭帝杨侑后称帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Tang dynasty and the father of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin. He rebelled in Jinyang during the late Sui, captured Chang'an, and proclaimed himself emperor after deposing Emperor Gong Yang You.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊四子，与李建成结盟，在玄武门之变中被李世民所杀。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Gaozu of Tang, allied with Li Jiancheng, and was killed by Li Shimin's forces during the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由李世民发动的宫廷政变，通过杀死兄长李建成和四弟李元吉，确立了其皇位继承权。
description.en: A palace coup launched by Li Shimin, securing his succession to the throne by killing his elder brother Li Jiancheng and younger brother Li Yuanji.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，李泰的母亲，以贤德著称。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong of Tang, mother of Li Tai, known for her virtue and wisdom.

description.zh-cn: 隋末唐初的群雄之一。他在洛阳废隋恭帝杨侗自立，建立郑国。虎牢之战后投降唐朝。
description.en: One of the warlords during the late Sui and early Tang dynasties. He deposed Emperor Gong Yang Tong in Luoyang, established himself as emperor, and founded the state of Zheng. After the Battle of Hulao, he surrendered to the Tang.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝作为中亚和北亚各民族的国际同盟之主的称号，始于唐太宗。
description.en: A title for the Tang emperor as the head of an international alliance of various peoples in Central and North Asia, starting with Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗时期的主要谋士和宰相，与房玄龄并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A key advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong, known for his decisive judgment.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛北部的古代王国，曾与隋朝和唐朝发生多次大规模战争，亦与新朝关系恶化。
description.en: An ancient kingdom on the Korean Peninsula that engaged in prolonged warfare with the Tang and Sui dynasties, and also had deteriorating relations with the Xin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗第四子，深得宠爱，与太子李承干争夺储位，后被贬。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Taizong, highly favored by his father, who vied for the crown prince position with Li Chengqian and was later demoted.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃赞普，统一青藏高原，并与唐朝和亲。
description.en: Emperor of the Tibetan Empire who unified the Tibetan Plateau and established a marriage alliance with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宗室女，嫁予吐蕃赞普松赞干布，是唐蕃和亲的重要人物。
description.en: A Tang imperial clanswoman who married Tibetan Emperor Songtsen Gampo, a key figure in the Tang-Tibetan marriage alliance.

description.zh-cn: 位于青藏高原的帝国，与唐朝既有战争也有和亲。
description.en: An empire on the Tibetan Plateau that had both conflicts and marriage alliances with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆帝的原配妻子和第一任皇后。
嘉庆帝的第二任皇后。
乾隆朝权臣，嘉庆帝亲政后被赐死。
毛岸青之妻，毛新宇之母，中国军事科学院军事百科研究部副部长。
毛泽东嫡孙，毛岸青与邵华之子。中国军事研究员，中国人民解放军少将。
中国软件公司。
description.en: A Chinese software company.

description.zh-cn: 美国农业科技公司。
明朝第九位皇帝，明英宗长子。他原为太子，曾被景泰帝废黜，后复位并即位为帝。即位后，他恢复了叔叔景泰帝的帝号，并为于谦平反。他是明世宗之祖父。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty. He was the eldest son of Emperor Yingzong, originally the crown prince, but was deposed by the Jingtai Emperor. He was later reinstated as crown prince and ascended the throne. Upon his ascension, he restored his uncle's imperial title. He was also the grandfather of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇的母亲，秦庄襄王之妻。原为吕不韦的姬妾。
description.en: The wife of King Zhuangxiang of Qin and the mother of Qin Shi Huang. She was originally a concubine of Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 战国末年秦国人物，秦始皇之母赵姬的面首。后因发动叛乱失败被车裂处死。
description.en: Lover of Queen Dowager Zhao, later executed for rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇长子，原定的皇位继承人。
description.en: The eldest son and original heir of Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇幼子，秦朝第二位皇帝。
description.en: The youngest son of Qin Shi Huang and the second emperor of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，文学家、书法家，法家代表人物，韩非的同学。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty, a key Legalist figure, and a fellow student of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝宦官，中车府令，与李斯合谋发动沙丘之变，后陷害李斯。
description.en: A powerful eunuch of the Qin dynasty and a key conspirator in the Sand Dune Coup.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，秦灭六国战争中的主要将领之一。
description.en: A leading general of the state of Qin during the wars of unification.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期韩国法家思想家，法家思想的代表人物与集大成者。他曾多次上书韩桓惠王，要求推行法治以图富强。后为李斯的同学，但最终被李斯所害。
description.en: A Legalist philosopher from the State of Han during the late Warring States period, he was a representative and synthesizer of the Legalist school. He repeatedly submitted memorials to King Huanhui of Han, advocating for the implementation of the rule of law to strengthen the state. He was a fellow student of Li Si and was later executed by him.

description.zh-cn: 楚考烈王之子，曾任秦国丞相，并以秦国公子身份奉命平定嫪毐之乱，后叛秦归楚。
description.en: Son of King Kaolie of Chu, who served as Chancellor of Qin, was honored as a Prince of Qin, and was ordered to suppress the Lao Ai rebellion, before rebelling and returning to Chu.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期刺客，受燕太子丹之托刺杀秦王失败。
description.en: An assassin of the late Warring States period, known for his failed attempt to assassinate Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，出身于韩国贵族，其祖父与父亲曾五代相韩。曾策划博浪沙行刺秦始皇，后为汉初三杰之一。汉初，曾作为大臣为吕后出谋划策，保住太子刘盈的地位。
description.en: A founding father of the Han Dynasty, who came from the nobility of the State of Han, and whose grandfather and father served as chancellors to five generations of Han rulers. He plotted an assassination attempt on Qin Shi Huang at Bolangsha and later became a key strategist for the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的诸侯国，战国七雄之一，最终统一六国并建立秦朝。在战国时期，李冰曾担任蜀郡郡守。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in China, and one of the Seven Warring States. It eventually unified the other six states and established the Qin dynasty. During the Warring States period, Li Bing served as the governor of Shu Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统的中央集权制王朝。
description.en: The first unified, centralized imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代的诸侯国，姬姓韩氏，由三家分晋而来。作为战国七雄之一，它是第一个被秦国所灭的国家，也是著名思想家韩非的母国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, of the Ji family name and Han clan. It originated from the Partition of Jin. As one of the Seven Warring States, it was the first to be conquered by the State of Qin and was the home state of the famous philosopher Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一。
description.en: One of the seven major states of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 周朝时期位于长江中游地区的诸侯国，也是战国七雄之一。
description.en: A state in the middle Yangtze River region during the Zhou dynasty, and also one of the seven major states of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 古代中国南方和越南北部的各部落的统称。
description.en: A collective term for various tribes inhabiting Southern China and Northern Vietnam in ancient times.

description.zh-cn: 为抵御北方游牧民族而修筑的军事防御工程。
description.en: A series of fortifications built for military defense against northern nomadic peoples.

description.zh-cn: 林郑月娥的丈夫，数学家
description.en: Carrie Lam's husband, mathematician

description.zh-cn: 国际非政府组织，致力于倡导新闻自由。
description.en: An international non-governmental organization that advocates for freedom of the press.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯雄之子，中国人民解放军少将。
中国工程院院士，被认为是防火长城的首要设计师。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, considered to be the principal designer of the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 美国科技公司，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: An American technology company that was a partner of Unihub.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》旗下的报纸，在艾未未被捕后发表多篇社评对其进行批评。
description.en: A newspaper under the People's Daily that published multiple editorials criticizing Ai Weiwei after his arrest.

description.zh-cn: Google提供的电子邮件服务。
description.en: Email service provided by Google.

description.zh-cn: 一种用于匿名通信的自由及开放源代码软件。
description.en: Free and open-source software for enabling anonymous communication.

description.zh-cn: 美国的“红色恐慌”浪潮，又称麦卡锡主义，是20世纪50年代初在美国出现的指控他人不忠、颠覆或叛国，但没有适当证据的政治迫害行为。这种反共意识形态与台湾的白色恐怖相呼应。艾森豪威尔曾暗中反对麦卡锡主义。
description.en: The "Red Scare" wave in the United States, often referred to as McCarthyism, was a period of political persecution during the early 1950s, characterized by making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or treason without proper regard for evidence. Its anti-communist stance ideologically aligned with Taiwan's White Terror. Eisenhower covertly opposed McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 该组织在此事件中与彭帅进行视频通话，并称其安全无虞，但其做法被外界批评为帮助中国政府掩盖真相。
description.en: In this incident, the organization held video calls with Peng Shuai and claimed she was safe, but its actions were criticized by outsiders for helping the Chinese government cover up the truth.

description.zh-cn: 淞沪会战的直接导火索，两名日本军人在上海虹桥机场被中国守卫击毙。
淞沪会战日军上海派遣军司令官，后任中支那方面军司令。
德国军事顾问团团长，为国军提供作战指导。
国军团附，率领八百壮士坚守四行仓库。
上海租界青帮大老、商人、政治人物，与黄金荣、张啸林并称“上海滩三大亨”。作为青帮头目及上海地方领袖，他在四一二事件中组织力量协助国民党清党，并利用其关系配合国军作战计划，在闸北秘密修建掩体。
description.en: Du Yuesheng was a prominent Green Gang boss, businessman, and political figure in the Shanghai International Settlement, known as one of "Shanghai's Big Three" alongside Huang Jinrong and Zhang Xiaolin. As a Green Gang leader and local Shanghai figure, he organized forces to assist the Kuomintang (KMT) in the party purge during the April 12th Incident, and also utilized his connections to cooperate with KMT military plans, secretly constructing bunkers in Zhabei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省委书记、福建省人大常委会主任，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Secretary and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Fujian, and former Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 古印度王朝，其君主阿育王大力推广佛教。
佛教两大现存分支之一，主要流传于南亚和东南亚。
佛教两大现存分支之一，主要流传于东亚和西藏地区。
南梁王朝的建立者，大力扶持佛教发展，并推动汉传佛教素食传统。
印度僧人，被尊为中国禅宗的初祖。
汉传佛教的一个主要宗派，由菩提达摩传入中国。
唐代文学家、思想家、政治家，因上《谏迎佛骨表》而著名，持反对佛教立场。
汉朝开国皇帝，史称汉高祖。他击败项羽，统一中国，奠定西汉王朝。他也是刘盈（汉惠帝）与鲁元公主的父亲。
description.en: The founder and first emperor of the Han dynasty, known as Emperor Gaozu of Han. He defeated Xiang Yu in the Chu–Han Contention, unifying China and establishing the Western Han dynasty. He was the father of Liu Ying (Emperor Hui) and Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 王莽是西汉末年的政治人物、外戚及权臣。他曾任大司马，在汉哀帝时期一度失势，后哀帝死后重掌大权。最终，他篡夺西汉政权，建立新朝，成为新朝的开国皇帝，也是唯一一位皇帝。
description.en: Wang Mang was a political figure, consort kin, and powerful minister in the late Western Han dynasty. He served as Grand Marshal and briefly lost power during Emperor Ai's reign. After Emperor Ai's death, he regained control. Ultimately, he usurped the Western Han regime, established the Xin dynasty, and became its founding and sole emperor.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝。他是曹操与卞氏的嫡长子，也是曹昂的异母弟。他接受汉献帝禅让，结束东汉，并在称帝后追尊曹昂为王。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei. He was the eldest son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian, and also the half-brother of Cao Ang. After ascending to the throne, he posthumously honored Cao Ang as a king.

description.zh-cn: 秦末义军领袖之一，西楚霸王，后在楚汉战争中败给刘邦。许贡在给汉献帝的上表中曾将孙策与他相提并论。
description.en: Leader of the anti-Qin rebellion, Hegemon-King of Western Chu. He was later defeated by Liu Bang in the Chu-Han Contention. Xu Gong once compared Sun Ce to him in his memorial to Emperor Xian.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，汉惠帝刘盈和鲁元公主的母亲。刘邦死后，她临朝称制，掌握汉朝实权。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang), and the mother of Emperor Hui (Liu Ying) and Princess Yuan of Lu. After Liu Bang's death, she ruled as empress dowager and regent, holding de facto power over the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第二位皇帝，汉高祖刘邦与皇后吕雉之子，鲁元公主的弟弟。他在位期间，推行黄老学说，注重国家的休养生息和无为而治。
description.en: The second emperor of the Han Dynasty, son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and Empress Lü Zhi, and younger brother of Princess Yuan of Lu. During his reign, he promoted Huang-Lao philosophy, focusing on national recuperation and governance through inaction.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，与张良、萧何并称“汉初三杰”，与彭越、英布并称“汉初三大名将”，被后人誉为“兵仙”、“国士无双”。军事才能卓著，后被刘邦用陈平之计擒获。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty, one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han dynasty'. He was an outstanding military commander who was later captured by Liu Bang using Chen Ping's strategy.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第五位皇帝，汉高祖刘邦第四子，鲁元公主异母弟。在诸吕之乱平定后，由陈平、周勃等大臣拥立为帝。他与其子汉景帝共同开创了“文景之治”的盛世。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, fourth son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu. He was enthroned by ministers including Chen Ping and Zhou Bo after the Lü Clan Disturbance was quashed. Along with his son Emperor Jing, he initiated the prosperous 'Rule of Wen and Jing'.

description.zh-cn: 西汉政治家，建议削藩，引发七国之乱。
连接古代东西方的商道。

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省湖州市吴兴区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、记者。

birth_place.en: Dangshan County, Song Prefecture, Tang Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期后梁的开国皇帝。原为唐末参与黄巢起事的将领，后归降唐朝，官至宣武军节度使，逐渐控制朝政。907年篡唐自立，建立后梁。后为其子朱友珪所弑。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Later Liang dynasty during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. He was originally a general in the Huang Chao Rebellion in the late Tang dynasty, later surrendering to the Tang and rising to the position of military governor (jiedushi) of the Xuanwu Army, gradually seizing control of the imperial court. In 907, he usurped the Tang throne and established the Later Liang. He was later assassinated by his son, Zhu Yougui.

en: Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 唐朝灭亡后中国历史上的一个时期。
唐朝倒数第二位皇帝，后期被朱温控制，最终遭其弑杀。
description.en: The second to last emperor of the Tang dynasty, who was controlled by Zhu Wen in his later years and eventually assassinated by him.

description.zh-cn: 莫斯科大公和首位俄罗斯沙皇。
description.en: Grand Prince of Moscow and the first Tsar of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 对文化大革命时期五类“阶级敌人”（地主、富农、反革命分子、坏分子、右派分子）的统称。
北京师范大学女子附属中学党总支书记兼副校长。在北京“红八月”期间被该校红卫兵批斗致死，是北京市首位在文革中被打死的教育工作者。
description.en: Party Branch Secretary and Vice Principal of the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School. She was beaten to death by Red Guards during the 'Red August,' becoming the first educator killed in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国第二位天皇。
朝鲜独立运动家，因暗杀伊藤博文而闻名。
description.en: A Korean independence activist.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军大将、政治家，第四十任内阁总理大臣，太平洋战争期间担任日本首相，是日本军国主义的代表人物。1943年在东京会见汪精卫。
description.en: A general of the Imperial Japanese Army and politician, he served as the 40th Prime Minister of Japan during the Pacific War and was a representative figure of Japanese militarism. He met with Wang Jingwei in Tokyo in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 上海青帮头目，“上海滩三大亨”之一，后与日本合作。
京剧老生演员，杜月笙五房太太，曾与梅兰芳有过一段未获家族承认的婚姻关系。
description.en: A Peking Opera Laosheng actress, Du Yuesheng's fifth wife, who had a relationship with Mei Lanfang that was not recognized by his family.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡总理李显龙的第二任妻子，曾主掌淡马锡控股。淡马锡是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: Second wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, who formerly headed Temasek Holdings. Temasek is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的岛国和城邦，前英国殖民地。曾于1963年至1965年短暂加入马来西亚联邦，后于1965年独立建国。该地亦是邵维铭的出生地及主要活动地。巩俐于2008年成为其公民。
description.en: An island country and city-state in Southeast Asia. Formerly a British colony, it briefly joined the Federation of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965 before becoming an independent nation in 1965. It is also the birthplace and main place of activity for Shao Vee-Meng. Gong Li became a citizen in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的长期执政党，由李光耀领导，在与马来西亚联邦政府的政治较量中扮演核心角色。
description.en: The long-ruling party of Singapore, led by Lee Kuan Yew, which played a central role in the political struggle with the Malaysian federal government.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡第二任总理。
description.en: Second Prime Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨首相。
description.en: Prime Minister of Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗元配皇后，后被废。
英国女王，在丘吉尔第二次首相任期内登基。
description.en: Queen of the United Kingdom, who ascended to the throne during Churchill's second term as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立，后接受了刘禅的投降。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi, and later accepted Liu Shan's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮长子，蜀汉将领。
description.en: Eldest son of Zhuge Liang, a general of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮好友，曾向刘备举荐诸葛亮。
description.en: Friend of Zhuge Liang, recommended Zhuge Liang to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘备重要谋士，与诸葛亮齐名，号称“凤雏”。
description.en: An important advisor to Liu Bei, as famous as Zhuge Liang, known as the 'Fledgling Phoenix'.

description.zh-cn: 一种由天花病毒引起的烈性传染病。
中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个级别，仅次于国家级正职。
description.en: A rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China, second only to the national-level principal position.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国民间义士，斧头帮领袖。
description.en: A Chinese folk hero and leader of the Axe Gang during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 军统总务处处长
美国女记者。
中国历史上继西周之后的朝代。
description.en: The second half of the Zhou dynasty of ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 道教的最高神祇。
description.en: The highest deities in the Taoist pantheon.

description.zh-cn: 毛新宇的第一任妻子。
美国第28任总统，进步主义时代的领袖人物，其政治理念被称为“威尔逊主义”。他曾是学者、普林斯顿大学校长和新泽西州州长，并任命罗斯福为海军助理部长。他领导美国参加第一次世界大战，并倡导建立国际联盟。
description.en: The 28th President of the United States, a leader of the Progressive Era, whose political philosophy is known as 'Wilsonianism'. He was an academic, President of Princeton University, and Governor of New Jersey, and he appointed Roosevelt as Assistant Secretary of the Navy. He led the United States into World War I and advocated for the formation of the League of Nations.

en: List of presidents of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国国家元首和政府首脑的职位。
description.en: The office of the head of state and head of government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 二战末期，美、英、苏三国（罗斯福、丘吉尔和斯大林）首脑举行会议，商讨战后世界秩序，苏联在此会议上秘密承诺在德国投降后对日作战。
description.en: A meeting of the heads of government of the US, UK, and Soviet Union (Roosevelt, Churchill, and Stalin) held near the end of WWII to discuss the post-war reorganization of the world. During this meeting, the USSR secretly committed to entering the war against Japan after Germany's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第五子，明朝藩王，周王。建文帝时期被废为庶人。
description.en: The fifth son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 南明第一位皇帝，为建文帝平反并上庙号谥号，追尊景泰帝庙号为代宗。
description.en: The first emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty, who posthumously granted the Jingtai Emperor the temple name 'Daizong'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任花莲县县长，傅崐萁之妻，傅兆林之儿媳。
description.en: Republic of China politician, Kuomintang member, current Hualien County Magistrate, wife of Fu Kun-chi, daughter-in-law of Fu Zhaolin.

description.zh-cn: 台湾商人及前公务员。曾任台湾省政府建设厅工程师及住宅及都市发展局处长，后从商担任凯聚集团、茂凯公司董事长，亦曾任德发慈善基金董事长。其子为政治人物傅崐萁。曾因在1997年亚洲金融风暴期间违反公司法，于2010年被判处缓刑。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman and former civil servant. He served as an engineer in the Department of Construction and a director of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government. He later entered business as the chairman of Kai Chu Group and Mao Kai Company, and also served as chairman of the De Fa Charitable Foundation. His son is the politician Fu Kun-chi. He received a suspended sentence in 2010 for violating company law during the 1997 Asian financial crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任基隆市市长。
科普作家，以学术打假著称。他撰文批评《穹顶之下》，质疑其数据和叙事手法的真实性。
description.en: A popular science writer known for exposing academic misconduct. He wrote an article criticizing 'Under the Dome', questioning the authenticity of its data and narrative.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演
中国作家、编剧
中国女演员、歌手、模特儿、制片人。
中国大陆著名喜剧演员、影视演员，擅长小品和东北二人转。

zh-cn: 中国东方航空5735号班机空难

description.zh-cn: 西汉初年政治家、开国功臣，汉初三杰之一，西汉第一位相国。
description.en: An early Western Han politician and founding minister, one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han Dynasty', and the first chancellor of the Western Han.

description.zh-cn: 西汉初年异姓王，汉初三大名将之一。
西汉初年异姓王，汉初三大名将之一。
西汉初年的开国功臣，汉高祖刘邦的重要谋臣。后任丞相，在吕后逝世后，与周勃等人共同发动了“诛吕安刘”政变。
description.en: A founding minister of the early Western Han Dynasty and an important strategist for Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang. He later served as chancellor and, after the death of Empress Lü, jointly launched the 'Purge of the Lü Clan' coup with Zhou Bo and others.

description.zh-cn: 金日成长女，金正日的妹妹，张成泽的妻子。
唐代文学家，文章精切，特别擅长写诗，是中唐最具代表性的诗人之一，代表作有《长恨歌》，并倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and poet, one of the most representative poets of the mid-Tang period, author of 'Song of Everlasting Sorrow', and an advocate of the New Yuefu movement.

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州圣塔芭rbara

description.zh-cn: 白崇禧第五子，台湾著名作家，中华民国文学家及剧作家。

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员，理查德·尼克松曾担任此职。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government, an office held by Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职的重大政治丑闻。
description.en: A major political scandal that led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣、军阀，官至太师，其乱政导致许靖等人逃离京城，后被吕布所杀。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty, who served as Grand Tutor. His tyrannical rule caused figures like Xu Jing to flee the capital, and he was later killed by Lü Bu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，官至司徒，与吕布合谋诛杀董卓。
吕布的主要谋士。
董卓旧部，在董卓死后击败吕布，占据长安。
唐朝初年宰相，长孙皇后之兄。在储位之争中支持立晋王李治为太子。
description.en: An early Tang dynasty chancellor and brother of Empress Zhangsun. He supported establishing Prince Jin (Li Zhi) as the crown prince during the succession struggle.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝大臣、书法家，官至谏议大夫。他反对立李泰为太子，并为李泰出资修建的《伊阙佛龛碑》书写碑文。
description.en: A minister and calligrapher of the Tang dynasty. He opposed making Li Tai the crown prince and wrote the calligraphy for the 'Stele of the Yique Buddha Niche' sponsored by Li Tai.

description.zh-cn: 西藏流亡政府。
description.en: Tibetan government-in-exile.

description.zh-cn: 1912年至1951年西藏的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of Tibet from 1912 to 1951.

zh-cn: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第一任首相，并在其任期内下令将新加坡州自马来西亚联邦中除名。
description.en: First Prime Minister of Malaysia, who during his tenure, ordered the removal of the State of Singapore from the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 由何晶曾主掌的新加坡国有控股公司，是新天域资本公司的长期投资者。
description.en: A Singaporean state-owned holding company formerly headed by Ho Ching, which is a long-term investor in New Horizon Capital.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，现任卓荣泰内阁劳动部部长。
description.en: Minister of Labor in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及军事评论员。
台湾政治人物、政治幕僚、政治评论人、节目主持人。
周慧敏的丈夫，亦舒的侄子，作家倪匡之子。
description.en: Yi Shu's nephew, son of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 香港的媒体创作及管理人，曾赏识周慧敏。
周慧敏在台湾签约的唱片公司。
台湾歌手及音乐制作人，曾与周慧敏合唱《流言》。
明朝第十位皇帝，明世宗之伯父
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, paternal uncle of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的宠妃，比宪宗年长17岁。
description.en: The favorite consort of the Chenghua Emperor, 17 years his senior.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗设立的特务机构。
description.en: A secret service agency established by the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的一名中官，善于以诙谐幽默的方式进谏。
description.en: A court official during the Chenghua era, skilled in offering remonstrance through humor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗第四子，明世宗生父，被追尊为皇帝
description.en: Biological father of the Jiajing Emperor, posthumously honored as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的继室，曹丕、曹彰、曹植、曹熊的生母。
description.en: The formal wife of Cao Cao and mother of Cao Pi, Cao Zhang, Cao Zhi, and Cao Xiong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的长子，生母为刘夫人，由嫡母丁夫人抚养成人。二十岁时举为孝廉。后在曹操征伐张绣的宛城之战中，为救父亲而阵亡。他是曹丕与曹植的异母兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Cao Cao. His birth mother was Lady Liu, and he was raised by his adoptive mother, Lady Ding. At the age of twenty, he was nominated as Xiaolian. He was killed in the Battle of Wancheng while saving his father during the campaign against Zhang Xiu. He was the half-brother of Cao Pi and Cao Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的第二位皇帝，曹丕与文昭甄皇后之子，亦是曹昂的侄子。在位期间成功防御吴、蜀的多次攻伐，平定公孙渊叛乱。他继位后改谥曹昂为丰愍王。
description.en: The son of Cao Pi and the second emperor of Cao Wei, and the nephew of Cao Ang. After ascending the throne, he changed Cao Ang's posthumous title to King Min of Feng.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，受曹丕遗诏辅佐曹叡。
曹魏宗室名将，托孤大臣之一。
曹魏宗室将领。
曹操从弟，曹魏重要将领。
曹魏将领。
东汉末年孙吴势力的重要将领。他接替鲁肃的职务，并提出了袭取荆州的计划，且成功执行。
description.en: An important general serving under Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He succeeded Lu Su's position and proposed and successfully executed the plan to seize Jing Province.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉南郡太守，后投降东吴。
中国东汉末年至三国时代曹魏的著名将领。
description.en: A famous general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年孙吴势力的将领、战略家及外交家，为孙权策划了“榻上策”，并接替周瑜掌管军队，积极主张并维护孙刘联盟以共同对抗曹操。
description.en: A general, strategist, and diplomat serving under Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He devised the 'Tashang Ce' strategy for Sun Quan, succeeded Zhou Yu as a military commander, and was a key advocate for the Sun-Liu alliance against Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 吕布部将。
金正日的伴侣，金正恩之母。
description.en: Partner of Kim Jong-il, mother of Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的伴侣，金正男之母。
description.en: Partner of Kim Jong-il, mother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 前日本首相。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇的皇后。
description.en: Empress consort of Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，曾任学习院院长，对裕仁进行教育。
description.en: An Imperial Japanese Army general who served as the director of the Gakushūin Peer's School and educated Hirohito.

description.zh-cn: 日本海军元帅，曾任东宫御学问所总裁，对裕仁进行教育。
description.en: A fleet admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy who served as the president of the Tōgū Gogakumonsho and educated Hirohito.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军从事生物战与人体实验的研究部队。
description.en: A covert biological and chemical warfare research and development unit of the Imperial Japanese Army.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军中的政治派系，发动了二二六兵变但失败。
description.en: A political faction in the Imperial Japanese Army which launched the failed February 26 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的神社，供奉自明治维新以来为日本战死的军人及军属。
description.en: A Shinto shrine in Tokyo, Japan, dedicated to those who died in service of Japan from the Meiji Restoration.

en: Imperial Rescript on the Termination of the War

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇于1945年8月15日向日本国民广播的停战诏书，由其亲自宣读，宣布日本接受《波茨坦宣言》并结束战争。此次广播被称为“玉音放送”。
description.en: The rescript read by Emperor Hirohito on August 15, 1945, announcing Japan's surrender, its acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration, and the end of the war. The radio broadcast of this rescript is known as the Gyokuon-hōsō.

description.zh-cn: 清朝御史，曾多次挑战和珅。
胡志明是该党的创始人之一。
曹操之父，曹腾养子
东汉末年的政治家、战略家，曹操的主要谋臣之一。
曹魏将领，曹操的从兄弟
中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的著名将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China. He held the title of General Who Conquers the West at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的市，位于台湾西北部，为新竹都会区的中心城市。因九降风强盛而被称为“风城”，是全球高科技代工产业的重镇。
description.en: A city in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, located in the northwestern part of Taiwan. It is the central city of the Hsinchu metropolitan area. Known as the "Windy City" due to strong seasonal winds, it is a major hub for the global high-tech contract manufacturing industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任新北市市长，曾是中国国民党2024年总统候选人。
项羽的妻子。
项羽的主要谋士，被项羽尊为“亚父”。
description.en: A key advisor to Xiang Yu, who honored him as 'Second Father'.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年将领，受命于秦二世，率军镇压陈胜、吴广的起义。后投降项羽，被封为雍王。
description.en: A general at the end of the Qin Dynasty, who was ordered by Qin Er Shi to lead an army to suppress the uprising of Chen Sheng and Wu Guang. He later surrendered to Xiang Yu and was enfeoffed as King Yong.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的宠妃，赵王刘如意之母。刘邦死后，遭吕后残害，被制成“人彘”。
description.en: A favored consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang, and the mother of Liu Ruyi, the Prince of Zhao. After Liu Bang's death, she was brutally mutilated by Empress Lü Zhi and turned into a 'human swine'.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦第三子，其母为戚夫人。他被封为赵王，是鲁元公主和刘盈的异母弟。因刘邦宠爱，曾差点取代太子位，后被吕后毒杀。
description.en: The third son of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang and Concubine Qi. He was enfeoffed as the King of Zhao and was the half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu and Liu Ying. Due to Liu Bang's favor, he nearly replaced the crown prince, but was later poisoned to death by Empress Lü Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦的妃嫔，汉文帝刘恒之母。
苏联秘密警察头子，被怀疑谋杀了斯大林。
description.en: Head of the Soviet secret police, suspected of murdering Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的文学家、史学家、政治家。
description.en: A writer, historian, and politician during the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明智光秀于京都本能寺突袭并逼迫织田信长自杀的事件。
丰臣秀吉的侧室，丰臣秀赖的生母。
日本战国时代著名的茶道宗师，后被丰臣秀吉赐死。
中华民国作家、历史学家、政治评论人、政治人物。
明穆宗之父，明朝第十二位皇帝，年号嘉靖。他下令重录《永乐大典》以制作副本。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty, known as the Jiajing Emperor. He ordered the creation of a duplicate manuscript copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·亚历山德罗芙娜·乌里扬诺娃

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·列宁的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Vladimir Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国新泽西州普林斯顿的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊曾在此就读、任教并担任校长。
description.en: A private research university in Princeton, New Jersey. Woodrow Wilson studied, taught, and served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 前八九学运领袖，后成为牧师。
天安门母亲运动发起人之一。
叙利亚总统
联合国前秘书长
西汉最后一位皇太子，被王莽废黜。
汉元帝皇后，汉成帝之母，王莽的姑姑。作为王氏外戚的核心人物，她在汉哀帝死后重新掌握权力，为王莽的崛起铺平了道路。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Yuan of Han, mother of Emperor Cheng, and aunt of Wang Mang. As the central figure of the Wang consort clan, she regained power after Emperor Ai's death, paving the way for Wang Mang's rise.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，王莽改制的模仿对象。
西汉皇帝，汉元帝之孙，在位6年。其在位期间，试图削弱外戚王氏的势力，王莽曾被免官。他亦因与董贤的同性爱情及“断袖”典故而闻名。
description.en: An emperor of the Western Han dynasty, grandson of Emperor Yuan of Han, who reigned for 6 years. During his reign, he attempted to weaken the power of the Wang clan consort kin, leading to Wang Mang's dismissal from office. He is also known for his same-sex relationship with Dong Xian and the 'cut sleeve' anecdote.

description.zh-cn: 西汉皇帝，汉哀帝的叔父。因自己无子，立侄子刘欣为太子。王莽在其治下开始进入权力中心。
description.en: An emperor of the Western Han dynasty and uncle of Emperor Ai. Lacking an heir of his own, he appointed his nephew Liu Xin as crown prince. Wang Mang began to enter the center of power during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾南部的直辖市。
description.en: A special municipality in southern Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩的二哥。
为温州中学校歌作词。
由释弘一填词的歌曲。
中华人民共和国政治人物、外交官，现任中共中央对外联络部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Minister of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时任立法院副院长。
民主进步党籍政治人物
对中国政府在新疆地区对维吾尔族及其他少数民族进行种族灭绝的指控
中国、越南、日本、朝鲜等汉字文化圈国家在帝国时期，给予君主（皇帝）正配的封号。
description.en: The title given to the primary consort of an emperor in countries within the Chinese cultural sphere such as China, Vietnam, Japan, and Korea during imperial periods.

description.zh-cn: 中亚浩罕汗国军事领袖，19世纪入侵并盘踞新疆。
朱元璋次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 日本第121代天皇，明治天皇的父亲。
江户幕府第15代将军，也是末代将军。
日本的首都。
改革开放初期的中国公司
林立果的未婚妻。
孙权长兄，东汉末年军阀，为孙吴基业的奠基者之一。他在统一江东过程中与许贡发生冲突并最终处死了许贡，后遭许贡门客刺杀身亡。
description.en: An elder brother of Sun Quan, a warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu. He clashed with Xu Gong during his conquest of Jiangdong, eventually executing him, and was later assassinated by Xu Gong's retainers.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年孙吴阵营杰出的军事家、战略家、政治家与音乐家，孙吴重要将领，赤壁之战的主要指挥官。他也是一位名将，与孙策为总角之交。
description.en: A famous general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, a close friend and key general of Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第七位皇帝，李显第四子。
中国篮球运动员。

location.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州纽黑文市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员，孔祥熙在此获得矿物学硕士学位。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States where H. H. Kung obtained a master's degree in mineralogy.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，官至太尉、丞相。他与陈平等人发动诛吕安刘政变，拥立汉文帝。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty, who served as Grand Marshal and Chancellor. Along with Chen Ping, he quashed the Lü Clan Disturbance and enthroned Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，大韩民国临时政府领袖。
description.en: Korean independence activist and a leader of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 任正非长女，中国企业家，华为公司副董事长、轮值董事长、首席财务官。
description.en: A Chinese business executive, who is the deputy chair of the board, rotating chair, and CFO of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任正非次女
任正非长子
明朝第十六位皇帝，明光宗长子，崇祯帝之兄。在位期间，魏忠贤专权，但他启用了孙承宗、袁崇焕等将领在辽东对抗后金。
description.en: The sixteenth emperor of the Ming Dynasty and the elder brother of the Chongzhen Emperor. During his reign, the eunuch Wei Zhongxian wielded great power, but he also appointed commanders like Sun Chengzong and Yuan Chonghuan to counter the Later Jin in Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室，曹叡临终前任命的辅政大臣，后在高平陵之变中被司马懿所杀。
司马懿发动的政变，旨在铲除曹爽势力，此后司马氏独揽曹魏大权。
曹叡的养子，曹魏第三位皇帝。
曾是曹魏与西晋的都城，刘禅投降后居住于此；亦是唐朝的东都，白居易晚年多在此居住并最终逝世。
description.en: Once the capital of Cao Wei and Western Jin, where Liu Shan lived after his surrender, it also served as the eastern capital of the Tang dynasty, where Bai Juyi spent most of his later years and eventually passed away.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年曹操帐下谋士，崔氏的叔父。
台湾政治人物，民进党新北市议员。
中华民国政治人物，民进党籍立法委员。
中华民国政治人物，曾与郝柏村搭档参选1996年总统选举。

zh-cn: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年大会

description.zh-cn: 影响白先勇一生最重要的小说。
中国近代著名京剧和昆曲表演艺术家，京剧“四大名旦”之首，梅派艺术创始人。
description.en: A modern Chinese Peking and Kunqu Opera artist, leader of the "Four Great Dan", and founder of the Mei School of artistic style.

description.zh-cn: 退位皇帝的尊号。
明朝辽东总兵，早期对努尔哈赤有重要影响。
明朝末年著名政治及军事人物，官至兵部尚书兼蓟辽督师。他构筑了“关宁锦防线”，在宁远之战、宁锦之战中多次击败后金军队。为自保曾上疏颂扬魏忠贤，但最终仍被其排挤去职。后因己巳之变中护卫不力及擅杀毛文龙等罪名，被崇祯帝以反间计为由判处凌迟，后于清乾隆年间获得平反。
description.en: A renowned political and military figure in the late Ming Dynasty, who served as Minister of War and Viceroy of Jiliao. He constructed the 'Guan-Ning-Jin Defense Line' and repeatedly defeated the Later Jin forces in the battles of Ningyuan and Ningjin. He once praised Wei Zhongxian to protect himself but was eventually dismissed by him. He was later executed by lingchi by the Chongzhen Emperor, who fell for a deception stratagem, on charges including failing to protect the capital during the Jisi Incident and unlawfully executing Mao Wenlong. He was posthumously rehabilitated during the Qianlong era of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤创建的军政合一的社会组织形式。
指代中国境内所有民族的统称，是由梁启超首次提出的政治与国族概念。
description.en: A collective term referring to all ethnic groups within China, functioning as a political and national concept.

description.zh-cn: 香港企业家，壹传媒创办人。
马来西亚政治人物，曾任马来西亚第六任首相。他在任内设立了一个马来西亚发展有限公司。
description.en: The sixth Prime Minister of Malaysia, who established 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB).

description.zh-cn: 台湾的跨国科技公司，曾与朱邦复合作开发内置仓颉系统的“天龙中文电脑”。
description.en: A Taiwanese multinational technology company that collaborated with Chu Bong-Foo to develop the 'Sky Dragon Chinese Computer' with a built-in Cangjie system.

description.zh-cn: 华硕董事长。
台湾作家。
台湾作家。
位于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城的世界著名私立研究型大学，是常春藤盟校之一。由本杰明·富兰克林创建于1740年，是美国第五古老的高等教育机构，也是美国第一所从事科学技术和人文教育的现代高等学校。
description.en: A world-renowned private research university located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. It is a member of the Ivy League, founded in 1740 by Benjamin Franklin, and is the fifth-oldest institution of higher education in the United States and the first American university to pursue modern higher education in science, technology, and the humanities.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。
三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，主要活跃于蜀汉后期，多次率军北伐曹魏。
description.en: A prominent general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, primarily active in its later period, who led multiple northern expeditions against the rival state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，西晋的奠基者，司马懿次子。
description.en: A powerful regent in the late Cao Wei period, founder of the Western Jin dynasty, and the second son of Sima Yi.

description.zh-cn: 取代曹魏的统一王朝。
description.en: The dynasty that succeeded Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 李敖之子
台湾政治人物，民主进步党党员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 前东吴大学校长，蒋经国私生子
西晋宗室，司马懿第九子，八王之乱中的八王之一，曾篡位称帝。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, the ninth son of Sima Yi, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes who briefly usurped the throne.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在第二次世界大战期间为支援英国军队在缅甸殖民地对抗日本，以及保卫中国西南大后方而建立的出国作战部队。
中华民国陆军二级上将，曾任陆军司令。
清代八旗之一，上三旗之首。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing Dynasty, and the head of the Upper Three Banners.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝第十一子，书法家。
康熙帝第十二子。
荀彧的堂侄。
曹操的谋士。
张孝骞逝世的医院。
description.en: The hospital where Zhang Xiaoqian passed away.

description.zh-cn: 桥公次女，周瑜之妻。
description.en: Younger daughter of Qiao Gong, wife of Zhou Yu.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典四大名著之一，由罗贯中创作的长篇历史小说。
description.en: One of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature, a historical novel written by Luo Guanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至曹魏的官员，曾任会稽太守，被孙策击败。
description.en: The Administrator of Kuaiji Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, defeated by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大宗教之一。
description.en: One of the world's three major religions.

description.zh-cn: 由朱熹汇编的儒家核心经典，包括《大学》、《中庸》、《论语》、《孟子》。
description.en: The core classics of Confucianism compiled by Zhu Xi, including the Great Learning, the Doctrine of the Mean, the Analects, and Mencius.

description.zh-cn: 清朝将领，曾国藩之弟，率军攻陷天京。
美国国家篮球协会（NBA）球队。
description.en: A National Basketball Association (NBA) team.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役篮球运动员及评论员。
description.en: American retired basketball player and commentator.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役篮球运动员。
description.en: American retired basketball player.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役篮球运动员。
description.en: American retired basketball player.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，明孝宗之子，明世宗堂兄。
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, son of Emperor Xiaozong, cousin of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 1955年中华人民共和国授予的军衔等级。
香港歌手及演员，“四大天王”之一。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, one of the "Four Heavenly Kings".

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，曾多次与张学友合作。
description.en: Hong Kong film director who has collaborated with Jacky Cheung multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 台湾演员及特技演员，张学友的好友。
description.en: Taiwanese actor and stuntman, a friend of Jacky Cheung.

description.zh-cn: 唱片公司，张学友目前的唱片及经纪公司。
description.en: Record label, Jacky Cheung's current label and management company.

description.zh-cn: 1992年香港媒体册封的四位最受欢迎男歌手的称号，成员包括张学友、刘德华、郭富城、黎明。
description.en: A title given by Hong Kong media in 1992 to the four most popular male singers, including Jacky Cheung, Andy Lau, Aaron Kwok, and Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫执导的电影，张学友凭借此片获得香港电影金像奖最佳男配角。
description.en: A film directed by Wong Kar-wai, for which Jacky Cheung won the Hong Kong Film Award for Best Supporting Actor.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影公司。该公司于1976年将古龙的《流星‧蝴蝶‧剑》和《天涯‧明月‧刀》改编成电影，开创了武侠电影的高峰和古龙的电影时代。
description.en: A Hong Kong film studio. In 1976, its film adaptations of Gu Long's novels 'Meteor, Butterfly, Sword' and 'Tianya, Mingyue, Dao' initiated a peak in wuxia films and marked the beginning of the Gu Long movie era.

description.zh-cn: 香港武打电影演员
description.en: Hong Kong martial arts film actor

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第三位皇帝，宋太宗第三子，在位25年。其统治前期，社会经济繁荣，史称“咸平之治”；后期则热衷于封禅和天书等道教活动。
description.en: The third emperor of the Song Dynasty, the third son of Emperor Taizong, who reigned for 25 years. The early part of his reign was a period of prosperity known as the 'Reign of Xianping', while the later part was marked by his devotion to Daoist activities such as the Feng and Shan sacrifices and the 'Heavenly Books'.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的割据政权
description.en: A state during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由契丹族建立的朝代
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by the Khitan people

description.zh-cn: 北宋将领
description.en: A general of the Northern Song dynasty

description.zh-cn: 南唐末主李煜的第二任皇后，大周后（周娥皇）的妹妹。
description.en: The second empress of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang, and the younger sister of the Great Empress Zhou (Zhou Ehuang).

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央党校党建教研部教授，因严厉批判习近平及中国共产党，被开除党籍并取消退休待遇，成为习近平的著名批评者。她被视为党内的自由派学者，现居美国。
description.en: A former professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department of the Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party, who was expelled from the party and had her retirement benefits canceled for severely criticizing Xi Jinping and the CCP. She is considered a liberal scholar within the party and currently resides in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 南明最后一位皇帝。
文昭甄皇后的父亲，曾任上蔡令。
东汉末年文学家，建安七子之一。
中国古代思想家、哲学家、教育家，战国时期儒家代表人物，与庄周大约同时代。
description.en: An ancient Chinese thinker, philosopher, and educator, and a representative of Confucianism during the Warring States period, a contemporary of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国，庄周的故国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty in China, the home state of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诸子百家之一，主张以“法”、“术”、“势”治国。庄子曾反对其以法律治国的主张。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought that advocated for governing by law, technique, and power. Its advocacy of rule by law was opposed by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 华语电影女演员，拥有新加坡国籍。被誉为“第五代导演的电影缪斯”，是首位主演影片包揽欧洲三大影展最高奖的女演员，并曾担任多个国际A类电影节的评委会主席。
description.en: A Chinese-born Singaporean actress. Hailed as the 'muse of the Fifth Generation directors', she is the first actress to star in films that have won the top awards at all three major European film festivals and has served as the jury president for several Class-A international film festivals.

description.zh-cn: 日本演员
description.en: Japanese actor

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅警卫局

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年曹操麾下的重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Cao Cao during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将。
新加坡的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Singapore.

birth_place.zh-cn: 马来亚联邦槟城威南县双溪峇甲
birth_place.en: Sungai Bakap, South Seberang Perai, Penang, Malayan Union

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，现任马来西亚第10任首相兼财政部长。曾任副首相、多届部长及国会反对党领袖。他因与时任首相马哈迪的政治斗争而在1998年被革职，并引发了“烈火莫熄”改革运动。他曾两度因鸡奸案入狱，后在2018年获得特赦，并于2022年领导希望联盟在悬峙议会中组建联合政府，出任首相。
description.en: Malaysian politician, currently the 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia and Minister of Finance. He previously served as Deputy Prime Minister, various ministerial posts, and Leader of the Opposition. His dismissal in 1998 by then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad sparked the "Reformasi" movement. He was imprisoned twice on sodomy charges before receiving a royal pardon in 2018. In 2022, he led the Pakatan Harapan coalition to form a unity government after a hung parliament and became Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 一个由120个发展中国家组成的论坛，它们在冷战期间不正式与任何主要大国集团结盟，也不反对任何主要大国集团。
description.en: A forum of 120 developing world states that are not formally aligned with or against any major power bloc.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在嘉靖后期专权二十年
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, dominated the government for 20 years during Jiajing's later reign.

description.zh-cn: 明代骚扰中国东南沿海的海盗
description.en: Pirates who raided the southeastern coast of China during the Ming dynasty.

zh-cn: 加夫列尔·加西亚·马尔克斯

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家，两弹一星元勋。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamics expert and a key contributor to China's 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' project.

death_place.zh-cn: 加利福尼亚州洛思加图斯

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔历史学家、社会活动家、作家，以其关于南京大屠杀的著作《南京暴行：被遗忘的大屠杀》而闻名。
description.en: A Chinese-American historian, activist, and author, best known for her book 'The Rape of Nanking: The Forgotten Holocaust of World War II'.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的次子，蒋孝章之弟。曾任中华民国驻新加坡及日本代表。因江南案被外放，后于预定接任华视董事长前一日猝逝。
description.en: The second son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Faina Vakhreva (Chiang Fang-liang), and younger brother of Chiang Hsiao-chang. He served as the Republic of China's representative to Singapore and Japan, was posted abroad following the Henry Liu case, and died suddenly the day before he was scheduled to take over as chairman of CTS.

description.zh-cn: 金朝初年的重要将领和政治家。
中国异见人士。
description.en: Chinese dissident.

description.zh-cn: 江绵恒的儿子，博裕资本创办人。
美国跨国投资银行与金融服务公司，曾因温云松身份敏感而拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: An American multinational investment bank and financial services company that once rejected Wen Yunsong's job application due to his sensitive background.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日本萨摩藩鹿儿岛城下

description.zh-cn: 日本武士、明治维新时期的政治家，与西乡隆盛及木户孝允并称维新三杰，也是明治政府的核心领导人。他曾是岩仓使节团成员，归国后反对征韩论。
description.en: A Japanese samurai and statesman of the Meiji Restoration period, one of the Three Great Nobles of the Restoration, and a core leader of the Meiji government. He was also a member of the Iwakura Mission and opposed the Seikanron upon his return.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期儒家大师，韩非与李斯的老师。
description.en: A Confucian master of the late Warring States period, and the teacher of Han Fei and Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的前半期。
东汉第十二位皇帝。
东汉末年外戚，官至大将军，为铲除宦官势力召董卓进京。
东汉末年操纵朝政的十二位宦官。
唐高祖李渊长子，原皇太子
位于蒙古高原的古代游牧帝国
隋朝将领，在江都发动兵变，弑杀隋炀帝，后自立为帝，国号许。
description.en: A Sui dynasty general who launched a coup in Jiangdu, assassinated Emperor Yang, and later declared himself emperor of the state of Xu.

description.zh-cn: 西魏八大柱国之一
中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国家安全部部长。
根据《洛阳伽蓝记》记载，菩提达摩来自波斯。
柬埔寨共产党总书记、红色高棉最高领导人，曾与陈永贵互访。
皖系军阀的重要人物，段祺瑞的得力干将和主要谋士，曾任奉军副司令，与张作霖不和。
description.en: A key figure in the Anhui clique, Duan Qirui's chief subordinate and strategist. He also served as deputy commander of the Fengtian army and was at odds with Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，白居易的终身好友，二人同为新乐府运动的伙伴。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet, lifelong friend of Bai Juyi, and a partner in the New Yuefu movement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝文学家、哲学家，白居易晚年在洛阳时常与之唱和。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and philosopher, who often exchanged poems with Bai Juyi in his later years in Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第十六位皇帝，曾褒奖白居易为“诗仙”。
description.en: The 16th emperor of the Tang dynasty, who praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal'.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人和社交媒体名人，王健林之子。
description.en: Chinese businessman and social media personality, son of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 载沣第四子。
description.en: The fourth son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 中国前国家副主席曾庆红之子。
description.en: Son of former Chinese Vice President Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，秦庄襄王之父，在位时间极短。
description.en: King of the state of Qin, father of King Zhuangxiang of Qin. His reign was extremely short.

description.zh-cn: 秦孝文王的正夫人，无子，后收养异人（秦庄襄王）为义子。
description.en: The primary consort of King Xiaowen of Qin. Being childless, she adopted Yiren (King Zhuangxiang of Qin) as her son.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，秦孝文王之父，在位时间长达五十六年。
description.en: King of the state of Qin, father of King Xiaowen of Qin. His reign lasted for fifty-six years.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期各种学术流派的总称。
description.en: A collective term for the various academic schools of thought during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods in China.

description.zh-cn: 一种从黄花蒿中提取的倍半萜内酯化合物，由屠呦呦及其团队发现。它具有高效的抗疟作用，是现代抗疟药物的基础，主要用于治疗疟疾。
description.en: A sesquiterpene lactone isolated from Artemisia annua, discovered by Tu Youyou and her team. It possesses potent antimalarial properties, forms the basis for modern antimalarial drugs, and is primarily used to treat malaria.

description.zh-cn: 中国东晋时期的医学家、炼丹家，著有《肘后备急方》，其著作启发了屠呦呦发现青蒿素的方法。
description.en: A medical scholar and alchemist of the Eastern Jin dynasty in China, author of 'The Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies', whose work inspired Tu Youyou's method for discovering artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝嘉庆帝的年号。
description.en: The era name of the Jiaqing Emperor, the seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，宋祖英的妹妹。
description.en: Chinese actress, younger sister of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、音乐人、演员。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, musician, and actor.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视节目主持人、媒体人、企业家。
description.en: Chinese television host, media personality, and entrepreneur.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国城市，孔祥熙和宋彬彬的逝世地。
description.en: A city in the United States where H. H. Kung and Song Binbin passed away.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的富商。
description.en: A wealthy businessman in the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 元惠宗的第三任皇后，元朝最后一位皇后。
description.en: The third empress of Emperor Huizong of Yuan and the last empress of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾任山东巡抚，奉奕䜣之命处死了安德海；后任四川总督，并于1877年参考明代方法，以铁石结构改造了都江堰的堰体和堤坝。
description.en: A Qing official. He served as Governor of Shandong, executing the eunuch An Dehai on Yixin's orders. Later, as Governor-General of Sichuan, he renovated the weirs and dams of Dujiangyan in 1877 with an iron-and-stone structure, referencing Ming dynasty methods.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣的嫡福晋，大学士桂良之女；也是胤祥侧福晋之一。
description.en: The primary consort of Yixin, and a daughter of the grand secretary Guiliang; also one of Yinxiang's secondary consorts.

zh-cn: 陕西省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，国民革命军第二十九军军长，张自忠的上级，曾接任于右任为陕西省政府主席。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, commander of the 29th Army of the National Revolutionary Army, Zhang Zizhong's superior, and who succeeded Yu Youren as the Chairman of the Shaanxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 日本首相，军阀巨头。其内阁因第一次护宪运动而下台，史称“大正政变”。
description.en: A Prime Minister of Japan and a military oligarch. His cabinet was forced to resign due to the first Movement to Protect the Constitution, an event known as the Taishō Political Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 1915年日本帝国向中华民国袁世凯政府提出的一系列不平等要求，旨在扩大其在华利益。
description.en: A set of unequal demands made in 1915 by the Empire of Japan to the government of the Republic of China under Yuan Shikai, aimed at expanding its interests in China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝名儒，皇太子允礽的老师。
description.en: A renowned Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty and a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇室爵位的第一等。
description.en: The first rank of the Qing imperial nobility.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省省长（龚正的前任），也曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, who served as Governor of Shandong Province (Gong Zheng's predecessor) and also as Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省的地级市，也是龚正和佘孟孝的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Gong Zheng and She Mengxiao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设在深圳市的海关机构。
description.en: The customs authority of the People's Republic of China located in Shenzhen.

en: Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection
zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会的主要负责人。
description.en: The principal responsible person of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义长女，中国共产党地下党员，在北平和平解放过程中起了重要作用。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Fu Zuoyi, an underground member of the Communist Party of China who played an important role in the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐代女官、诗人、皇妃。武则天时期的重要政治人物，在唐隆政变中被李隆基所杀。
description.en: A female official, poet, and imperial consort during the Tang dynasty. A key political figure during Wu Zetian's reign, she was killed by Li Longji in the Tanglong Coup.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1980年2月28日的灭门血案，受害者为时任台湾省议员林义雄的母亲与双胞胎女儿，长女亦受重伤。当时林义雄因美丽岛事件而被羁押。
description.en: A familicide that occurred on February 28, 1980. The victims were the mother and twin daughters of then-Taiwan Provincial Assembly member Lin Yi-hsiung; his eldest daughter was also severely injured. Lin was in custody for the Kaohsiung Incident at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人权律师，曾作为艾未未方法人公司的代理律师处理“发课税案”。
description.en: A Chinese human rights lawyer who represented Ai Weiwei's legal entity company in the 'Fake Tax Case'.

description.zh-cn: 香港立法会议员，曾指控艾未未的作品《透视研究：天安门》违反国安法、侮辱国家尊严。
description.en: A member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council who accused Ai Weiwei's work 'Study of Perspective: Tiananmen' of violating the National Security Law and insulting national dignity.

description.zh-cn: 香港西九文化区的视觉文化博物馆，因收藏并计划展出艾未未的争议性作品而引发政治风波，后决定不在开馆时展出相关作品。
description.en: A museum of visual culture in Hong Kong's West Kowloon Cultural District. Its collection and planned exhibition of Ai Weiwei's controversial works sparked political controversy, leading to the decision not to display them at the museum's opening.

description.zh-cn: 维基解密创始人，艾未未曾公开抗议将其引渡至美国的司法程序。
description.en: Founder of WikiLeaks. Ai Weiwei publicly protested the legal proceedings to extradite him to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 和硕和惠公主与多尔济塞布腾之子，胤祥外孙。
description.en: Son of Princess Heshuo Hehui and Dorjisebten, grandson of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝特有的世袭罔替的王爵。胤祥是清朝第九位铁帽子王，也是首位因功绩获此恩封的亲王。
description.en: A special hereditary princely rank in the Qing dynasty that could be passed down without demotion. Yinxiang was the 9th iron-cap prince and the first to receive this honor for his merits.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥庶福晋之一。
description.en: One of Yinxiang's concubines.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年武将，初为刘繇部下，后归顺孙策。
description.en: A military general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, initially served under Liu Yao before surrendering to Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、摇滚歌手，曾任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and rock singer, and a former member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第41任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的父亲。
description.en: American politician, 41st President of the United States, and father of George W. Bush.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部部长

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的负责人职位。
description.en: The head position of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由蔡边村自编自导的纪录片，记录了他寻找20多年未见的生母亦舒的经历。
description.en: A documentary written and directed by Tsai Bian-cun, documenting his search for his birth mother, Yi Shu, whom he had not seen for over 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年蒙古族将领，在第二次鸦片战争中负责京津地区的防务，指挥了大沽口和八里桥等重要战役。
description.en: A Mongol general of the late Qing dynasty who was responsible for the defense of the Beijing-Tianjin area during the Second Opium War, commanding key battles such as Taku Forts and Baliqiao.

description.zh-cn: 英国外交官，时任英国驻广州领事，处理亚罗号事件。在通州谈判期间被僧格林沁俘虏并遭受虐待。
description.en: A British diplomat, then British consul in Guangzhou, who handled the Arrow Incident. He was captured and tortured by Sengge Rinchen's forces during the Tongzhou negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，原为台湾民众党籍，后退党。曾任新竹市市长，因贪污案一审有罪而被停职，并在大罢免运动中成为罢免对象。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, formerly a member of the Taiwan People's Party before withdrawing. She served as the mayor of Hsinchu City, was suspended from office after being convicted of corruption in the first instance, and became a target of recall during the Great Recall movement.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日本摄津国大坂堂岛新地五丁目中津藩藏屋敷
birth_place.en: Nakatsu Domain Kurayashiki, Dōjima-shinchi 5-chome, Ōsaka, Settsu Province, Japan

death_place.zh-cn: 日本东京府东京市芝区三田二丁目
death_place.en: 2-chōme, Mita, Shiba-ku, Tokyo City, Tokyo Prefecture, Japan

description.zh-cn: 日本明治时期重要的启蒙思想家、教育家，庆应义塾大学创立者，对明治维新运动影响深远。他提出了著名的《脱亚论》，并被誉为“日本近代教育之父”。
description.en: A prominent Japanese enlightenment thinker and educator of the Meiji era, as well as an author, writer, teacher, translator, entrepreneur, and journalist. He founded Keio University, was an early advocate for reform in Japan, and proposed the famous 'Datsu-A Ron' (Leaving Asia). He is regarded as one of the founders of modern Japan and is often called 'the father of modern Japanese education'.

description.zh-cn: 日本幕末的政治家与军事家，曾担任咸临丸的指挥官，并在江户无血开城中扮演了关键角色。
description.en: A Japanese statesman and naval engineer during the late Edo period. He served as the commander of the Kanrin Maru and played a key role in the bloodless surrender of Edo.

description.zh-cn: 1969年3月发生于乌苏里江珍宝岛的中苏大规模武装冲突，是中苏边界冲突中最著名的事件。
description.en: A large-scale armed conflict between China and the Soviet Union on Zhenbao Island in the Ussuri River in March 1969, the most famous incident in the Sino-Soviet border conflict.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、记者，时任中国作家协会副主席。他因其支持民主改革的言论对学生产生影响，并在“反对资产阶级自由化”运动中被开除党籍。
description.en: A Chinese writer and journalist, then-Vice Chairman of the Chinese Writers Association. He influenced students with his pro-democratic reform views and was expelled from the party during the 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign'.

description.zh-cn: 日俄战争期间俄罗斯帝国的沙皇。
description.en: The Tsar of the Russian Empire during the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央派出，对地方和中央单位进行巡视监督的临时性机构。
description.en: Temporary bodies dispatched by the CCP Central Committee to conduct inspection and supervision of local and central units.

description.zh-cn: 义和团运动后，清政府与十一国签订的不平等条约，内容包括巨额赔款（庚子赔款）、允许外国驻军等。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed between the Qing government and eleven nations after the Boxer Rebellion, which included massive indemnities (the Boxer Indemnity) and the stationing of foreign troops.

description.zh-cn: 晚清大臣，主战派核心人物。他向慈禧太后力言义和团“神术可用”，推动清廷利用义和团对抗列强。
description.en: A high-ranking official in the late Qing dynasty and a core member of the pro-war faction. He convinced Empress Dowager Cixi that the Boxers' 'divine skills' could be relied upon, pushing the court to use the Boxers to confront the foreign powers.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军为镇压义和团运动而发动的军事入侵。联军先后攻占大沽炮台、天津和北京，最终迫使清政府签订《辛丑条约》。
description.en: A military invasion launched by the Eight-Nation Alliance to suppress the Boxer Rebellion. The coalition forces captured the Taku Forts, Tianjin, and Beijing, ultimately forcing the Qing government to sign the Boxer Protocol.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国武装力量的组成部分，是不脱离生产的群众武装组织。
在四川成都举办的国际体育赛事。江油事件发生在该运动会开幕前夕，给地方官员带来了维持稳定的巨大政治压力，可能影响了他们对事件的处理方式。
description.en: An international sports event held in Chengdu, Sichuan. The Jiangyou incident occurred just before its opening, placing immense political pressure on local officials to maintain stability, which likely influenced their handling of the situation.

description.zh-cn: 一个中国开发的生成式人工智能聊天机器人，在中国传媒研究计划的测试中，该模型未输出江油示威的相关信息，反映了审查延伸至AI领域。
description.en: A generative AI chatbot developed in China. In tests by the China Media Project, the model did not output information about the Jiangyou protests, reflecting the extension of censorship into the AI domain.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲市府时期的台北市长办公室主任，因京华城案被控违背职务收受贿赂罪。
description.en: Director of the Taipei City Mayor's Office during Ko Wen-je's administration, accused of accepting bribes against his duties in the Core Pacific City case.

description.zh-cn: 民进党籍政治人物，曾任台北市议员，早期曾指控官员图利京华城。
description.en: Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) politician and former Taipei City Councilor who had previously accused officials of improperly benefiting Core Pacific City.

description.zh-cn: 清末怪杰，精通多种语言，曾任张之洞幕僚。
description.en: An eccentric scholar in the late Qing dynasty, proficient in multiple languages, who served as an aide to Zhang Zhidong.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as Vice President during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，前英国首相，在伊拉克战争等议题上与布什政府紧密合作。
description.en: British politician and former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom who worked closely with the Bush administration, particularly on the Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首、政府首脑与三军统帅。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗的伊斯兰原教旨主义运动和军事组织，在2001年被美国领导的联军推翻。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist movement and military organization in Afghanistan, overthrown by a U.S.-led coalition in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣，岐阳武靖王，朱元璋外甥，李景隆之父。
唐朝第八位皇帝。
中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任、香港中联办主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年将领，在辽东皮岛建立东江镇，以牵制后金。因其不受节制、虚报兵饷等行为，最终被袁崇焕以尚方宝剑斩杀。
description.en: A late Ming Dynasty general who established the Dongjiang garrison on Pi Island in Liaodong to harass the Later Jin. He was executed by Yuan Chonghuan with an imperial sword for insubordination, fraudulent reporting of military expenses, and other transgressions.

description.zh-cn: 德意志皇帝兼普鲁士国王，在位仅99天。
description.en: German Emperor and King of Prussia, who reigned for only 99 days.

description.zh-cn: 末任德意志皇帝及普鲁士国王。
description.en: The last German Emperor and King of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国、北德意志邦联及普鲁士王国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position for the German Empire, North German Confederation, and Kingdom of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 指1874年日本以琉球漂流民在台湾被原住民杀害为由，出兵攻打台湾南部原住民部落的军事行动。大久保利通作为全权大臣负责与清朝交涉，而木户孝允则对此一贯持反对态度，并在政府决定出兵后辞去参议职务以示抗议。
description.en: A Japanese punitive expedition to Taiwan in 1874 in retaliation for the murder of Ryukyuan castaways by indigenous Taiwanese. Ōkubo Toshimichi was appointed as the plenipotentiary to negotiate with the Qing dynasty, while Kido Takayoshi consistently opposed this action and resigned from his post as Sangi in protest when the government decided to dispatch troops.

description.zh-cn: 2010年代初期在阿拉伯世界发生的一系列反政府示威、起义和武装叛乱。
description.en: A series of anti-government protests, uprisings, and armed rebellions that spread across much of the Arab world in the early 2010s.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，由支持国民政府的地主和富农等组成的武装组织，对共产党控制区进行反攻倒算。
description.en: Armed groups formed by landlords and rich peasants supporting the Nationalist government during the second Chinese Civil War, conducting counter-attacks and reprisals in areas controlled by the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中共情报“后三杰”之一，曾任胡宗南的机要秘书。
description.en: One of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence, served as Hu Zongnan's confidential secretary.

description.zh-cn: 美国第27任总统，伍德罗·威尔逊的前任。他在1912年总统选举中作为共和党候选人败选。
description.en: The 27th President of the United States and Woodrow Wilson's predecessor. He lost the 1912 presidential election as the Republican candidate.

description.zh-cn: 美国历史上和现存的奉行白人至上主义的仇恨团体。
description.en: American white supremacist hate groups, past and present.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的著作集，是中国古代法家学派的代表作。宋神宗为太子时喜读此书，其思想对其后来的治国理念产生了影响。
description.en: A collection of works by Han Fei, it is a representative work of the ancient Chinese Legalist school. Emperor Shenzong enjoyed reading this book as crown prince, and its ideas influenced his later governing philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 曾任清华大学党委副书记，他向毛泽东写的信件成为“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动的导火索之一。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of Tsinghua University. His letter to Mao Zedong was one of the triggers for the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

description.zh-cn: 印度及其他南亚地区普遍存在的社会分层体系。
description.en: A system of social stratification prevalent in India and other parts of South Asia.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的国家之一。
description.en: One of the historical kingdoms on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 指美国黑人或祖先为非洲黑人的美国公民。
